i1a1('bum): pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis stong ngog chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid spyong pa'i
i1a2('bum): kyis stong ngo // byi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni dngos po byed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong
i1a3('bum): ngo/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni dngos po myed pa'i de bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'as stong ngo // ke'u shi ka de ltar na rang stong pa nyid stong
i1a4('bum): pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid stong dun po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / don ram stong pa nyid stong pa nyida'adus byas
i1a5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid 'angs tu bya stong pa nyidakyis stong pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyi stong pa nyid

i1a7('bum): la kyi sa kyi
i1a8('bum): [I1BL9880011.txt]
i1b1('bum): phrag brgya pa/ dam du na sum ma po dang
i1b2('bum): rab 'byor kyis gos pa'i bco ldan 'das
i2a1('bum): ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang gzugs smra ma/ skye ma nyid kyang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das
i2a2('bum): tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhon ma lags te/ tshor ba nyid kyang snya masgyu ma nyid tsher ba'o// bcom
i2a3('bum): ldan 'das 'du shes kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du shes nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang

i2a5('bum): sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ snum yang ga zhon ma legs

i2b1('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mag nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mug ge/ bcom ldan 'das rna ba yang gzhan ma lags/

i2b3('bum): sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lpags te/ sna nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang sA'o// bcom ldan 'das lce yang gzhan ma lags te/ lce nyid
i2b4('bum): kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lce'o// bcom ldan 'das lus kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lus

i3a2('bum): sna nyid ts+tshe sgyum/ skyon 'a kyang snang / bcom ldan 'das de'ang gzhan mi lags/ skyem 'angaga'anam lags te/ phyi kyang snum/ snu
i3a3('bum): ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu mi yang gzhan ma lags

i3b3('bum): nyid kyi sgyus 'a kyang lce rnam pa gas pag// bcom ldan 'das smras kyi rnam pa rigs pa 'ang ga na ma lags/ zlum sang ka'an lags te/

i4a1('bum): 'das sna'i 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sna'i 'dus

i4a3('bum): pa'o/ rje bcom ldan 'das lus kyis 'das te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu masgyu ma nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus
i4a4('bum): reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dres te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus
i4a5('bum): te reg pa'i// bcom ldan 'das myig gi 'dres te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma 'dra gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyend kyis tshwa
i4a6('bum): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba yang gzhan ma legs/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma legs te

i8b2('bum): pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags ni sgyum yang gzhan ma lags te/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rgyund tu zhugs pa'o
i8b3('bum): 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das lan cig par 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'ang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'o
i8b4('bum): ba'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras
i8b5('bum): bu'o// bcom ldan 'das dag bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan ma legs/ sgyu yang gzhan ma lags te/ ngag bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das
i8b6('bum): rang byang chub kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang byang chub nyid do// bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid yang gzhan ma ldag/ 
i8b7('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lam gyi rnam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang gzhan ma
i8b8('bum): khrigs/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu mo/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rlom pa thams cad mkhyenab nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang pa/ rab 'byor
i9a1('bum): da ces me du sams/ snum la skyab 'am 'gog pa yang ngapa gsol du'i bcog ldan 'das de na ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byar nga da rda snyam du
i9a2('bum): sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol dpo bcom ldan 'das ngani ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de ji snyam
i9a3('bum): du sems gang sla ba myed cing 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba snang pa shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin de pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad ma
i9a4('bum): bai nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gso yod pa pocom ldan 'das den myi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de
i9a5('bum): ji snyam du sems/ nye bar lend pa'i phung po lnga po de dag lnga 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes pa dang / bda' dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa
i9a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pe/ rab 'byor de ji snyom du sems/ 'du shes dang / bda' dang / gdags pa dang / tha snyed tsam gyis nye bar len pa
i9a7('bum): phung po lnga po skyes pa 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar myi 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
i9a8('bum): rang 'byan pa ni snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes myed cing bda' myed pa dang / gdags pa myod pa dang // tha skad med pa dang / myig du gdags pa myed pa dang / lus myed pa dang / lus kyi las myed pa dang
i9b1('bum): ngag myed pa dang / ngag gi las myed pa dang / yod myed pa dang yid las myed pa dang / skye bo myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa dang / kun nas/ nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / de ni shes rab kyi pha ral
i9b2('bum): phyind pa bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur rom/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsolang ba bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// bcom
i9b3('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bsrabs shing / myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams
i9b4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das kyis ji gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la slob
i9b5('bum): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen pos sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslabs pa de ltar/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
i9b6('bum): de ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bya ba sha stag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol
i9b7('bum): tu phyind pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar phung po lnga po
i9b8('bum): rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin can te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu
i10a1('bum): 'aMphung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi nad pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyend du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsolang ba bcom ldan 'das
i10a2('bum): de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i srad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po mchis pa'i rang bzhin cad de/ dngos ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'a
i10a3('bum): stsalang ba/ rab 'byorang de ci snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la srabs shing / rnam pa thos cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
i10a4('bum): de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sgyu ma ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
i10a5('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de ji snyam du sems/ sgra brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram
i10a6('bum): gsel pa bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sgra brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin can te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs
i10a7('bum): su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ mig yor lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs shing / rnam po thos
i10a8('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das da ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mig yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin can
i10b1('bum): dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang ba/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chu zla lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol
i10b2('bum): tu phyind pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das don myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chu zla
i10b3('bum): ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin can te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ smig rgya la
i10b4('bum): lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la slabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsold pa bcom ldan 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du
i10b5('bum): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar smig rgyu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmyigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
i10b6('bum): de ni ci snyam du sems/ sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol da pa bcom ldan
i10b7('bum): 'das de ni myi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sprul pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin can te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang can bzhin ci de ni dmyigs su ma mchis so// 
i10b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar/ gzugs ni rmyi lam lta bu/ tshor ba ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du shes ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du byed ni rmyi lam lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam
i11a1('bum): lta buste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang drug go// de na phung po lnga'o// de dag na nang srung ba nyid kyi phyar mya dmyags sa/ phya nang snang pa nyid kyi phyar mya dmyigs sa/ byan sa
i11a2('bum): pa nyid phyir myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid
i11a3('bum): kyi phyir dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dor ba med
i11a4('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmigos so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa
i11a5('bum): kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi myir myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang
i11a6('bum): sa gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba ni sgyu mo lta bu/ 'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa ni gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o
i11a7('bum): de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmigs so// / stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi par mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir
i11a8('bum): dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyig so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
i11b1('bum): phyogs so// thes pa tha sa myang ba slong da ra myo rdzogs so// nga bamyang po slong med kyi par myi migs so/ rang ba na spang ba kyang myang byugs/ cas thams pa sa na
i11b2('bum): myo daphyogs so// rang gi man 'ang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myo gas so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mya dmyigs so// ngos pa myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tu
i11b3('bum): myo ngomyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor nga gzugs ni sgra brnyan lta bu dang / tshor ba ni sgra brnyan lta bu// 'du 'du shes ni sgra banan lta bu/ 'du byed ni sgra banam/ 
i11b4('bum): du/ rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 
i11b5('bum): phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi
i11b6('bum): phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dres byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// theg ma dang tha ma
i11b7('bum): myong ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi ngomigs so// jom pa myong po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmyigs so// rang 'a'i sod nyid kyi phyir myi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan
i11b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myang ba'i
i12a1('bum): ngo bo nyid/ stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmigs so// rab 'byorang gzugs ni myir yor lta bu/ tshor ba ni myor yor lta bu/ 'du shes ni myig yor lta bu/ 'du byed ni myig yir lta bu/ rnam par
i12a2('bum): bA ni myig yor lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so/ 
i12a3('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmyigs so// 'dus bya
i12a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi du myigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myeng pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs
i12a5('bum): so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid phyir mi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so
i12a6('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs
i12a7('bum): rang 'byed gzugs ni mya d+ha s+t+rai nyA/ ra pan rgyu na du/ 'dug so na muT+Ta m+b+ha du/ 'du byed ni mu dus bu/ rnam pa shes pan tshe na la / rnam par gos pa ni gang yin pa don dbang drug ga/ 
i12a8('bum): 'o// de dag ni na stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir myong myigs so// phyi sring pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmigs so/ snying po'ang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmyigs so// che bsnang ba'i kyi
i12b1('bum): phyir ma dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mya dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa snga
i12b2('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmigs so// 
i12b3('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmyigs so// dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi
i12b4('bum): myi dmyigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang gzugs ni smig rgyu lta bu/ tshor ba ni smig rgyu lta bu
i12b5('bum): 'du shes ni smyig rgyu lta bu/ 'du byed ni smig rgyu lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni smi ga rgyu lta bu/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi
i12b6('bum): dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// don dam
i12b7('bum): ba stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ga phyir myi dmyigs/ theg ma dang
i12b8('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid go phyir myi dmyigs/ dor ba med pa snang pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyig s+ho/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid gi phyir myi dmyigs/ 
i13a1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid kyi phyir mi dmyigs so// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ma dmyigs so/ dngos pa'i myang ba'i stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// de ba'ang snang ba nyid kyi phyir ma
i13a2('bum): dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de gzugs ni stsal pa lta bu/ tshor ba ni sprul pa lta bu/ 'du shos ni sprul pa lta bu/ 'du byed ni sAl po lta bu
i13a3('bum): rnam par shes pa ni sprul pa lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa ni dbang po drug go// de ni dbang phung po lnga'o// de dge ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs
i13a4('bum): so/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmyigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyig so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid
i13a5('bum): kyi phyir mi dmyigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmyigasaso// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmigs so/ dor ba myed pa stong pa'i
i13a6('bum): kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid phyir myi dmyigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid
i13a7('bum): kyi phyir myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmyigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmyigs so// gsol pa bcom
i13a8('bum): ldan 'das de ltar lags na/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpe'i chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pos bstan pa 'di thos nas 'jigs shing sdang ba dang / skrag pa dang bar myi 'byor lags gang / bcom ldan
i13b1('bum): 'das kyis bka' yul du/ rape 'byor dgasang byang chub sams dpa' ses dpa' chen pa reg pa la gas du zhugs pa min la/ shes rab kyi pa'i ma du phyin pa la thabs kyings pa nogs/ 
i13b2('bum): dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyi 'o rtsa lag tu ma 'ongs nas/ 'jigs shing sdang ba dang / bsgrag par 'gyur ro// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i seMs dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na/ 
i13b3('bum): myi 'jigs myi sdang myi skrag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das gis bka' stsal da// rab 'byord 'di la byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po
i13b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs rtag ces bya bar rtogs de de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar rtogs
i13b5('bum): te de myi dmyigs so// 'du shes myi rtag ces bya bar rtogs ste de myi dmyigs so// 'du byed myi rtag ces bya bar rtogs ste/ de myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs
i13b6('bum): so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
i13b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtogs te do myi dmyigs so// tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtogs te de
i13b8('bum): myi dmigaso/ 'du shes sdug sngal zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmigs so// 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so
i14a1('bum): rab 'byorang 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
i14a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs bdag ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// tshor ba bdag myed
i14a3('bum): ces bya ba du rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// 'du shes bdag myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// 'du byed bdag myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces
i14a4('bum): bya bar rtogs de de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor de de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor/ nigazhan yang byang
i14a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs zhi zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs
i14a6('bum): tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar rdzogs te de mi dmyigs so// 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa shes bzhi zhes bya bar rtogs te myi
i14a7('bum): dmi gso// rab 'byer de ni byang chub sems dpa' sas dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spong ba'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen
i14a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol du tu pon ma la spyod pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenod pa nyid dang ljin bya'i sa seMs kyis gzugs stong zhes bya bar rdzogs te/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams ca mkhyen
i14b1('bum): bya nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba ston zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes stong zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmigs
i14b2('bum): so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes byed stong zhes bya bar rtogs te de mya dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rje bar
i14b3('bum): shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtogs te de mi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'dod ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// ra
i14b4('bum): 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi po ri lad tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mtshan
i14b5('bum): mo myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i14b6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes mtshan ma myed ces bya bar rtogs ste de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtogs te
i14b7('bum): de myi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa mtshan myed ces bya bar rtogs de de sa mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
i14b8('bum): se tsho mos dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byer gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'o seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
i15a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i sems kyis
i15a2('bum): nor ba smon pa mang ces bya blar rtogs ti mi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes srin pa myed ces bya bar rtogs te myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad
i15a3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan po'i sems kyis 'du byed smond pa myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs pa'i/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ rnam par shes pa smond pa myed ces
i15a4('bum): bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byor 'din byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sa
i15a5('bum): dpa' seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtogs te de mi dmigs so/ 
i15a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba ni mngon par 'du ba myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes
i15a7('bum): bar 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtags te de myi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhan po nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du byed mngon par 'du du bya ba myed ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyig
i15a8('bum): so rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtogs te de myi dmigs so// rab 'byor gang 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems
i15b1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe thams mkhas pa'o// rab 'byorarang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu mi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnamya pa bya
i15b2('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs dben zhes bya bar rdzogs te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba dben zhes bya bar shing rtogs
i15b3('bum): dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes dben zhes bya bar rtogs te de mi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes
i15b4('bum): zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rab 'byorang 'di ni byang chub sems da
i15b5('bum): dpa' seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
i15b6('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs myi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs te de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba rtag
i15b7('bum): pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes myi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
i15b8('bum): dang ldan pa yid la bya bas 'du byed myi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed da myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa myi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de
i16a1('bum): myi dmyigs su// rab 'byor 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab rje pa ra lang du pa dad pa la skyed pa thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byar gzhan yang byang chub
i16a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro la pyan pa la snang ba'i tshe/ u pa thams cad pa khye rang pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying la byangs gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog pa
i16a3('bum): tang myi dmigs pa'i// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa nag bar bang te de myi dmyig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa
i16a4('bum): ba yid la bya bas 'du shes sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog pa byed de de myi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ngas/ 'du byed sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog pa
i16a5('bum): byed de de mi dmyigs// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes par sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de mi myig so// rab 'byo reng byang chung chub ses dpa' sems
i16a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa laM spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i/ rab 'bye rang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas
i16a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bye bas gzugs bdag myed pa'i rnam zer rtog par byed de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la pi bas tshor ba bdag myed pa'i rnam pa
i16a8('bum): rtog par rtog par byed de de myi dmigs so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan po'i yid la bya bas 'du shes bdag med pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyad
i16b1('bum): bya'ang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed bad su'i rnam par rtog pa byed de mi dmyigs sar+b+ban rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying bya ste rnam par shes pa bdag myed pa'i rnam par dag
i16b2('bum): par byed de de ma dmigs so// rab 'byor nga 'dal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dngu
i16b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha long du phyinang pal spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid drang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs zhi pa'i rnam par dag pa byed dang mi dmigus// rnam pa thas
i16b4('bum): mkhyen pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba zhi pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmyigs so// rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes zhi ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de de
i16b5('bum): mi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byang zhi ma'i rnam med rtag par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i seng la bya bas rnaM
i16b6('bum): pa zha ba'i rnam par rtog par bde de de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sa dpa
i16b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen du dang ldan pa'i yod tu bas/ gzugs stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de mi rimigs so rnam pa thams cad mkhan
i16b8('bum): ldan pa yid bya bas ched pa stong pas rnam par rtog par byeng de de mi dmigs so// rnam thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa 'di la bya bas 'du shes stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de mi dmyigs sa
i17a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du bye skong ba'i rnam par rtogs byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa nyid dang ldan
i17a2('bum): yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa stong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed do de myi dmigaso// rab 'byorang 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spong pa'i
i17a3('bum): thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzug
i17a4('bum): mtshan ma myang ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de de mi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mtshan ma myang ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad
i17a5('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya bas 'du shes mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par rdeg par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed mtshan myed pa'i rnam pa
i17a6('bum): rdeg par byed de de mi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid bya bas rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de mi dmigaso// rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa
i17a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sbed pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byorarang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang po la spyod pa'i
i17a8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhand pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bos gzugs smon pa myed pa'i rnam pa ma rtog par bde de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba
i17b1('bum): smon pa med pa'i rnam par byed par myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes smon pa myong pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams
i17b2('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed smon pa myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa
i17b3('bum): smon pa myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de myi dmyigs se/ rab 'byo rang 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor
i17b4('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba ma
i17b5('bum): ba'i rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams
i17b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes mngon par 'du bye ba med par rnam par rtog par byed dang myi dmyigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid dang ldan pa yang la bya bas 'du byed mas
i17b7('bum): bar 'du bya ba myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmyig so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa mngon par/ 'du bya ba myed pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de myi
i17b8('bum): dmyigs so// rab 'byo rang 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spong ba'i tshe thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
i18a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmigs
i18a2('bum): so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa 'di dang ldan pa yid la bya bas tshor ba dben pa rnam par rtog par byed de nga myi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes dben
i18a3('bum): pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de myi dmyigs so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas pa 'du byed dben pa'i rtog bar byed de de myi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i18a4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de de mi dmyigs so// rab 'byorod 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la
i18a5('bum): spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// dum du gsum pa/ bam po gnyis pa'o// // rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar rtogs pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ sos
i18a6('bum): can thams cad la gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmyigs so// pa'i tshul gyis chos stond to// gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond to// gzugs bdag myed ces
i18a7('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i gyis chos ston to// gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te// gzugs stong zhes bya bar myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to// gzugs mtshan ma myed
i18a8('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stom pa/ gzugs sur po med ces bya bar de m+bi dmigs gis chos ston to// gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i dus
i18b1('bum): sa ston to/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar de la dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond to// tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond to// tshor sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs
i18b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond to// tshor ba bdag myed ces par de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond to// tshor bzhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos skyond to// tshor ba stong zhes bya bar
i18b3('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond to// tshor ba mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ste nad to// tshor ba smonod pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond to
i18b4('bum): ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond to// tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stonang to// 'du shes myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
i18b5('bum): gyis chos stond to// 'od shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond te/ 'du shes bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond to// 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar
i18b6('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond to// 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond te// 'du shes mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stonang do// 'dus
i18b7('bum): smond pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stonang ngo // 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond te/ 'du shes dben zhes bya bar myi dmyigs pa
i18b8('bum): tshul gyis chos stonang to// 'du byed myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ches stonang to// 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stend to// 'du byed bdag myed ces bya bar/ 
i19a1('bum): da suM dmyigs pa'i tshu gyis ston to// 'du bya ba ni zhes pabar dmyi dmyigs pa'i chus kyis chos song // 'du byad snang zhes bya ba mya dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston / 
i19a2('bum): 'du byang ma tshan ma myong ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i rlom gyis chos stong ngo // 'du byed sto nang pa myed ces bya bar dri myi dmigs pa'i nus gyis chos so dang // 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba mang
i19a3('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos gnod to// 'du byed dben nas bya ba ring dgrag so pa'i dris kyis chos stod to// rnam por shes pas dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis kyis ston te// rnam par nas
i19a4('bum): sngog sa la zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sbyin do do// ma pa po zhes pa ba gyi myeng zhes bya ba mu dmyigs pa'i tshus gyis chos sto te/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi
i19a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos stond // rnam par shes pa stong zhes ba~M Sha rA de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stonang ngo // rnom por shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stonang // 
i19a6('bum): rnam par shes pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sto nad to// rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bor de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to// rnam par she
i19a7('bum): pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond to// rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sprin po'i sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyi nang pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems
i19a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmyi 'jigs mya sdang skrag par myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nyan thos
i19b1('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang ldan pas gzugs gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan
i19b2('bum): pas gzugs gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de ni myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed de/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid lta byed dong / myi ldan pas gzugs gang bdag myed pa'i rnam
i19b3('bum): par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed de// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas/ gzugs gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
i19b4('bum): yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas gzugs gang stong pa'i rnam par yod la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
i19b5('bum): kyi yid la byed pa dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mtshan myed pa'i rnam pa yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas
i19b6('bum): gzugs gong smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yod la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bye ba dang myi ldan pas gzugs gang mngon par 'du bya ba
i19b7('bum): myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmigs pa'i tshul
i19b8('bum): gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas tshor ba gang myi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid
i20a1('bum): la bya ba dang mi ldan pa'i tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pa'i tshor ba gang bdag myed pa'i rna
i20a2('bum): par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas tshor ba
i20a3('bum): gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas tshor ba gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la
i20a4('bum): byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas tshor pa gang mtshan ma myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yod la bya ba dang mi ldan
i20a5('bum): tsher gang snga dang pa myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas tshor ba gang mngon par 'du ba pa myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de ma
i20a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya bo dang myi ldan pas tshor ba gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la bang ba de myi dmigs pa'i tshul yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid
i20a7('bum): la bya ba dang mi ldan pa'i 'du shes mi dmyigs rtag pa'i rnam par yid la bang ba de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la phreng ngo // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pa'i 'du shes gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par mid
i20a8('bum): la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la bye ba do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya pa dang mi ldan pas 'di shes gang bdag myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sa
i20b1('bum): rgyas kyi yang la bya ba dang ma ldan pas 'du shes gang na ba'i rnam par yang la byed par mya dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byang nga/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas 'du shes gang stong pa'i rnam par/ 
i20b2('bum): yid la byed pa de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yod la bya ba dang mi ldan pas 'du shes gang mtshan med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la bad
i20b3('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas 'du shes gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang / myi ldan
i20b4('bum): bas 'du shes gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed de myi dmigs po'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas 'du shes gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la
i20b5('bum): byed pa de myi dmyigs tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas 'du byed gang myi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang
i20b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas 'du byed gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa dang myi ldan pas 'du byed gang bdag myed
i20b7('bum): ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa'i de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas 'du byed gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la bya ba de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ 
i20b8('bum): na thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid lwa bya ba dang myi ldan pa'i yid la byed gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas 'du byed gang
i21a1('bum): mtshan mi spyong po'i rnam par yid la byang ba nga mya dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed de / 'anangs dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed gang smand pa myeng ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa
i21a2('bum): da mi dmims pa'i tshul gyis yod pa pad de// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas 'du byed gang mngon par 'du ba pa med pa'i rnam par yid la bde ba de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la
i21a3('bum): byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'di byedade gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba
i21a4('bum): dang myi ldan pas rnam par shes pa gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas rnam par shes pa gang sdug bsngal
i21a5('bum): rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas rnam par shes pa gang bdag myed pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
i21a6('bum): yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed dang myi ldan pa'i rnam par shes pa zhi gang zhig pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid
i21a7('bum): la bya ba dang myi ldan pas rnam par shes gang stong ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas rnam par shes pa gang mtshan
i21a8('bum): myed ci rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas rnam par shes pa gang smon pa myeng pa'i rnam par yid la bya ba de mi dmyigs tsa
i21b1('bum): tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas rnam par shes pa gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par shes pa gang mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i yid la byed pa de myi dmyig
i21b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang myi ldan pas rnam par shes pa gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// rab 'byor nga 'di ni bya
i21b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyams pa myed pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
i21b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag la myi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag myed pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i
i21b5('bum): rnam pa dang / mtshan myed pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed pa dang / bzod pa dang mos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod
i21b6('bum): ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par myi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir
i21b7('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs myi rtag pa'i ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzug
i21b8('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams
i22a1('bum): cad mkhyen rnapa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu reg go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs stong
i22a2('bum): zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya bas gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog gis/ 
i22a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs smond pa med ces bya ba'i de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhand pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs
i22a4('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces pa dam de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhye pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs dang / zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ 
i22a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba sdug
i22a6('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtag go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams
i22a7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyidi dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa
i22a8('bum): tshul gis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
i22b1('bum): bya bas tshor ba smin pa myed ces bya bur de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul grwa/ 
i22b2('bum): rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du
i22b3('bum): shes myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gos rab tu rtog go
i22b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes zhi zhes bya
i22b5('bum): dekyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i snyid la bya bas 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mya dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
i22b6('bum): ba'i yid la bya bas 'du shes mtshan myed pas bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes smond pa myed ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul
i22b7('bum): gis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu rtog go// rnam po thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan
i22b8('bum): srings byabasu 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de ma dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu chog gi// rnam pa thams cad ma khyed pa nyid 'ang ldan po'i 'di sa bya shes 'du byed kyi/ gces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu
i23a1('bum): rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
i23a2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs
i23a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba bas 'du byed steng zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 
i23a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rub tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed smon pa myed ces bya bar de
i23a5('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye bas 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gos rab tu rtog go// rnam pa
i23a6('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed dben zhes bya bar mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'arnam par shes pa
i23a7('bum): myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog ge// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu rtog
i23a8('bum): go rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces pa bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
i23b1('bum): la bya bas rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i
i23b2('bum): tshul gis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa mtshan med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa
i23b3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes smond pa med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa mngon
i23b4('bum): bar 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu
i23b5('bum): rtog go// de ltar de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas myi rtong zhing / brtson 'grus myi 'dor ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
i23b6('bum): phyi nad pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa'i seMs dpa' chen po de myi 'jigs myi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byorarang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin
i23b7('bum): ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu rtog cing / nyan thos dang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang myi rga
i23b8('bum): ba'i chos de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su gyur pa ba gzhan gi skabs myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
i24a1('bum): dang ldan pa'i sed la bya bas gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub
i24a2('bum): kI lags su gyur ba gzhan gi ge myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spong ba'i tshe/ na ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya bas
i24a3('bum): gzugs bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa yid la bya ba dang / myi dge pa de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gegasu 'gyur ba gzhan kau go myi
i24a4('bum): 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i
i24a5('bum): gos rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegasu 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
i24a6('bum): rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs stong zhes bya bar de myi dmigaso ba'i tshul gis rtog zhing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid
i24a7('bum): la bya ba dang / myi dag pa de ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa' gegasu 'gyur ba gzhan gi ge myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thos
i24a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mtshan myed ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge slob de ma yin pa byang chub kyi
i24b1('bum): gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyi nad pa la spod pa'i tshe ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzug
i24b2('bum): smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba'i de ma yin pa byang chub gi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang
i24b3('bum): chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar myi dmyigs pa'i
i24b4('bum): tshul gis rtog cing / nyan smos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' skyes
i24b5('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam ma rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs dben zhes bya bA ra de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rab tu rtog cing / 
i24b6('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gags su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
i24b7('bum): tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la
i24b8('bum): bya ba dang / myi dge bu de myi yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
i25a1('bum): pa nyud dang ldan pa yid la bya bas tshor sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang
i25a2('bum): chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go myi 'byed dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
i25a3('bum): yid la bya bas tshor ba bdag ces bya bar myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gi go
i25a4('bum): myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmig

i25a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
i25a7('bum): tshul gis rtog cing nyan thos dang sa rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / myi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegasu 'gyur ba de gzhan gi go myi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen

i28b8('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bos rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtogs te/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa nyid ma yin go/ gzugs kyang stong pa nyid de/ stong pa
i29a1('bum): nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ma yin gyi/ tshem ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa nyid ma yin
i29a2('bum): du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa
i29a3('bum): nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin no// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// myig gi stong pa nyid kyis myig stong pa ma yin gyi/ myig nyid kyang stong pa nyid de/ stong pa
i29a4('bum): nyid kyang mig go// rna ba'i rnam stong pa nyid kyis rna ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong nyin kyang rna ba'o// sna'i stong pa nyid kyis sna stong pa nyid ma yin gyi/ sna'i nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
i29a5('bum): sna'o// lce'i stong pa nyid kyis lce stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'o// lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lus stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid de// stong pa nyid kyang lus so// yid kyi stong
i29a6('bum): nyid kyis yid kyi stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid de kyang yid do// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so
i29a7('bum): sna'i stong pa nyid kyis sgra stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa/ nyid kyang sgo'o// dri'i stong pa nyid kyis dri'i stong pa ma yin gyi/ de nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang de'o// ro'i stong pa nyid kyis ro stong
i29b1('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos so// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong de nyid kyis myig gi rnam par shes de stong pa ma yin gyi/ myig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid myig gi rnam
i29b2('bum): shes pa/ na d+ha'i rnam par shes pa'i stong panyid kyis rna ba'i rnam shes ma med gi/ rdo rje'-i rdo 'i shes pa nyid kyang slong ba nyid nga// song ba nyid kyang rna bar shes pa'o// sna'i rnam par shes/
