i29b4('bum): ba'i slong ba nyid kyis susbyin du shes pa slong ba na gi/ skye rnam pa grus kyang snang ba nyid do/ slong ba rnying rnam par / sus
i29b5('bum): rnam par shes pa'i sto pa nyid kyis lus kyi rnamed par shes pa stong pa mA yAni gI A lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shi ba'o// yad
i29b6('bum): rna bar shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi rno bar shes pa stong bA ma srin gi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid de// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes po// myig gi 'dus / 
i29b7('bum): ba'i slong pa nyid gis myig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gi/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang myig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'das te rig pa'i stong pa nyid
i29b8('bum): kyis rna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong yang ma yin pa rna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang spang ba nyid// stong pa nyid kyang rna'i 'dus te reg pa'i/ sI'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sA'i'i 'dus
i30a1('bum): te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'das te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid kyis lha'i 'dus te reg rtsa stob yin gyi
i30a2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid dang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid gis lus kyis 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid
i30a3('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg bla ma yin gi yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
i30a4('bum): kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i tshe nad kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gi/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gis
i30a5('bum): tsho ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'o// rna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyu nad kyis car
i30a6('bum): pa ma yin pa/ rna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong po nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang na'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshong pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshong ba'i stong pa nyid kyi sku
i30a7('bum): 'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshad sdong ba ma yin gi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i ta nad kyis tshor bla stong pa nyid do// stong ba nyid kyang sA'i 'dus te ra ba'i/ rkye nad kyis tshwa bo'o// lce'i 'dus te reg bi N+ya
i30a8('bum): kyis tsho ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rte na gis tshor ba stod pa yin go/ ra 'dres te reg pa'i tshe nad kyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i tshon
i30b1('bum): kyis tshor ba'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'argya nad kyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gyis/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba stong ba ma yin ga/ lus gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gis tshor ba nyid kyang
i30b2('bum): stong ba nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus gi 'dus te reg pa'i dbye nad kyis thong ba'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gos tshang ba'i sto ba nyid kyis/ yid gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nang gis tshor ba spong ba yin pa/ 
i30b3('bum): yang gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyu nad kyis tshor ba'o// sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyi sa'i khas stong pa ma yin gi/ sa'i
i30b4('bum): khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid kyi/ stong pa nyid dang sa'i khas so// nu'i khas gi stong pa nyid kyis chu'i khaMs stong ba ma yin gi/ chu'i 'khams nyid kyang stong ba nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khas so// mye'i khas
i30b5('bum): kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ mye'i khams spong ba ma yon gi/ me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mye'i khams so// rlung gi khas kyi stong pa nyid gis rlung gi cha khrims stong pa ma yin gau rlung gi/ 
i30b6('bum): khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so// nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gyis nam mkha'i khas stong pa ma yin gi/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa
i30b7('bum): nyid kyang nam mkha'i khas so// rnam par shes pa'i khas kyi stong pa nyid gis rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa ma yin hU~M/ rnam par shes nga'i khams nyid kyang snang bu nyid do// spong ba nyid kyang dza/ 
i30b8('bum): pa'i khams so// ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis ma rig pa stong pa ma yin gi/ ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong sgyu nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ 'du byed gi stong pa nyid gis 'du byed stong pa ma yin gi
i31a1('bum): 'dra bang nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gi/ rnamapar shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par
i31a2('bum): shes pa'o// mying dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis mying dang gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ nas mying dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mying dang gzugasaso// skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid kyis
i31a3('bum): skye mched drug stong pa ma yin gyi/ skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid de// stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go// reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis reg pa stong pa nyid pa ma yin gyi/ reg pa stong nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o/ 
i31a4('bum): tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// sred pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sred pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sred
i31a5('bum): pa'o// len pa'i stong pa nyid kyis len pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa'i stong pa nyid kyis srid pa ma yin gi/ srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid de/ stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o// skye ba'i
i31a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis skye ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o// rga shi'i stong pa nyid kyis shi stong pa ma yin gyi/ rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinang
i31a7('bum): pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol da tu phyi nad pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i stong pa nyid
i31a8('bum): kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa nyi ma yin gyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'/ bzang ba'i pha rol tu phyind pa'i stong pa nyid kyis
i31b1('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi nabazod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis brtson 'tshegrus
i31b2('bum): kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis bsam
i31b3('bum): gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i stong pa nyid kyis
i31b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ma yin gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis nang stong pa ma yin gyi/ nang stong pa
i31b5('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do// phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis phyi stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do// phyi nang gi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa
i31b6('bum): nyid kyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid de/ stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid de/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong ma yin gyi/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
i31b7('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do// chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis chen po stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do// don dam pa stong
i31b8('bum): nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis don dam stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ don dam stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid ma yin
i32a1('bum): gyi ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid de/ stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi steng pa nyid kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid nga
i32a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das
i32a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid do// thog ma dang tha med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma gyi/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa nyid do/ 
i32a4('bum): dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi sku dro bla med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi dri rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ 
i32a5('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis ches thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos thams ca stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
i32a6('bum): kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// 
i32a7('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyimyi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis dngos pa
i32a8('bum): myed pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngos nying stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa dang nyi ma man gyi paza nyid spong ba dang
i32b1('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bya bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dngos pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong
i32b2('bum): pa nyid kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams snong ska ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar
i32b3('bum): gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par spong ba stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yang dag par spong po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa'i
i32b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis rdzu 'phral gi rkangapa pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po'i stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dbang po nyid kyang stong
i32b5('bum): pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stob pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis stobs rnams stong pa nyid ma yin gyi/ stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag gi stong pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi
i32b6('bum): yan lag rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa
i32b7('bum): ma yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis stong pa nyid kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong
i32b8('bum): ma yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan ston pa nyid kyis bsam gtan rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang bsam
i33a1('bum): rnams so// tshad myed pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis tshad myed pa rnams stong pa nyid ma yin gyi/ tshad med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang tshad med rnams so// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug
i33a2('bum): kyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms pa rnams so// rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyi
i33a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis rnams par tha rad pa brgyad stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par tha rad pa brgyad kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par tha rad pa rnams so// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid kyis mthar
i33a4('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma sbyin gyi/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa
i33a5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smond pa med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par tha rad ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan myed pa dang smond pa myed pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon
i33a6('bum): pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan med pa dang smon pa myed pa'o// mngon par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mngon par shes pa nyi
i33a7('bum): stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stong pa nyid kyis ting nge 'dzind rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ ting nge 'dzind nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzind rnams
i33a8('bum): gzungs kyi sgo'i stong pa nyid kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa ma yin ge/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis de ba'i
i33b1('bum): po'i stobs rnams stong ba ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs rnams kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// myi 'jigs pa'i spong ba nyid kyis myi 'jigs pa rnams steng bya
i33b2('bum): gi m+b+hi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang myi 'jigs pa rnams so// seMs snang dag par rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sa so yang dag par rig pa ni
i33b3('bum): pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid kyis snying rje chen po slong ba ma yin gyi/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// sangs
i33b4('bum): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam
i33b5('bum): rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ste/ rab 'byor de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i thabs ma
i33b6('bum): ba'o// thabs mkhas pa de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bstan pa 'di thos myi 'jigs myi sdang myi 'asgag par myi 'gyur ro// dum bu gsum pa// bam po gsum pa'o// 
i33b7('bum): rab 'byor da kyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gis yongasu zin pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i bstand pa 'di thos na myi 'jigs myi sdang
i33b8('bum): skrag par myi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs mi
i34a1('bum): rtag ces bya bar dmyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stod cing / dge ba rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gdags lngar/ nyam thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
i34a2('bum): yong su sngor gyi 'jug go// gang de la char ba mi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos seMn cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa
i34a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes mau rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs kyi ba'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
i34a4('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed myi rtag ces bya bar da myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad maphye
i34a5('bum): pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam pa cad la dad par shes pa myi rtag ces bya ba med myi myigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
i34a6('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'is/ kau rab 'byor nga 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bsre
i34a7('bum): gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen no/ gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba
i34a8('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams pad ma 'a dang pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'angs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ring myi dmyigs pa'i tshul ga po
i34b1('bum): don cing dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'thun pa'o// de la 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyig
i34b2('bum): nga'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge bar rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed su
i34b3('bum): zhes bya bar mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// 
i34b4('bum): gang de la rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
i34b5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul
i34b6('bum): gis chos ston cing / dge ba'o rtsab thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs
i34b7('bum): pa'i tshul gis chos stonang to// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes bdag
i34b8('bum): myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i na ca nams cad kyang rnam te thams cad mkhyed pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am rangs sa rgyas kyis yongasu sngor myi 'jug par
i35a1('bum): gang de la 'du byed bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi srar
i35a2('bum): yongs su sngar mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ches stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos
i35a3('bum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i dge pa'i bshes gnyen ni// gang de la gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
i35a4('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngar mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor bzhi zhes bya bar de myi dmigs
i35a5('bum): nga'i tshul gis ches stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sgor yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes zhi zhes bya ba
i35a6('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid pa ma rtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi saR+sha yong su sder mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de myi
i35a7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi
i35a8('bum): pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang
i35b1('bum): chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs stong zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
i35b2('bum): mi rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
i35b3('bum): mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
i35b4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
i35b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
i35b6('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid de ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub ses dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshe
i35b7('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mtshan med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
i35b8('bum): sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gal te tshor mtshan myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
i36a1('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa
i36a2('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed mtshan myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ma rtogs par nyan
i36a3('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i36a4('bum): pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs smon pa med
i36a5('bum): ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor/ 
i36a6('bum): ba smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gris chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug
i36a7('bum): pa'o// gang de la 'du shes smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
i36a8('bum): yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
i36b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sder myi 'jug pa'o// da gang de la rnam par shes pa smin pa med ces bya bar mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
i36b2('bum): rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mngon par
i36b3('bum): 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad male nad pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor mi
i36b4('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa bu thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
i36b5('bum): su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa
i36b6('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i36b7('bum): pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
i36b8('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sos dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
i37a1('bum): bshes gnyen no/ gang de la gzugs dang na zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs pa nyan thos kyis
i37a2('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am ra
i37a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sor yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshal gis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi
i37a4('bum): sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs pa/ 
i37a5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dan/ 
i37a6('bum): sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya ni/ gang de la myig rtag ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
i37a7('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba mya rtag ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa
i37a8('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sa song su sngor gyi 'jug pa'i// gcod la sa myi rtag ces bya ba ra myi dmyigs pa'i tshun gyis ston cog/ dge ba'i ma thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs pa nyan thos rgyas la
i37b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan
i37b2('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtog
i37b3('bum): bar nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis sa chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid ma
i37b4('bum): rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor du gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi

i37b7('bum): de la sna sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa/ 
i37b8('bum): gang de la lce sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug
i38a1('bum): pa'i gang la lus sdug sngal nas bA ba rang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis son cing/ dge ba'i ma tha thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par can thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis ma du
i38a2('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos sbyor cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
i38a3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor nga yang byang chub sems dpa' sermas dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i shes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston ci
i38a4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs myi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la rna ba bdag med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis ches ston
i38a5('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yi chos yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna bdag myed ces
i38a6('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de lo lce bdag
i38a7('bum): myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gris chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas sar sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus
i38a8('bum): 'odog byed ces bya za kyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing/ dge ba'ing pa thams cad kyang rnam thams pa mkhyen pa nyid sa rtogs pa na thos kyis 'ama'angs ma rgyas kyisams su brjo kyi jun
i38b1('bum): gang de la yid bdag myed ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang bya sangs rgyas kyi sar yang su ma jug
i38b2('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
i38b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thos
i38b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna zhi zhes bya bar myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i38b5('bum): pa nyid mi rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas sar yongasu bsngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'u zhi zhes mi bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa
i38b6('bum): pa nyid martags par nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi yong su sngor mo 'jug pa'o// gdel lus pa ni zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas ches sngon cing dge ba'i rtsa ba'i thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyed
i38b7('bum): pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sor yongasu bsngor myi 'jug pa'o/ de/ gang de la yid 'i zhes bya ba de myi dmyigs
i38b8('bum): tshul gos ston cig dge ba'i ma thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyanga'i yangasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bzhes
i39a1('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la myig steng zhes bya ba de dmyigs pa'i tshul gos chos ste nad tsang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkha nad pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gos 'am rang sangs rgas ga sar yongs
i39a2('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba steng zhes bya ba 'am de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis ches stond cing dge ba'i sde ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am
i39a3('bum): sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'i/ gang de la sna stong zhes bya bar de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ches stond cing dge ba'i rung ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan
i39a4('bum): thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gau sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la l-I sdang zhes bye bar de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i39a5('bum): pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos go sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sor yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus stong zhes bya bar de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
i39a6('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyon thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid steng zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing
i39a7('bum): dge ba'i sra ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sas/ 
i39a8('bum): dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la myig mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos stodang cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'a
i39b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas ga sar yongs su sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdza ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de dmyigs pa'i ts+tsha lA sa chos sgond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gis
i39b2('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna mtshan ma myed ce sa khya b.raro chad dmyigs pa'i tshul gi rjes ste nad cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
i39b3('bum): ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'i/ gang de la lce mtshon ma myed ces bya bar de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i sra ba thams cad kyang rna ba zhes
i39b4('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas go sar yongs su sngar myi 'jug pa'i// gang de lus mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ches stond cing dge ba'i skye ba thams cad kyang
i39b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad ma mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sur yongs su sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos sngond cing
i39b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar/ yongs su sbyor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i dge
i39b7('bum): ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la myig smin pa med ces bya bar dri dmyigs pa'i tshul gis stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang
i39b8('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba spong pa myed ces bya bar de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i sra ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par/ 
i40a1('bum): can thos gas 'am rang sangs rgyas gsar yongasu sngar myi 'dug par/ gang de la sa sngon brgyad ces bya bar dadamyigs tha tshul gis chos ston cing dag pa'i pa thams cad kyang rnam mas
i40a2('bum): mkhye da pa nying mtshugs par nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas gser yongs su sngar mo 'dug da'o// gang dal lce smod pa rgyad pos bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba
i40a3('bum): gad pa thams cad ma khyen pa 'ang mnags par can thos gis 'am rang sangs rgyas gis ri yongs su srir gyi 'gyur bar/ gang de la sus snyan pa skyed pas bya bar de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / 
i40a4('bum): dge ba'i sra ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gos 'am rang sangs rgyas gsar yongs su sngor ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid smon pa myed ces bya ba
i40a5('bum): ba myi myigs pa'i tshul gis chos srin cing / dag ba ba ma rnam thasems cadas 'ad patshad ma rtogs pa thos gis 'am 'angasangs rgyas giseM mas su kyang rgya
i40a6('bum): pa/ bo 'byor nga gan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba shes gtad na/ gang de la myig mngon par 'du byed ces bya bar de migs pa'i tshul gas chos sbyin cing na
i40a7('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas ga sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar chas
i40a8('bum): stond par cing dge ba'i sra ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar chos
i40b1('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend bya nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sder myi 'jug
i40b2('bum): ba'o/ gang de la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i smra ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs
i40b3('bum): rgyas gi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar chad myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyer
i40b4('bum): pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid las su myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i sra ba sa ces
i40b5('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes
i40b6('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la myig dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyenod pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs
i40b7('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyis
i40b8('bum): rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gong de la sna dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ston da cing dge ba'i sra ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rtogs
i41a1('bum): par nyan thos ga sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce dben zhes bya bar ra mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ches ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa
i41a2('bum): nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dmyigs pa'i
i41a3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
i41a4('bum): gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i skye ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
i41a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs myi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rje pa thams cad mkhyen
i41a6('bum): 'di ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
i41a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing
i41a8('bum): dge ba'i sra ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gyi sar yongs su stor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro rtag ces bya bar de dmyigs pa'i tshul
i41b1('bum): gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg myi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i
i41b2('bum): tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos myi rtag
i41b3('bum): ces bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i smra ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'i rab
i41b4('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
i41b5('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la smre sdug sngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos snya
i41b6('bum): cing / dge ba'i sra ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gri sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sder myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
i41b7('bum): myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
i41b8('bum): ro sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// 
i42a1('bum): gang de la reg sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
i42a2('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i slu ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am
i42a3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul/ 
i42a4('bum): gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug go/ gang de la sgra bdag ces bya ba
i42a5('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang
i42a6('bum): la dri bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor
i42a7('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro bdag ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs
i42a8('bum): rgyas gau sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par nyan
i42b1('bum): thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos bdag myed ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i42b2('bum): ba nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs
i42b3('bum): zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang
i42b4('bum): de laHsgra zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston ciyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor ma 'jug
i42b5('bum): pa'o// gang de la dri zhi zhes bya ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
i42b6('bum): kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa'i rang
i42b7('bum): sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos skond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am
i42b8('bum): rang sangs rgyas gi sar yong su sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ches zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi bye rang
i43a1('bum): sa sa gsar yongs su sngang la 'jug par/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag pa'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs nas bya bar de myi dmyigs
i43a2('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos ldan cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen du pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am 'ang bsangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'i/ gang de la sgra stong zhes bya ba
i43a3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stonang par myi 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos go sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngor ma 'jug pa'o// 
i43a4('bum): gang de la dri steng zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos go sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yengasu sngor
i43a5('bum): mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas ches stenang cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang rasangs
i43a6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhye dad pa nyid ma rtogs par
i43a7('bum): zas gas 'am rang sangs rgyas go sar yang su snga myi 'dug pa'o// rab 'byor gnan yang ba chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bzhes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs ma meng ces bya bar
i43a8('bum): la gzugs mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'arang sangs rgyas kyi sar yos
i43b1('bum): sngor myi 'jugs pa'o// gang de la sgra mtshan ma med ces sa bya bar de myi dmyigs sa pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i sra ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gis
i43b2('bum): sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sder myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i43b3('bum): pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro mtshan ma myed ces bya bar ngo mya dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
i43b4('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos go sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ches
i43b5('bum): sde nad cing / dge ba'i sra ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos mtshan ma med ces
i43b6('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ste nad cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// 
i43b7('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa/ 
i43b8('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra smon pa med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi/ 
i44a1('bum): chos stend cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri smin pa myed ces
i44a2('bum): bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngar mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro
i44a3('bum): smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug
i44a4('bum): gang de la reg smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi slar yongasu sngor
i44a5('bum): 'jug pa'o gang de la chos smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rdzogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi
i44a6('bum): sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
i44a7('bum): da cing/ dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gis 'am rang sangs rgyas go sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang dol sgo mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces
i44a8('bum): bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// ga la dri mdzad
i44b1('bum): par 'du ba myed ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gas chos snyan cing ste dag rtsa ba thams cad gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rdegs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor mo 'jug
i44b2('bum): gang de la ro mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gas chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ya
i44b3('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg mngon par 'du bya ba na myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos
i44b4('bum): kyi so 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug go// gad de la chos mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i44b5('bum): pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rabo 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs
i44b6('bum): dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid mi rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'i// 
i44b7('bum): gang de la sgra dben zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ste nad cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// 
i44b8('bum): gang de la dri dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gi chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yong su sngar mi 'jug
i45a1('bum): gang de la ra dngan zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gos chos sngon tsang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen po nyid ma rdzogs par nyan thos gis 'am rang sangs rgyas gsar yong su sngar myi 'jug
i45a2('bum): ba'o// gang de la reg dben zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gos chos stend cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyedad pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sa
i45a3('bum): yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos dben zhes bya bar ngo mya dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang
i45a4('bum): sangs rgyas gi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dbyi
i45a5('bum): pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par
i45a6('bum): shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs snga
i45a7('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ches stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
i45a8('bum): rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang la lci'i rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kya
i45b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis
i45b2('bum): chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos go sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sder mi 'jig pa'o// gang de la yong gi rnam par shes
i45b3('bum): sbyin ga ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i nul gis chos snyan cing dag pa'i na thams ca kyang rnam pa thams cadas khyeng ba nyid ma chogs par nyin thos gos 'am 'ang sangs rgyas kyisar ma su
i45b4('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang nga la myig gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas
i45b5('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal
i45b6('bum): zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond par myi 'gyur ro// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gri sar yongasu sngor gyi 'jug pa
i45b7('bum): gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
i45b8('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rtogs
i46a1('bum): rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gsar yongasu sngor mu 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos snyand cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
i46a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas go sar yongs su sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ying gi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston
i46a3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtags par nyan thos ga sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
i46a4('bum): po dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshal gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi
i46a5('bum): sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i46a6('bum): pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sA'i/ rnam par shes pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
i46a7('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos
i46a8('bum): stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am reka sangs rgyas gi sar// yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus go rnam par shes pa bdag med ces
i46b1('bum): shes sa byang ba'i bya ma pa kyi phyogasas su tsha sa mams mas nas lams pa stan sa dgas pa pa
i46b2('bum): sgogs pa'i rnam nas tshas ldan cing / dge ba'i rgya pa thams cad kyang rnam pa tham yang ma khyen pa nyid martogs can tan thos gis 'as sangs rgyas gas sa su sngor gyi 'jug pa'o// gnas
i46b3('bum): par shes pa ni zhes bya ba'am myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos skyen cing dge ba'i rtsa bu thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas ga sar yo su sngar myi 'dug/ 
i46b4('bum): sa rnas pa gas pa mnas bya myong gas pa sa na ma / dag pa ni ma kya mal bas sa cad da nyid shegs pa ga sa
i46b5('bum): sar yongs su sur myi 'dug pa'o/ gang des kyi rnam par rnas pa nas bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rgyas ston pang dge ba byesems pad kyang rnam pa thamasas pakhyen pa nyid brdzogs par da sa
i46b6('bum): sa'am rang sangs rgyas gis yong su sngar mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus go rnam po gos bzhi zhes bya bar dpyi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston pang dag pa'i rtsa bams cad kyang ma pa thamasapang matsun pa'adas rje
i47a1('bum): par nyan thos go sa 'am 'ang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la yang gi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
i47a2('bum): nga mkhye na pa 'ing martogs pa khan thos gis 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor mi 'dug go// rab 'bar gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che cing dge ba'i bcas gzhan ni/ gang de la phyag sa
i47a3('bum): rnam par shes pa steng zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul spos chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// 
i47a4('bum): gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes/ bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs so// rami
i47a5('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos ge sa 'am rang / sangs
i47a6('bum): rgyas ka sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgor rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par
i47a7('bum): nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu stor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gri chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
i47a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid mi rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sder myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid gi rnam par shes pa steng zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
i47b1('bum): thams cas kyang rnam pa thams cad ma khyem pa 'ang ma rdzogs par nyan zas go sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngar ma 'jug pa'o// nyinas rab 'byung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i 'anas
i47b2('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs
i47b3('bum): rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rigs par nyan thos gi sa 'am ra
i47b4('bum): sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stonang cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
i47b5('bum): rtogs par nyan thos gos 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngar myi 'dug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa mtshan me me da ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis rjes ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
i47b6('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus gi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul
i47b7('bum): gis chos ston cing kyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos/ gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'i// gang de la yid gi rje bar
i47b8('bum): shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi ts+tshed ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor mi 'dug
i48a1('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stand cing
i48a2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhand pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa'i rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de myi
i48a3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o/ 
i48a4('bum): gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos go sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
i48a5('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gris chos ste nad cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs
i48a6('bum): par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus gi rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
i48a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos go sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sur myi 'jug pa'i gang de la ying gi rnam par shes pa smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stan
i48a8('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rtogs par nyan thos go sa 'am// rang sangs rgyas gi sar yang su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sas dpa
i48b1('bum): pho'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshal gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs
i48b2('bum): par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /

i48b4('bum): chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor mi 'dzag pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du ba
i48b5('bum): ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// 
i48b6('bum): gang la lus gi rnam por shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gis

i48b8('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid me rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngon myi 'dug po'o// rab 'byor gzhon yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge pa'i
i49a1('bum): gnyer ri gang de la myig gi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am
i49a2('bum): sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid

i49a4('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa dpon zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos
i49a5('bum): sngond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gis 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus gi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar
i49a6('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rdegs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi ar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid gi rnam
i49a7('bum): par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de myo dmyigs pa'i tshul gis/ chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// 
i49a8('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i baches ni/ gang nga la myig gi 'dus te reg pa mye rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
i49b1('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba

i49b3('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid mi rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa myi rtag ces bya bar de mi dbyigs
i49b4('bum): pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'i rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus gi 'dus te reg pa myi rtog ces
i49b5('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshal gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad kyang mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
i49b6('bum): de la yid gi 'dus te reg pa myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar
i49b7('bum): yang su stor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bzhes gnyen ni/ gang de la phyag gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang ma dmyigs pa'i tshul gas
i49b8('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma tshogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar longasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de pe rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
i50a1('bum): des phyi'i lus dachog pa sug bsngal zhes bya bar dimyi dgas pa'i tshul gis nas stor cing dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mardzogs par shad thos gis 'am rang sa ma rgyas gi sems su
i50a2('bum): myi lug+sa tshe/ gang la rjes kyi lus te rig pa sdug bdal zhes bya bar de myi migs pa'i tshul gis chos mapa dge ba'i pa tha ni rnam pa thams sang mkhyen pa nyid ma dgas par nan thos gis 'am tha / 
i50a3('bum): kyi sar song su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ming gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa zas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma tshogs par

i50a5('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond du / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang
i50a6('bum): larna ba'i 'dus te reg pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigos pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gis ma yongasu
i50b1('bum): myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa bdag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stonod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang /

i50b3('bum): gtogs par nyan thos go sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor mi 'jug/ gang de la lus gi 'dus te rig pa bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
