i73a5('bum): stond cing / dge ba'i sra ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sa yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba
i73a6('bum): myad ces bya ba de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi' jug pa'o// rab 'byor/ 
i73a7('bum): gzhan na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i73a8('bum): pa nyid rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor mi 'dzag pa'i// gang de la pha steng pa nyid me ben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshal gis ches stonod cing / dge ba'i sra ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thos
i73b1('bum): sa pa nyid pa rtogs pa stan thos smos ngas sa rgyas gsangs su su ma dug pa'o// gad sa phyi nga nying ma chags par rgan thos mal 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sa pong su sngar gyi 'jug pa'o// rnan
i73b2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyigyis chos ston
i73b3('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yo rangs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmigs
i73b4('bum): pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhe
i73b5('bum): bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas
i73b6('bum): stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i sra ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa sa'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug
i73b7('bum): gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs
i73b8('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de ma dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan
i74a1('bum): thams sadas nyi dang rigs pa mas gas 'di 'angasas rgyas gsangs su sa mi 'dug / sa dang bskyed pa snang banyid dbem nas bya ba dam dmigs pa du la gas rnam sa tshang dag pa ma sa
i74a2('bum): rnam pa thams bad da pas ma gas pa can thos gos la ra sa rgyas gise sems su kyi gdun / gang des rang bani stong ba nyid dngan zhes bya par des dmyigs pa'i rgyal gas rnam nan cing / 
i74a3('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi nusar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de ma dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stor ci
i74a4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang da labang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul
i74a5('bum): gas chos san cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying ma rtags par nyan thos gis 'ab rang sangs rgyas gis pa ya su sngor mi 'jug pa'i gang de la myi myigs pa gang pa nyid cen zhes byab
i74a6('bum): dbyi byugs pa dul gas mas su pa dge ba'i bya bams cad kyang ba thangs tha ma khyen pa 'dam rigs papa can thos gis 'am nga sangs rgyas gosar yang su sar gyi 'dug pa ga gang des pas sring ba ma
i74a7('bum): sa ma khyab ba cum ma mas gas pa la kyi gas sa sa kyis
i74b1('bum): pa gan su nyid gag ma byas gas la sa margyas gas ngasu su kyi 'dug
i74b2('bum): sa pa skyed pa'ing po 'di snang pa 'idang kyis nas bla ga tshogs po nas gos kyis sto mau dge sa pa spyong kyi rnam rnamams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rdzogs par tan thos gis 'am rang sangs rgyas ma
i74b3('bum): yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po dge 'a'i bshes gnyen ni na gang de la dran pa che bar bzhag pa rnams mi nAg ces bya 'i de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos
i74b4('bum): cing / dag pa'i rtsa pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnam sdug sngal zhes bya bar de mag
i74b5('bum): pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar bdag pa rdzas
i74b6('bum): bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshal gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang
i74b7('bum): de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gisar yang
i74b8('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de ma dran panye bar bzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chog ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rim po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gdogs par can thos gas
i75a1('bum): sa yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar dmyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gos chos ston cing dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhye
i75a2('bum): dem rtogs pa nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gisar yongasu sngor myi 'dug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams smon pa med ces pa pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gas chos san cing / rig
i75a3('bum): rtsa bathams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi so 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngan pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba
i75a4('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ste nad cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams nyid mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang
i75a5('bum): de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmyags pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs
i75a6('bum): rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sgom pa'i phyir nga myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gI chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
i75a7('bum): rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thas
i75a8('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi slar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par sbeng ba rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar da mi dmyigs pa'i
i75b1('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi slar yongs su sngor myi 'jug po'o/ gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag myed
i75b2('bum): ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'i/ gang de la yang / 
i75b3('bum): dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bya bar de ma dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu
i75b4('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa
i75b5('bum): yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshal gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par
i75b6('bum): par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ches ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
i75b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos go sa 'am 'ang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i
i75b8('bum): tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la yang dag par sna
i76a1('bum): dper zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa pa nyid ma rtogs pa nyan thos go sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug
i76a2('bum): gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams skem pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gas
i76a3('bum): yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// / bam po// / gang de la rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thas
i76a4('bum): mkhyend pa nyid me rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sngar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdza 'dzu/ la gi rkang pa rnams snga ga sngal zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i
i76a5('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyin thos go sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis / yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gabade la rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar da
i76a6('bum): byams pa skyes mas ba tsun pa nyid sa dgas par nyan nas seMs sa rungs sa rgyas gos mang su par 'dug / ngas rje 'phrul gdang ba rnams nanas bya ma mam
i76a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rna pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gis 'am sangs rgyas gi sar yongs ser mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdza 'phral gi rkang pa rnams
i76a8('bum): stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni ma rtogs par nyan thos gis 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o
i76b1('bum): stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yengs sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdza
i76b2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos sngon cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos go sa 'am rang sangs rgyas ni
i76b3('bum): ser yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams smon pa myed ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par
i76b4('bum): nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sa 'am yongs sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams mngo/ na par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos sten cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
i76b5('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos go sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdza 'phral gi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
i76b6('bum): tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sa re yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gi rkang
i76b7('bum): sgom pa'i phyir de dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'amag rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sI re mi 'jug pa'o// gang
i76b8('bum): dbang po rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa tha mas cad mkhyen pa sngon dam rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs
i77a1('bum): sngar ma 'jug pa'o/ gang de la dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas chos sten cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtags par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang
i77a2('bum): sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams bdag med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan
i77a3('bum): thos gi sa 'am 'ang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing // dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs
i77a4('bum): par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sor yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshal gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mikhan pa nyid
i77a5('bum): ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas ga sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshal gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnams
i77a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de dbang po rnams smon pa myong ces bya bar ngo myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
i77a7('bum): cang kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rdzogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yangs sngar phyi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mya dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos snga
i77a8('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rna pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am ring sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos
i77b1('bum): stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gri sa 'am rang sangs rgyas rgya gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams sgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul/ 
i77b2('bum): rgya gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas go sar yongs sngar myi 'jug pa'o na gang de la dbang po rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de
i77b3('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshal gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sor myi 'dzag pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams
i77b4('bum): sdug bsal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshal gis chos smon cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gis 'am rang sangs rgyas gri sar yongs sor mi 'dzag pa'i
i77b5('bum): gang de la stobs rnams bdag myed ces bya bar nga myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi zas 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug
i77b6('bum): gang de la stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar ngo myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug rje
i77b7('bum): gang de la stobs rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos sde nad cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtog par nyan thos gri sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sta zas rjes/ 
i77b8('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
i78a1('bum): stobs rnams smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos sngon cing dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngar
i78a2('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par 'jub pa myed ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gos
i78a3('bum): yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang des stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos sngon cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying ma rtogs par nyan thos gos 'am rang
i78a4('bum): so su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams sgom pa'i phyir/ dmyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i chu ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'i rang sangs
i78a5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub gi yan lag rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par nyan
i78a6('bum): gas ma 'ang sangs rgyas giser yong su sur myi 'dug pa'o// gang la byang chub gi yan lag rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi daphyogs pa'i'adul gas nas sung pong dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyangan pa thams pa sa
i78a7('bum): nga ma rtogs par ca thos gos 'am nga sangs rgyas gas rasang su sur gyi 'jug pa'o// gang de lnga 'ang chus gi sani lag rnams bdag sted ces bya bar myi myigs pa'i tshum gas chos sna dag pa'i rna mas
i78a8('bum): ma pa yo ma pa mi rgyas kyi ma ma pa 'gas// mas kya migasas la mas pa bya kyis pa sum
i78b1('bum): snyan cang dgra padzin pa thams cad kyang rnam pa rnams pad mkhyen pa 'ang ma rnags par nyan mos gsu 'am ngas sa rgyas gisangs su so skyo 'jug pa / gang dus byang chub gi yar laganas dang zhes bya ba
i78b2('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pang dge ba'i tshe ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams nyid mkhyen pa 'ong sa rtogs par nyan pas gis ma/ rangasangs rgyas gi sar yongs su 'dug pa'o// gang dpa byang chub
i78b3('bum): lab rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos go sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor
i78b4('bum): 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub gi yan lag rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshal gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid rtogs par nyan thos ga/ 
i78b5('bum): sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub gi yan lag rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med par de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thos cad
i78b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub gi yan lag rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gos chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
i78b7('bum): thams cad kyang rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sder myi 'dzag pa'o// gang de la byang chub gi yan lag rnams sbom po'i phyir de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i
i78b8('bum): rtsa ba thams ca kyang rnab thams cad mkhyen pa nyi rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'ab rang sangs rgyas gi sar yangasu sngor mi 'jug pa'i/ gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi rtog ces bya bar dmyi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos
i79a1('bum): ston cing dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rdzogs par nyan thos ge sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sdug
i79a2('bum): bsngal zhes bya ba de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos sten cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// kong de la
i79a3('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag myed ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos go sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sa
i79a4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gos chos ston cing dka ba'i rtsa bo thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar
i79a5('bum): yongs sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rdzogs par
i79a6('bum): nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i le yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rna ba thos
i79a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rdzogs par nyan thos gi sa 'om rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba
i79a8('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngar mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang pa mngon par 'dub pa med ces
i79b1('bum): bya bar byer myig sa pa ma nas rgyas sten cing dge pa'i babyams pa kyang rnam pa danas ga tan pa sri gas pa du na pas kyise 'as 'ang sangs rgyas gas sa su gyur ma 'dug pa/ gang da la 'phags pa'i sa
i79b2('bum): yan lag brgad pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
i79b3('bum): de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshal gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs
i79b4('bum): sngar mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa
i79b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gos 'am 'ang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing ngam
i79b6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi/ sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
i79b7('bum): gos chos stom cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnab thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bangan pa rdzas zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmigs
i79b8('bum): pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams snang zhes
i80a1('bum): ba bar de po pags pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos go sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i
i80a2('bum): bden pa rnams mtsha ma me ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos sa 'am rang sangs rgas go sar yongs sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
i80a3('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ston pa med ces pa bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos stan cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad ma che bu 'ang rdzogs par nyan thos gi sa ngam rang sangs rgyas ga sar yongs sngor mi 'jug pa
i80a4('bum): gang de la 'phags pa'i ba bden pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams pad mkhyen pa 'di ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
i80a5('bum): sar yangs sngar mi 'dug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bdon pa rnams dber zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ches ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams ca mkhyen pa nyid ma rdzogs pa'i nyan thos gi sa 'am 'angasangs
i80a6('bum): sa gi sar yongs sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par 'an thos go
i80a7('bum): sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sor mi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la bsam can rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos stod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par nyan thos
i80a8('bum): ga~M sa'i rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor mi 'dzag pa'o// gang de la bas rten rnaMs sdug bsal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos stod ci/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par nyan thos gis

i80b4('bum): zos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam can rnams mtshan mo med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par
i80b5('bum): nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sor myi 'jug pa'o// gleng de la bsam rten rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos smon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams thams cad ma'o
i80b6('bum): da ma tshugs par 'dams go sa 'am dang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngar mi 'jug pa'o// gang del bas mo ma rnams mngod par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar dpyir phyogs pa'i nul gyis rgyas su cing // dge ba na pa thams cad
i80b7('bum): nam ma khams car mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par 'am thas gis 'ama'ang sangs rgyas gi sar songasu sngar mi 'jug pa'o/ gang del bsam rten rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi migs pa'i tshul gos chos snyan cing dge pa'i ma gsus
i80b8('bum): nga dam babs cang ma than pa nyid sa rtogs par nyan thos gis 'am 'ang sangs rgyas gi sa yongasu sngo'i mi 'jug pa'o// gang del bsam can rnams dbum pa'i phyir dag dmyigs pa'i tshul gi chos sun nga dag pa'i ma pa thas pa
i81a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtags par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gsar yongs sder myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad myed pa rnams myi rtag ces pa bar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thos cad kyang
i81a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gig so 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor myi 'jig pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'o chal bas chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thos
i81a3('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams bdag myed ces bya bar ngo myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba

i81a7('bum): ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad myed pa ma smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi
i81a8('bum): chos ston cing dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sarasngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar nga myi dmyis
i81b1('bum): la ga thas ldan dag kyi ma byed sa pa thams na pa sa gsas pa mas mas la du rgyas gsang gsus sto ga // nga grus po stong na
i81b2('bum): tshul gis chas sngon cang dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa song rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas ga sams su sngor myi 'jug po'o// gang de la chang med pa rnams snyam paji ba rje myi myigs pa rgyu/ 
i81b3('bum): gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad byed pa rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de myi dmigs
i81b4('bum): pa'i tshul gis chos ston ci dang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtog par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas go sar yongs su sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang po na gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
i81b5('bum): pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos go sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang
i81b6('bum): de la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar do myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sten cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar
i81b7('bum): yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs myed na pa'i snyems par 'jug pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnab thams mkhyen pa 'ang ma rtogs par nam sa
i81b8('bum): gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar dmyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stom pa 'i / cing dag pa'i rtsa ba bas
i82a1('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'ang ma chags par nyan thos go sa 'am rang sangs rgyas go sa ma ya su sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs myed pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams sman pa myed ces bya bar dam
i82a2('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs de'i nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas rbaM gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang ri la gzugs myed pa
i82a3('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mngon 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
i82a4('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rna ba thams cad
i82a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos
i82a6('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnam myi rtog ces bya bar de
i82a7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rno bar thar pa
i82a8('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying ma rtogs par nyan thos go sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gisar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'i/ 
i82b1('bum): gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams bdag mod ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gos chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rdzob thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
i82b2('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de ba rje bar thar pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sra yongasu
i82b3('bum): stor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rna ba thas cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs
i82b4('bum): sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis mos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rna pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am ra
i82b5('bum): sangasu rgyas gi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams smon pa ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshal gris chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rdzogs
i82b6('bum): na thos go sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gis ra yongs sngar myi 'dug pa'o// gang de ma rnam par thar pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar da phyir myigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang na pa
i82b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos go sa 'am rang sangs gi ser yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba
i82b8('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs gi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna bar thar pa rnams sgom pa'i phyir de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos
i83a1('bum): sten cing / dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtags par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gis gnas pa'i smos par 'jug pa dag ma
i83a2('bum): rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i chi ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor mi 'dzag pa'o// gang de la
i83a3('bum): mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang
i83a4('bum): sangs gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bdag myed ces bya bar/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
i83a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas ga sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha ra gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhi zhes bya bar demyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing da
i83a6('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos go sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgra slong zhes bya bar
i83a7('bum): da myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis cho sngond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gis gnas pa
i83a8('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am 'angs ngas rgyas gi sar
i83b1('bum): yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag smon pa med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma
i83b2('bum): rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o'o/ gang de la mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston
i83b3('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid mi rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs su sngar myi 'jig pa'o// gang de la mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dben
i83b4('bum): zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor mi 'jug pa te'o// nga
i83b5('bum): de la mtha rang gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom pa'i phyir de myi dmigs pa'i tshal gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs
i83b6('bum): rgyas gi sar yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mched ma med pa dang smon pa myed pa myi rtag ces bya bar de ma dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sbyin cing dag pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
i83b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nying ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna bar thar pa'i stong pa nyid dang / mtshan myed pa dang smod pa myed pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i
i83b8('bum): tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhye rung pa nyid rtogs par nyan pos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sna stong pa nyid dang
i84a1('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myang ba bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'jog rtsa bar 'am thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
i84a2('bum): yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang nga la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan pa myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa zhi zhes bya bar du mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa
i84a3('bum): nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sder mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa snang zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ste
i84a4('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par bar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med padang
i84a5('bum): smon pa med pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyer po nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sngar myi 'jog pa'o
i84a6('bum): ma rnapa ya ba ga/ stong pa nyid nga mang srid pa dang spang pa myed ces bya bar myi daphyogs pa'i tshul gyis nas su pa dge padzin pa thams sa kyang rnam pa thams cad bstan pa nyid ma rtogs pa na palags sa rgyas
i84a7('bum): yosu su mi 'dug pa'o// gang de la rjeb bar ba'i sra stong pa nyid dang mtshan po med pa dang smon pa myed ces bya bar ros dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos sbyin cing / dge ba'i rtsal thams pad kyang rnam pa thams cad ma khye pa nying ma rtogs par
i84b1('bum): par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngar mo 'jug pa'o// gang de la rno bar thar pa'i sgo snang pa nyid dang mtshan ma mya ngatsa ba dang smon pa myed pa dben zhes bya bor de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gas chos snyar cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
i84b2('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par lang thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa sgom pa'i phyir de myi dmyigs
i84b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gyi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnaMs myi rtag ces bya
i84b4('bum): ba rang myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas ga sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnaMs
i84b5('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshil gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sar yongs sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
i84b6('bum): mngon pa chashes pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de ma dmigs pa'i rdul gyis chos ston cing dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gis 'am rang sangs rgyas gsar yongasu snga
i84b7('bum): myi 'dug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ches ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
i84b8('bum): kyi ser yongs sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos
i84b9('bum): ke sa'i rang sangs rgyas gi sor yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'i te gang de la madro par she pa rna mtshan me ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thas cad kyang rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtags par nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas gi sa
i85a1('bum): yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stord cing / reg pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cid mkhyend pa nyid ma rdzogs par nyan thos
i85a2('bum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par 'dra ba de med ces bya ba ring mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos do/ cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnams pa zas cad mekhye nang pa
i85a3('bum): nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon par shes pa rnams riben zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
i85a4('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'ang ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang nga la mngon par shes pa rnams sgom pa'i phyir de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stonang cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
i85a5('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sder mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mngon ting nge 'dzin rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de ni dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba
i85a6('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzinang rnams sdug bas ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
i85a7('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhand pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzi nang rnams bdag myed ces bya bani de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis
i85a8('bum): chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rga saM kau sar yong su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
i85b1('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am tshang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams stong zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i/ 
i85b2('bum): tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzind rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar
i85b3('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams smon
i85b4('bum): pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa thod ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang ting nge
i85b5('bum): 'dzi nad rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
i85b6('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la ting nge 'dzind rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
i85b7('bum): rgyas kyi ser yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom pa'i phyir de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang ba'ang ma rtogs par nyan thos kyis
i85b8('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ches stond cing / dge ba'i rtse ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mekhye rang pa nyid ma
i86a1('bum): rtogs par can thos kyil 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis yang su sngor myi 'jug par/ gang des gzungs kyi sgo rnangs sdug bsngal zhes dA 'i ri myi dmigs pa'i rdu lo gas ches rten cing / dag pa'i sa pa thams
i86a2('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhand pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sngar mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag myed ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sngon
i86a3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i
i86a4('bum): tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkha nad pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong
i86a5('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ches sden cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nying ma tshogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
i86a6('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ljon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mi gnang panying ma rtogs par can thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
i86a7('bum): 'jug pa'o// nga la garnam pa rnamam ldan myed kyis bya 'i phyogs pa dul pa ma na tshang dag pa dbangs ma gangs ya sa gas pas kyis
i86a8('bum): sa ma rgya kyi pa bangs su ma gyi 'jug pa'o// gang ris gdun pa sa 'dod pa 'du ba me pa du phyogs pa 'a nga / pam
i86b1('bum): mikhyen pa nyid mtshogs pa nyin thos kyis 'di ngasangs rgyas kyi sor songs su sngor myi 'jug pa mo/ gang de la gsus kyi sgo rnams dpon 'as bya bar de myi dmigs pa rdul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'adu pa thams cad kyang
i86b2('bum): rnam ba thams cad ma kha nang po bying ma rtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdom pa'i gyur de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos sgron cing pon
i86b3('bum): ngas cang / rnam pathams cad pa khyen pa'i ma rtogs par ban thos kyis sa da pa sa rgyas kyi ser yong su por mi 'jug pa'o// gang de ya bzhin gshegs pa'i slobs su ma cu gces bya bar ro ma sa
i86b4('bum): nga'i tshul gyis chos stonang cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
i86b5('bum): bcu sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de
i86b6('bum): di bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu ba dag srung ces bya bar ngo myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i ma pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams pa ma khyen pa nying ma rogs par don rjes kyis 'anga'ang sangs rgyas kyi
i86b7('bum): ma su ldan 'jug pa/ ga sa de ban ga shegs pa sems tsun nas rgyag pa 'dus byam ngas gdas pa/ dge ba sa sa nga myo tshu sa ga
i86b8('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu stobs zhes pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos sngon dacing / reg parlortsa pa thams cad kyang rnam pa
i87a1('bum): thams cad mkhye nang pa nyid ma rdzogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pare/ gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mtshan ma med ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis
i87a2('bum): chos sngond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhye nad pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'i/ gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu smra
i87a3('bum): ba myed ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de
i87a4('bum): la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad me nad pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
i87a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs bcu dbe na zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis ches ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i87a6('bum): nga ba rigs par ban thams pa byes rtsol bas rang sa ma rgyas kyi par mas su sngor mi 'dug pa'o// gang de ya de bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs pacwa sgom pa'i byor dom dpags par dul byas sa rjes
i87a7('bum): sa pa sa ma sa kyang sa ba se pa ba mas par ma ma kyis 'a mas cas kyisar thangs su pa gyi / gsas myo
i87a8('bum): rgyas shes sa ma sa/ dge ma ya ma ma ma yang nga du gas pa rgya ma la 'das sa nyim kyil mas sa na la / 
i87b1('bum): ba'i sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// 
i87b2('bum): gang de la myi 'jigs pa pa'i bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad me khye nad pa'ing ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yod
i87b3('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi 'jigs pa bzhi zhi zhes bya b.re nga myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhya nang pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
i87b4('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi 'jigs pa ba'i stong zhes bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang po nyid ma rtogs par
i87b5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sder myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi 'jigs pa bzhi mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stond cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
i87b6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi 'jigs pa bzhi smon pa myed ces bya bar de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stond cing dge ba'i
i87b7('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la myi 'jigs pa bzhi mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya bar
i87b8('bum): dbyugs pa du migs choman ga 'i sa bamams ca rnam pa thamams ma byen de pa zhing ma rtogs pa ngos kyis 'am nga sa sa sa gyimar yongs su por 'jug
i88a1('bum): mi 'jigs pa po ni dbes nas byi bar nga myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsab thams cad kyang rnam thams cad mkhyen pa yang ma rdzogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
i88a2('bum): kyisar yongasu sngo mI lag pa'o// gang la gyi 'jigs pa dzad rnam pa'i bar ngos dmyigs pa'i tshul gos chos stong bang dge pa sa pathamasas dkyang rnam pa thams cad me khan pa 'di ma rtogs par 'a grus kyi
i88a3('bum): ra da skye kyi seM ma 'dug po'o// gang las po yang dag pa pa ngas kyi chis rdzogs pa rnal gi ma sngo gapa rgya thangs kyang nam byams sadas sa
i88a4('bum): nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
i88a5('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang ba nyid ma rdzogs par nyan rjes kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa
i88a6('bum): rgyam gam ches sem cing ges mas sa kyang rnam dmams pa khyen pa nyid ma tshogs par 'an thos kyis 'am mang sangs rgyas kyi sa sa su sa 'dug pa'o// ga sa pa sa yang dag pa dzin rnam
i88a7('bum): zhes kyas sa du migs pa rgyal gas tshas ston cing / dge pa'i ma ba na pa kya rnam pams pa kyang rnam bams cad ga byar pa' ma nigs par 'a thos kyis lam rangasas rgyas kyis sa su nga
i88a8('bum): dug pa sa ngas pa na shes mau ma ma na ma sa ma rnam pa mas kyi
i88b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag par rig pa rnams mtshan ma myed ces bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rtogs
i88b2('bum): bar shan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su su'u ma 'jug pa'o// gang de la so so yang dag zer rig pa rnams smon pa med kyis bya bar ngom dam mas pa'i nul gis chos ston cing / dge pa'i rgya ba thams cad kyang rnam sa

i88b6('bum): rig pa rnams sbom po'i phyir de sa dmigs pa'i rdul gis ches sngon kyang / dge ba'i sra ba bams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mi khyenang panying mardzogs par nyin thos kyi sa 'am rang mangs nas kyi pa yong su sngon mo 'jug par/ 
i89a1('bum): yongasu sngar myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po bdag myed ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhanang ba nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
i89a2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongasu bsngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma rdzogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
i89a3('bum): kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po stong zhes bya bar ngo myi dmigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos

i89a5('bum): gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la snying rje chen po sla chen pa med ces pa bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
i89a6('bum): cad mi khya nang ba nyid ma rdegs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ gang de la snying rje chen po mngon par 'dra bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thos

i90a2('bum): bya bar de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis chos stonang cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkha nang pa nyid ma rtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor myi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sangs rgyas

i90b1('bum): 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur zhing thabs mi mkhas ste/ sdig pa'i grags po'i lag tu lhung zhing dge ba'i beshes gnyen gis yongasu spangs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalang ba/ rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub

i109b5('bum): re shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par dri stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid kying dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom seMs su byed de// de shes
i109b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dri rnon po stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlos su ba // re shes
i109b7('bum): da kyi pha rol du phyin pa la stong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mi khyed pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba skyed par// dri do nas stong pa nyid zhes bya bar med la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gis don dam pa stob pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis rloms su khyad du

i115a1('bum): yo ra mi gyid/ phyog sa gru rgya ga rlo kyang sdig sa stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
i115a2('bum): la bya ba myed par/ chos mi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu bye'o// de shes rab kyi pha
i115a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chos dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed do// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
i115a4('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis rlom semasu bye'o// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i me/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chos ngo bo nyid spong ba zhes bya/ 
i115a5('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu bye'o// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
i115a6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chos dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid gyis
i115a7('bum): kyang rlom sems byed do// rab 'byor du gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rje/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyed pa cing dang ldan pa'i phrengs bya ba myed
i115a8('bum): par rtsig gi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems thong // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i115b1('bum): pa la snyed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yidi la bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa bri spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshus kyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lnga
i115b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhe
i115b3('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byedo// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
i115b4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la te stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su myi byed do// 
i115b5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gri
i115b6('bum): chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bo myed par/ myig gi
i115b7('bum): rnam par shes pa don ngam pa song ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i chul kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyang rlom sa su bye // de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa la stong pa'i rkye
i115b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa ning
i116a1('bum): kyis kyang rlos sems su byed ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cing dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba snang bar/ myig gi rnam par shes pa 'dus ma thas stong pazhes
i116a2('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su bye // de shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyi me pa la spong ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen du ni
i116a3('bum): dang lnga ba'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
i116a4('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya ba
i116a5('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis thog ma dang tha ma myang ba stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
i116a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa dor ba myong ba stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyi
i116a7('bum): kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid
i116a8('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyang rlom sam su byed// de shes rab kyi pha ri sad tu phyin pa la spyo pa'i tshe/ rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
i116b1('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis chos thams cad stob pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyang rloms su byed do// 
i116b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nya zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
i116b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid

i116b8('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed bar/ mig gi rna bar shes pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid / 
i117a1('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ sdang pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed ngo // rab 'ape rang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa la spang ba'i cha/ rna ba thas cad
i117a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyang rlom sems zad de/

i117a4('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la stong pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa

i117a6('bum): mnyid dang ldan pa'i yings bu bamed ngang / nA ba'i rnam par shes pa stong panyid sbe pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis snang pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs pa/ slong ji zhing kyis kyang rlom sa su
i117a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyin pa la sted pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyed d+ha nga sngan pa'i mings bu pa myed par/ rna bu'i rna bar shes pa chen po stong ba zhes bya bar mi la bye / dmyig pa'i tshul gyis chemapo snyed
i117a8('bum): pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa su bya // de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa la spang po'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i rna bar shes pa don dam pa
i117b1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/

i117b6('bum): po'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa thog su tha me pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul kyis thog ma sa mu myed pa stong pa zhing
i117b7('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed // de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i me/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dor ba mang ba spong ba zhes

i118a1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i skam+b+ha kas rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed

i118a4('bum): la bya ba myed pararna ba'i rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang myigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa su byed
i118a5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dmyigs pa'i tshul

i118a7('bum): med dem/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i spong pa zhes bya bar ying sa byed/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa zhe nyid kyang dmyigs lnga/ spong ba nyid kyang rlom sa su byed/ 
i118a8('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ldar pa'i yod la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
i118b1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su myong // de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin sde la spong pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lcang
i118b2('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs la/ stong
i118b3('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// / bam po dgu pa'o// / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems da

i118b7('bum): 'i che rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bu ba med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa phyi nang steng ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis phyi nang stong pa nying
i118b8('bum): kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyang rlom semasu byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa nang/ 
i119a1('bum): pa nyid steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed// de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa la skyed pa'i rgya

i119a3('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byeng // de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la sted pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med paratasna'i rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya ba yid la

i119a6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya nga med par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la bye/ dmigs pa

i119a8('bum): bamyang bar/ sna'i rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa sdong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i rdul gyis mtha' las 'dris pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ steng pa nyid kying kyang rlom sa
i119b1('bum): byad // dra shes rab kyi pha lang du phyin pa la spyod pa'i chu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma myeng pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed do//

i119b3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam pa mi shes pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlo ma sem su dred
i119b4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha ri la du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma rtu pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myong bar/ sna'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
i119b5('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su po dad do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam
