i119b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ra
i119b8('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa rtul spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sgra'i
i120a1('bum): rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
i120a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la stod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yil byed de/ dmyigs pa
i120a3('bum): tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom ses su myi byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
i120a4('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid kyang rimagos la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom snyem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold
i120a5('bum): tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sa sna'i rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
i120a6('bum): dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
i120a7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya med par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nang stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyi
i120a8('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin phral spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i le ba la khyong song par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa phyi sa
i120b1('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis kyi spong brjid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis nga rlom sam su byed de// de shes rab kya mang du phyi na pa la stong ba'i tshe/ rnam pabyas
i120b2('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i chu la kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
i120b3('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byed ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yings bya ba med par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid sdong pa zhes bya bar
i120b4('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i120b5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs pa/ stong pa nyid kyang rlom sa su byed de
i120b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol ngas du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la rnyed / dmigs pa'i
i120b7('bum): tshul gyis don dam pa skyob pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byeng // de shes rab kyi pha sang du ston pa la spyod pa'i de/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'idi dang ldan pa'i yi la bya ba med
i120b8('bum): bar/ lce'i rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi
i121a1('bum): du phyin pa la sdod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'o// yid la bya du med par malce'i rnam par shes pa 'das ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
i121a2('bum): tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyang rlom sa lA su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
i121a3('bum): bya ba myong par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa steng pa zhes bya ba 'i yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
i121a4('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la stong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid pa bya ba med par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma myed par stong pa zhes bya
i121a5('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lastong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i me/ rnams
i121a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stom pa nyid kyang dmyigs so/ 
i121a7('bum): sems byung ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la stong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams sang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba skyed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa rang bzhin spyod pa zhes su
i121a8('bum): mi.A la byed de/ dmigs pa gyi tshul gyis rang bzhin sdong dri nyid kyang dmigs la/ slob na nid kyis kya rnam ma su myod // de shes rab gr-i pha rol tu phyin pa la song ba
i121b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa ches thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
i121b2('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu bye // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ka snong pa'i / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la phra ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes
i121b3('bum): pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi ma/ tshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i121b4('bum): phyi nad pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i rnam par shes pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis myi dmigs
i121b5('bum): po stong pa nyid kya dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasam su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lde'i
i121b6('bum): bur shes pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyimigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems khyed// ngo shes rab kyi
i121b7('bum): rol du yin pa la sod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldam skye pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i rnam par shes ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la drid / dmyigs pa'i tshul
i121b8('bum): kyis po bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyang kyang rlom sems byedo// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi
i122a1('bum): la bya ba myed par/ lha'i rnam par shes pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byad nga / dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmi/ sa la
i122a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byang // de shes rab kyi phu rolang du phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam pa thams lus kyi rnam par
i122a3('bum): che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed de ba myed paralus kyi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis phyi stong pa
i122a4('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyang kyang rlom sems su byed do// do shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenod pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed
i122a5('bum): bar lus kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// 
i122a6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
i122a7('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sa rnam
i122b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// lus kyi rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang
i122b2('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid bya ba myed par/ lus
i122b3('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes
i122b4('bum): rab kyi pha pha rold du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya ba myed par lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
i122b5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i122b6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
i122b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhri na pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam
i122b8('bum): par shes pa mthu' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// 
i123a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa
i123a2('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul kyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i123a3('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul
i123a4('bum): kyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyad kyang rlom semasu bye // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
i123a5('bum): bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong ba nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// 
i123a6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa la spyod bu'i nga/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed // 
i123a7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mnyan
i123a8('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang / 
i123b1('bum): sems su byung // de shes rab kyi pa rna lang tu phyin pa la skyed pa'i chu/ na mu pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa'o// lus kyi rnam pa she pa myi dmyigs pa'i stong ba zhe
i123b2('bum): bya bar yid la byed do// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol dutu du phyin pa la stong pa'i chu/ rnam
i123b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po myeng pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i chu lnga gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid
i123b4('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su khyad do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus
i123b5('bum): kyi rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
i123b6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
i123b7('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid
i123b8('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed da/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
i124a1('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu phyind pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba med par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phye snang pa zhes
i124a2('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i rdul kyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa su byengo // de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la smod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i124a3('bum): pa nyid ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
i124a4('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya
i124a5('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i124a6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par yid la bya ba myed pa rnam par shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ steng pa
i124a7('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems byed// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ngon pa
i124a8('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol da tu phyin pa la spyod
i124b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la/ byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang nga dmyogs
i124b2('bum): lo de stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi rnam par shes pa
i124b3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du
i124b4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i rul
i124b5('bum): kyis mtha' las pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la de stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan de'i
i124b6('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
i124b7('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// ye shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dor ba myed pa spong
i124b8('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
i125a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par yid kyi rnam par shes pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa
i125a2('bum): nyid kyang ngamyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 
i125a3('bum): yid kyi rnam par shes pa chos thams cad stong zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis chos thams cad ma stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
i125a4('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myeng bar te yid dkyi rnam par shes pa rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes
i125a5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byung ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i
i125a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa myi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong
i125a7('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la stong pa'i cho rnam pa thams cad mkhor ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la khya ba myed pa
i125a8('bum): yid kyi po par shes pa dngas pa med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de dmigs pa'i rdzas kyis dngos po yang ba stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems dang ngo // 
i125b1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshernam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi rnam par shes ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la dang de/ dmyigs
i125b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
i125b3('bum): la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul kyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
i125b4('bum): pa nyid kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa'i tshe// / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
i125b5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba nyamyig gi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes par yid la byad de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de/ 
i125b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spong po'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa
i125b7('bum): tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold du phyin pa la skyeng ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
i125b8('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi 'das te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes da bar yid lta de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed // de shAr
i126a1('bum): ro la tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'o yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te re ga bla stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'o
i126a2('bum): tshul gyis stong pa nyid kyang dmigs pa la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen de pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
i126a3('bum): bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa su
i126a4('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold du phyind pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
i126a5('bum): dedamyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
i126a6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa 'i
i126a7('bum): kyis kyang rlom semasu byeng // de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig gi 'dus drug pa 'dus ma byas su
i126a8('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa su byed// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba thas na mkhyen pa nyid
i126b1('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa snang pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid
i126b2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byang da// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa tho bA ma dang tha ma myed pa
i126b3('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nang pa la skyed pa'i tshe
i126b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la bya ba myed par byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa
i126b5('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spong ba'itshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa
i126b6('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlo ma sems su byed do// de shes rab
i126b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
i126b8('bum): tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su bye'o// de shes rab kyi pha ro la du phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang An tI
i127a1('bum): la bya ba med par/ mig gi 'dus de reg pa rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i rdul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs/ la/ stong pa nyid kyis
i127a2('bum): kyang rlom sems su byeng ngo // ri shes rab kyi pa'i yang du phyin pa la srung ba'i rdza/ rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa 'di dang ljon pa'i 'di la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te rig pa myi dmigs pa spong ba
i127a3('bum): bya bar yid la byed ngo // dmyigs pa'i nu gyis myi dmyigs pa steng parjid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems su byed // dri shes rab kyi pa snang du phyin// pa mo spong ba'i ste/ rnam
i127a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'dri dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba mong bur/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos pa myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngas pa// myed pa steng pa nyid kyang
i127a5('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom som su byed do// ngo shes rab kyi pha rol du phyi ring po la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba meng bar/ myig gi 'dus
i127a6('bum): te rig pa ngo rje nyid stong zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid kyang ngom gus lu/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i127a7('bum): la spyad pa'i de/ rnam pa thams du mkhyenang pa'id dang ldan pa'i yid la byed de/ myig gi 'dus te reg po dngos po myed pa'i nga bri nyi stong pa zhes bya bar yong la byed nga/ dmigs pa'i nus kyis
i127a8('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byerang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang pa la sto
i127b1('bum): pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
i127b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro lod tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa phyi stong
i127b3('bum): ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs po'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs so// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi nga ro lang du phyi nang po la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cang sa
i127b4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su

i127b6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
i127b7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
i127b8('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi phor lang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan po'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa don dam pa snang po zhes bya bar yid la byed sde
i128a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i128a2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus/ te reg po 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
i128a3('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang po nyid dang ljon pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg po 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar

i128a6('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa thob
i128a7('bum): ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg ma dong tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlo mo sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi

i128b1('bum): gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la

i129a2('bum): te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
i129a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myong bar/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis dngos po myeng ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tu
i129a4('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

i129a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dbying
i129a7('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kying rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la stong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong ba zhes

i129b1('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//

i129b3('bum): po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigaso la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes sa rab kyi pha rold tu phyin du pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus

i129b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe ka/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa
i129b7('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thos
i129b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la te stong pa nyid
i130a1('bum): sa kyang rlom sems su dadang // bshes rab kyi pha rol du byinang pa la spong ba'i ma/ rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus de rig pa thogs
i130a2('bum): dang tha ma med pa steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog pa dang tho ma myed pa steng pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes kyi pha rol du
i130a3('bum): phyi nang pa la spyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed de/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dor bu med pa sdang ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong
i130a4('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol de du phyi nad pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i
i130a5('bum): 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa/ nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang
i130a6('bum): tu phyinang pa la spyod ta'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod/ la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad sdong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
i130a7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
i130a8('bum): bya ba/ sna'i 'dus te rel pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang kyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ 
i130b1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol/ da tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid lci bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
i130b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems na su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
i130b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba myed pa sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar nyid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong / 
i130b4('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par ta sna'i 'dus te reg pa
i130b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la
i130b6('bum): spong ba'i tshe ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan dri'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
i130b7('bum): gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong po nyid kyis kyang rI ma sems su byed do// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
i130b8('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i rta yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
i131a1('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi nang pa la sbed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba/ 
i131a2('bum): myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la'i stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
i131a3('bum): tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed do// lce'i 'dus te rog pa phyi nang sdang ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong ba nyid kyang
i131a4('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ljon pa'i yid ye bya ba myed par/ lnga'i 'dus
i131a5('bum): reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir pa la
i131a6('bum): sbyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lho'i 'dus te reg pa chen po stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmig
i131a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed // nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la skyong ba te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa lce'i 'dus de reg pa do da ba stong pas
i131a8('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyibs pa'i rdul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sam su byed do// de shes rab kyi por long du phyi rang pa'i srung ba'i cha rnam pa thams
i131b1('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bar myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
i131b2('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed de/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
i131b3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da
i131b4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
i131b5('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa thog dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes
i131b6('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myong ba stod pa nyid kyang dmigs la ni sngo// rkang ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinong pa la spyod pa
i131b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed por ga lce'i 'dus te reg po dor pa med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sa dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyi
i131b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyinang ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan po'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin
i132a1('bum): snang ba nas bya bar yang la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i132a2('bum): phyi nad pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lnga/ na pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs ji'i
i132a3('bum): tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyis kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
i132a4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtsha na nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la snang
i132a5('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom som su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmig pa
i132a6('bum): stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang po la
i132a7('bum): smod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba meng par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos pa
i132a8('bum): myong pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyis pa ro lang du phyind pa la srung po'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying
i132b1('bum): la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te rag 'ang rngani/ de snang pa zhes byi bar yang la bya nga// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bo nyid stong pa nyid kya ts+tsha tshogs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de nam
i132b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed do/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
i132b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed po'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// bam po bcu pa'o// rab 'byor nga gzhan yod
i132b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
i132b5('bum): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
i132b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te 'gro pa phyi stong bya zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
i132b7('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
i132b8('bum): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis kyi/ nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pal
i133a1('bum): spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong
i133a2('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus
i133a3('bum): te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i
i133a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang rimigs la
i133a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba med par lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dus byas snga
i133a6('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rnam
i133a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid le bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmig
i133a8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das
i133b1('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmya stegs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lhag stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed/ do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spong ba na
i133b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang the ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myeng pa
i133b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi
i133b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa dor myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
i133b5('bum): la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid
i133b6('bum): kyang dmyigs la rtsa stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus
i133b7('bum): chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa la
i133b8('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed des dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyi
i134a1('bum): dmyigs la/ skyed pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmigs
i134a2('bum): pastong pa zhes bya bar yid la ba nga / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyi gsol/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de// de shes rab kyi pha ril du phyi rang ba la sbeng pa'i tshe/ rnam thanas
i134a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigaso la/ stong pa nyid kyis
i134a4('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la sbed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
i134a5('bum): pa'i rnal gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
i134a6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed pa
i134a7('bum): rab 'byor rang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par yid kyi 'dus te reg par
i134a8('bum): spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byeng / dmigs pa'i rdul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs so/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad byed
i134b1('bum): 'ong dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yad kyi 'dus te rag pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byad da/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la pa stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byang du// de shes
i134b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi
i134b3('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi
i134b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir
i134b5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang
i134b6('bum): dmyigos la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
i134b7('bum): don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi rang pa la spyong
i134b8('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg po 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid
i135a1('bum): dmyags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rdzab thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya myed par/ yang kyi 'dus par
i135a2('bum): 'dus ma byas spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
i135a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
i135a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang tha med pa
i135a5('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod nga'i
i135a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmig la
i135a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldam pa'i yid lo bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa 'od bzhin stong pa nyid
i135a8('bum): ces bya bar yongs kyad de/ dmigs pa dus gyis rang bzhi spong yod kyang migasas stong bzhi kyis kyang rnam sems byed // gas rabakyi mau nga byedang pa ma spyong pa'i sanas pa mas
i135b1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa chas thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thos cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms su
i135b2('bum): byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
i135b3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
i135b4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sosu byed do/ 
i135b5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad pa'i tshe/ rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi dudra la bya ba myed khar/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
i135b6('bum): tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa
i135b7('bum): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po myed po'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmyigos pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su dang
i135b8('bum): rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol do tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ljon pa'i yid la bya ba myed par// myig gi 'dus te rag rje
i136a1('bum): rkyen kyis char pa nang snang pa zhes bya bar yid la byad de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byung ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la
i136a2('bum): spong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyig
i136a3('bum): smod pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed ngo // de shes rab kyi pa ladung phyin pa la spyong ba ni// rnam pa thams cad pakhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyisacho
i136a4('bum): phyi rang spong ba zhes bya ba yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi rong steng bu'od kyang dmyigasul/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byung // de shos rab kyi pa'i yang tu phyin pa la spyong ba'i ma/ rnam pa thos
i136a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmig la/ stong pa nyid
i136a6('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnas pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba chen po
i136a7('bum): phreng ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byung ngo // nga shes rab kyi po rabang du phyi nang pa la spyong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas
i136a8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i med la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba don dam pa spong pa zhes bya bar yong la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyi
i136b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams ca mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i skye ni
i136b2('bum): tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rad kyi pha rol du phyid
i136b3('bum): skying pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yi la byed do// da mag
i136b4('bum): tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rje ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldum pa
i136b5('bum): ma bya ba skyed pas srog gi 'dus rlog rgyan gyis tsho bamatha' las 'das pa spong 'o zhes bya ba ba yi sa byung de/ dmyigs pa'i nas kyis mtha' las 'das pa steng babyed kyang skye shesal
i136b6('bum): chu nyid kyis kyang rnam sems byed nga / ngag sbyor ba kyi pha rolang du phyin dbul spyod pa'i rna tha thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dong ldan pa'i yod la bya ba myed par myig gi 'dus te reg pa kyir drim
i136b7('bum): thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong po zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ du myigos pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs lo/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rim sa su byed do// de shes ra
i136b8('bum): pha rolang du phyinang po la spyod pa'i tshe/ rna ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mye dad par/ myig gi 'dres te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dor ba myed pa ste nga ba zhes bya bas yid la byed / ma gos
i137a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dor ba meng pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
i137a2('bum): bya ba med par/ mig gi 'das te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// 
i137a3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la ting nge
i137a4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
i137a5('bum): ljon pa'i yid la bye ba myi'ang par/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
i137a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyird pa la smod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi 'dus te dge ba'i rkyen kyi
i137a7('bum): ra ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs so ba stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa
i137a8('bum): la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan po'i yid la bye ba med por mi myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
i137b1('bum): dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ snang pa nyid kyis kyang rnam semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ myig
i137b2('bum): 'das te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
i137b3('bum): ro lding du phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad rgyu mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bar/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dngos// po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid spong ba zhes bya bar yid la bang
i137b4('bum): dmyigs ba'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
i137b5('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
i137b6('bum): bya'i tshul gyis nango stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba skyed
i137b7('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi spong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byung // nas rab kyi pha rolang tu phyi
i137b8('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong
i138a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i me/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus
i138a2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la sastong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa la spong ba'i
i138a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nying dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
i138a4('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba don dam pa spong pa zhes bya bar ying
i138a5('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa
i138a6('bum): yid la bya ba myong bar/ rje ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshoragi 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed
i138a7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ migs
i138a8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// ngo shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa la spod pa'i tshib rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myong bar
i138b1('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de na dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// 
i138b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba thob ma dang tha ma med pa spong ba zhes bya bar yid la
i138b3('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tho go ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
i138b4('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la byed de/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlam
i138b5('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'du ngas te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya
i138b6('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid
i138b7('bum): dang ldan po'i ying la bya ba myed par rdza ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis zer bachos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i rdul gyis chos thams cad stong pa'i dkyang dmigs so nga
i138b8('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rje pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan po'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang
i139a1('bum): mtshan nyid snang pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid sdang pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ sdong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
i139a2('bum): spong pa'i tshab rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la bod de/ dmigs pa'i rdul gyis myi dmyigs pa
i139a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rdza ba'i 'dus te reg
i139a4('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshon pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs lo// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha

i139a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rna ba'i 'dus te re
i139a7('bum): ba'i rgyan gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'ang bo nyid stong pa zhes bye bor yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byeng
i139a8('bum): rtso gam yang byang chutho sems dpa' semam pa chen po dgas rab kri pa ro la kyi phyin bul gang ba / rnam 'thams cad ma byer pa'ad dang ldan pa'i ying la bye ba sring mar/ dwa'i 'dus
i139b1('bum): pa rgyand kyis tsho ba nang sdang pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ring stong pa nid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de yad shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i
i139b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid lo bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'das te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
i139b3('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes
i139b4('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semargya su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
i139b5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong po nyid stong po nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
i139b6('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i nyon gyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid
i139b7('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
i139b8('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba don dam pa sdepa pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa su byed do/ 
i140a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus byas steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dbyigs pa
i140a2('bum): tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyis kyang rimigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byang // de shes rab kyi pha/ rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i
i140a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du du
i140a4('bum): phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med por/ sna'i 'dres te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mthu
i140a5('bum): las 'das po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ljon pa'i yod la bya ba med par/ sA'i
i140a6('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor po thog ma dang tha ma myed par stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su bang / 
i140a7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin du bal spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tsho ro ba dor bamyed pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed // dmigs
i140a8('bum): dor ba med pa stong pazod kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la srid pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed myed
i140b1('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang bzhin steng pa zhes bya bar yang lo byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sem su byung // de shes rab kyi pha rol
i140b2('bum): tu phyin ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myod par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis chos
i140b3('bum): thams cad stong po nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid lo bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'as
i140b4('bum): de reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid sdong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ra gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed de// de shes ra
i140b5('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myeng bar/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor po myi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
i140b6('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sna'i 'dus te reg
i140b7('bum): bu'i chen kyis tshor ba dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yi la byed de/ la myigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pasong ba nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pharo lang du phyind pa la
i140b8('bum): spong po'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sde'i 'dus te rig po'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong po nyid kyang
i141a1('bum): dmyags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems byang de// nga shes rab kyi pha ralang du pand pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba ba mad par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyer
i141a2('bum): kyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang
i141a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nang stong ba zhes
i141a4('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyinang pa la spring pa'i tshe/ rdza pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
i141a5('bum): ldan pa'i yid lo bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed // 
i141a6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byad de// lce'i 'dus de reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor 'iphyo nang stong pa zhes bya bar ying la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
i141a7('bum): tshul gyis pa nang stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyi nang bal sbeng po'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying la bya ba med byar/ lha'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
i141a8('bum): rtso nas pa yi la / kyi ma nu kyis rlong yid kyang yad kyang phyogs pa yod pa'id kyi gyung rnamasas su byung // ma grong 'ang phyi mal slong ma
i141b1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
i141b2('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis cher po don dam pa stong pa zhes
i141b3('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyen
i141b4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig ces pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
i141b5('bum): kyang rlom sa su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la snyid po'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed de/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i nyon kyis tshor ba 'das mo byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid
i141b6('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i rdul gyis 'dus ma byas spong ba nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyi ning po la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thos nang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldanan
i141b7('bum): yid la bya ba myong bar/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
i141b8('bum): rlab sems su byed // na bya da du da pa la nga ma sa rnam ma yang pabyed pa ldan pa 'dis bya nga pa 'i dus rig pa na kyis gas ma sa da
i142a1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg ma dang tha ma med pa spong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas
i142a2('bum): nang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis cher ba dor ba med po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmigs pa'i rdul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa 'od gang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
i142a3('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rang bzhon sdong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
i142a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin steng po nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinod pa la spyod pa'i tshig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya bo mang
i142a5('bum): nga // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rang
i142a6('bum): pha rol du phyind pa la spyong po'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkan kyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
i142a7('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong po nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phand pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed de// lce'i 'dres te reg
i142a8('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba myi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong po nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol de tu phyinang

i142b3('bum): kyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs so// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed ngo // de shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyinang pa la/ song pa'i
i142b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myod par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhes bya ba ro ying la byung de/ dmyigs pa'i rnal gyis dngos po myong ba'i nga
i142b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chom po de shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nod pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma
i142b6('bum): bru zhing dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba myed par/ lus kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor po nang stong pa zhes bye ba yid la byed ris dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms su
i142b7('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sred pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis nor po phyi stong pa nyid bya bar yid la byed de// dmyigs
i142b8('bum): ba'i tshul gyis pi stong pa nyid kyang de rnams stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po'ing dang ldang pa'i ying la bya ba myeng bar/ lus
i143a1('bum): ka 'dus de rlag pa'i rkyen kyis maphyin stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byang // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phywa ni snang ba 'ang kyang dmigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang drab sems byed // de shes rab kyi pha rol

i143b3('bum): rangs 'om pa zhing dang ldan pa'i mdol bya ba stod par / lus kyi 'du 'angs te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor 'brog ma dang ba mi byed pa stong ba zhes bya bar ming po byed de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma das mi med ba spang ba'i
