i146a1('bum): pha lang du phyind pa la spyad pa'acha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yang la bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ngo ba nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la bya
i146a2('bum): pa'i rdul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rngam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
i146a3('bum): bya ba myed par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa ni zhes bya bar yid la byeng // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang rimigs la/ 
i146a4('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// / bam po bcu gcig pa'o// / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rolod tu phyin pa pa
i146a5('bum): srid pa'i tshi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i nya yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams nang stod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa
i146a6('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab/ kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
i146a7('bum): dmyigs dpa'i rdul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlo masam su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu pi nang po la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thos cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
i146a8('bum): lo bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs lo// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
i146b1('bum): phyind pa la sbed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed de/ sa'i khams stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs lag/ stong pa nyid
i146b2('bum): kyis kyang rlo mo sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin de pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan po'i yid la bya ba myed par// sna'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// myig
i146b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen gri nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
i146b4('bum): par/ sa'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolango tu
i146b5('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus pas stong pa nyid kyang
i146b6('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khas 'das ma byas spa
i146b7('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
i146b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'o yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid
i147a1('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol du pa nad pa la sbed pa'i na/ rnam pa thams ca cad mkhan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa sdong pa zhes bya bar
i147a2('bum): pang la byed de// dmigs pa'i tshul byis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi nang pa la spyong pa'i cha/ rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
i147a3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams dor ba med po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi
i147a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa lo spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams ralo de bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang
i147a5('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// ngo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa lo spang ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams chos thams cad spong ba
i147a6('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkharan
i147a7('bum): da dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bo med par/ sa'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid sred pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed // 
i147a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la ba po med par/ sa'i khams mi dmigs stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmigs pa stong
i147b1('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems byed do// da shas rab kyi pha'i lang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams can mkhyen pa nyi dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba med par/ sa khams dngas mi myeng po sa \u0f7fsa
i147b2('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
i147b3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid lo byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i147b4('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa
i147b5('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
i147b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams nang stong pa zhes khu bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa su byed do// de shes ra
i147b7('bum): kyi pha ro bang du phyidad pa la stong pa'i rgyu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byeng de ga dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi sto 'i zhod kyang dmyigs
i147b8('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms misu byed do// de shes rab kyi phu ro khong du phyinang pa la spyod pa'i che/ rnam pa tham/ sa cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byad de/ nu'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byong nga rgya
i148a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa
i148a2('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs lo// stong pa nyid kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
i148a3('bum): roldad tu phyi nod pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba myeng bar/ chu'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang
i148a4('bum): dmyigaso la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha lang du phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba myong ba/ chu'i khams rini dam pa spong
i148a5('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed // de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang po la snying po'i rmi/ rnam pa thams
i148a6('bum): mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba med pa'i/ chu'i kham rdzas 'dus byas stong bzhis bya bar med la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs mag snying bu kyis kyang rnam
i148a7('bum): do skyed ltud pa / pa'i 'i 'od gyu / kyings dusas byas song pa 'i ming byong ma
i148b1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
i148b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams thog ma dang tha myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
i148b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan po'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar
i148b4('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngar ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
i148b5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
i148b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid lo byed de/ chu'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad
i148b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ spong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de// de shes rab kyi par lang tu phyin pa la snang ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mthun pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba snang bar/ chu'i khams nga
i148b8('bum): kau mtshan nying spong ba zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong panyid kyang dmyigs la/ snang pa nyid kyis kyang rnam semasu byed do// de nas rab kyi pha mang tu phyin pal srung pa'i tshe// 
i149a1('bum): phyag garnam pa thams cad mnyan pa nyidade dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams myi dmyigs pa stong po zhes bya bar yid la byad de// dmyig pa pa'i tshul gyis mya dkrugs pa stong panyid
i149a2('bum): srung ba gyis kya sasams su byad / gas rab kyi pa 'ang tu phyin pa la srung ba'i / rnas pa sa dang sa kyang shid do yong su byung sa nu 'om sa dang sa byed pa stong pa nas
i149a3('bum): 'di la byed do// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngas pa myang ba snang ba nyid kyi dmyigs su/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems su byung // shes ra kyi yo pal spyong ba 'o// rnam pa thams ma
i149a4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba myed par/ nu'i khamos ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// nas
i149a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ chu'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
i149a6('bum): dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du 'i rang ba la
i149a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ me'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong ba nyid kyis kyang rnasas su
i149a8('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sbed pa'i tshe/ rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mo'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid
i149b1('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ kha rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ me'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya da
i149b2('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis phyi nang stong po nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sem su byed do// dri shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pe la spyod pabyotsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan tha mi
i149b3('bum): la bya ba med par 'oma'i khams stong pathod stong po zhes bya bar med la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i nul gyis stong bsod stong pa nyid kyang dusogs pa/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasas su rung // zhes rab kyi pha rol du phyi
i149b4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed de/ ma'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam
i149b5('bum): sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid bya ba myed par/ mi'i khams den dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dran
i149b6('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ me'i khams
i149b7('bum): 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
i149b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed por// ma'i khams 'dus ma byas pang po zhes bya bar yod la byed do// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus mi byos stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu myong
i150a1('bum): da shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa la spyad pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ me'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig sa pa'i tshul gyis
i150a2('bum): mtha' las 'das pa snang pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mo'i kham
i150a3('bum): thog ma dang ma ma ma pa stong pa zhes pa bor yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i nul gyis thigo ma dang tha ma mang ba stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la~M// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnamasamasu byeng // dashes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyin pa la spang
i150a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ me'i khams dor ba myed pa stong po zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong po nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sa
i150a5('bum): su byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis rang bzhi
i150a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlos sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ming la byo ba med par/ ma'i khams nas thams cad
i150a7('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams nad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sam su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rilang du phyin pa la spyang po'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
i150a8('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid lo byed de/ dmigs pa'i rnam gyis myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ spang panyid kyis kyang rnam sems byed do// deshes rab
i150b1('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod par cha/ rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myang bar/ me'i khams dngos po med pa snod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i nul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kya
i150b2('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa lo spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ me'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yang la
i150b3('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid byis kyang rlom sem/ su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
i150b4('bum): ba myed par/ me'i khams dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshulagyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// rang
i150b5('bum): 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed de/ rlung gi khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la bya
i150b6('bum): por yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
i150b7('bum): la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i nul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi phar long du phyid pa la spyod pa'i
i150b8('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams phyi nang snang ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom so sa nga
i151a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba meng par/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid snang ba zhes bya bar yang la gang ngo// dmyigs pa
i151a2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang po la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi
i151a3('bum): khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
i151a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pararlung gi khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do/ 
i151a5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas
i151a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams 'dis ma
i151a7('bum): bas sdang ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'odus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thos cad
i151a8('bum): khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams mtha' los 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
i151b1('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shas rab kya pha ra la du phyind pa la spyad pa'acha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams thog ma dang tha ma myang ba sdang ba zhes bya bar yang le bya
i151b2('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la zla stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i
i151b3('bum): yid la bya ba myed pa de/ rlung gi khams dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yidal byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs lo// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi
i151b4('bum): pA'i 'jon byon pa la sri pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mi sa bya ba myang bAr/ rlung gi khams 'ji shin stong pa'is bya bor yong la zangad de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin mang
i151b5('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems byeng ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang bu la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba meng par/ rlung gi khas chos thams cad snang ba zhes
i151b6('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigaso la/ sdong po nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lo spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
i151b7('bum): pa'i yid la bye ba med pa ru/ rlung gi khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de ma dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// da shes ra
i151b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sreng po'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba myed par/ rlung gi khams myi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigaso stong pa nyid mi gra
i152a1('bum): snang ba da kyis kyang rnamasam su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyad pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rlung gi khams dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes pa

i152a5('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// ngo shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba myed par/ nam ma'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar
i152a6('bum): yod la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang
i152a7('bum): bya ba nga myed par/ nam mkha'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs lo// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnams su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
i152a8('bum): spong ba'i ngo che/ rnaMrnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par nam mkha'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bor yid la bying de// dmigs pa'i tshul gyi so mye nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la// sung
i152b1('bum): rgyas kyang rnam mas byu du/ gas rab kyi yang du da pa la sgyung ba ma rnams sa pa da lta pa dngas ma 'ams gleng yang slong bags
i152b2('bum): yid la byed de/ drimags po'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems su byung ngo // da nas rab kyo pha ro yang tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i rje/ rnam pa thams cing sa rgya
i152b3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams chen po snang pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang ngomigs la'o stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnams su spyo
i152b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyin pa lto spyad pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams drin dam pa stong po zhes bya bar yod la byed de// dmyigs pa'i rna
i152b5('bum): gyis don dam pa stong pa cod kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems su byed // de shas ro par yang tu phyin la smra pa'i tshe/ rjeb thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ming
i152b6('bum): la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kying dmyigs la/ snang ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byeng // de shes
i152b7('bum): pa ro lang tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha' khams 'das ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar ming la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus

i153a1('bum): khams mtha' las 'das bsdang ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
i153a2('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid lo bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams thog mu dang tha ma myed pa steng ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa
i153a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// ngo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ljon pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khamos ngor
i153a4('bum): med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong po nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
i153a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad por/ nam mkha'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhir spong ba nyid kyang dmigs pa// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems su
i153a6('bum): nga de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nam mkha'i khams ches thams cad sdang pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
i153a7('bum): gyis chongs thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ nas
i153a8('bum): mapa'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa gos bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i rdul gyis rang ga minan shing spang banyid kyang dmigs so/ slong banyid kyis kyang rlom semaso sa bad de// jishes rab kyi pa'i lang du pi da pas
i153b1('bum): spyong pa'ache/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha' khams myi dmyags bla gas bya bar yad la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i nul gyis mya dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong dzin
i153b2('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la/ spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myong par/ nam mkha'i kha mos dngos po myed pa stong ba zhes bya bar yid la 'de
i153b3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
i153b4('bum): ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la

i153b8('bum): kyang shing de'i phyi'i ring ba nim pa la mas kyi ga bya bad byed / sa kyi bying gi kyi du /

i155a1('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul byas myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs li/ steng pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rald tu phyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ na

i156b4('bum): nyid kyis kyang rnam sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ma rig pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
i156b5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa su byed do// rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
i156b6('bum): tshon po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi nga la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang
i156b7('bum): pa nyid kyang mi dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spong po'i tsho/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mying bar/ 'du byed phyi
i156b8('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kya nga dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang de la spong ba'i tshe/ rna ba thams cad mngon pa nyid dang lnga
i157a1('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed phyin pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rang
i157a2('bum): kye pha ralang tu phyind pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa re/ 'du byed stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis seng pa nyid stong pa
i157a3('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi ro la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed chen po snang
i157a4('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyi rnaMs kyang rlom semasu byed // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi
i157a5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// 'du byed don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi
i157a6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
i157a7('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myong par/ 'du byed 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid
i157a8('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dis ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
i157b1('bum): dang ldan pa'i 'angs bya ba myed par/ 'du byang mtha' las 'das pa stong pazhes bya ba yang la byang da/ dmyags pa'i tshub gyis mnga' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs pa/ sbyong ba nyid kyis kyang rnams sa su byed // 
i157b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha ro long tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mad ba / 'du byed thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nas bya bar 'angal byed do// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyiso thogs
i157b3('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigaso la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed
i157b4('bum): dor ba myed pa sbed pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thos
i157b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yinade la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi rnas rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa su byed do/ 
i157b6('bum): re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myeng par/ 'du byed chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams
i157b7('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'du byed rang gi
i157b8('bum): mtshan nyid sbeng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byeng ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa la sdong po'i tshe/ rnam
i158a1('bum): ba thams cad mkhyen payang dang ldan pa'i yid la bya med par/ 'du byang sa dmyigs pa stang ba zhes bya bar yang lu du // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma dmigus pa steng pa rjid kyang dmigs la stong ba nyid rgya
i158a2('bum): kyang rjes semasu byed do// bams rab kyi pa ro lang du phyind pa la spyong pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa shid dang ldan pa'i yod la byar myed par/ 'du byeng dngos po myang ba spong gzhes bya bar yong byung de/ myigs
i158a3('bum): gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la smod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
i158a4('bum): 'du byed ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spong pa'i
i158a5('bum): che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par te 'du byed dngos po myong ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i rdul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
i158a6('bum): kyang rlom sems byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub ses dpa' sos dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la steng ba'i tshe/ rdza ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid bya ba med par/ rna bsanas pa nang song ba zhes pa par yid la rang
i158a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang srong banyid kyang dmigs la/ spong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sos tang // shes rab kyi pa ra nga tu phyi pa la bung 'i'i me rje bathus cang ma ben pa nying dang ldan pa'i ming la bya ba mang bar / rna bar shes pa phyi spong ba zhes bya bar ring
i158a8('bum): byad de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang nim sam su bying ngo // de/ sa rab kyi sa ro la tu phyin pa la spyong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa zas cad mkhyen pa' dang ldan po'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rje bar shes pa phyi na
i158b1('bum): sdong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed ngo // dmigs par tshul gyis phyi nang sbeng pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ spong na pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la skyed pa'ichi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan ba
i158b2('bum): yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i nas kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa la
i158b3('bum): sbed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par/ shes pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang

i158b7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rnam par shegs pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms su byed do// de shes rab kyi
i158b8('bum): pha lang du da pal spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pathams thang ma khyed pa nyid dang ldan padi yang la bya ba myed par rlornam pa rags pa mtha' las 'das pastong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs da'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa/ 
i159a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlob sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol ta pi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa thag ma

i159a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad me ma pa zhing dang ldan par song la bya ba myed bar / rnam par shes pa dor ba myong ba stong pazhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmyigs dA'i nul gyis dong ba da pa stong pa'id kyang dmigs lan spong bsring kyis gang ma

i159b8('bum): sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha ro lang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pang/ myong dang gzugs phyi nong stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmyigs nga'i tshul gyis/

i160b1('bum): bye bar sring byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid gyis kyang rlom sem su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa byang
i160b2('bum): ljor ba'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mying dang gzugs thog me dang cham med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid lnga byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog mu dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// 
i160b3('bum): rishes rab kyi pa ro lang tu phyind pa la spyong pa'i ni// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying la bya ba myeng par/ mying dang gzugs dor ba med po steng bzhis bya bar ying sa blad de/ dmigs pa'i nul gyis dor ba meng du nga
i160b4('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mying dang gzugs rang bzhin steng pa zhes bya bar yid la

i160b7('bum): rnam tha thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ming dang gzugs rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid klu rlom sems byung ngo // shes rab kyi pha
i160b8('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spong pa'i che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mying dang gzugs myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmigs bsngo
i161a1('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mying dang gzugs dngos
i161a2('bum): po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
i161a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba myed par/ mying dang gzugs ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong po nyid kyis kyang
