i161a6('bum): rab 'byorang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgas rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug nang stong ba zhes bya bar
i161a7('bum): yid la byang du dmyigs pa nas kyis na stong nyid kying dmyigs la yong byed kyis kyi rlos sem su byung // gas rab kyis nga tu phyid pa spod pa'i dri rnam pa sams pang ma ny-id pa ng+ge 'i 'ad 'bya gyi
i161a8('bum): skye ched drug gyi stong pa zhes bya bar yi la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshud kyis kyi stong panyid kyang dbyigs pa gang brjid kyis kyang romasas su byeng ngo / gas rab kyi la mang du dpa la sring pa'i/ rje ma thams cad ma
i161b1('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar/ yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe
i161b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug slong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms su byed do// 
i161b3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyong ba'i tshe/ rnam po mas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
i161b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sam su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug don dam pa steng ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa
i161b5('bum): tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ snying pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug
i161b6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dadamyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong panyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasas su byed ngo // deshes rab kyi pha rol du byinang pa la skyed pa'i tshe rna ba thams cang
i161b7('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug 'dus ma byas stong pa/ zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi
i161b8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod po'i che rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar ying la byed de// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pastong pa/ 
i162a1('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sam su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la stong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug theg ma dang tha
i162a2('bum): ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byang de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmi gos la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byung ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyeng pa'i tshe
i162a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
i162a4('bum): kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
i162a5('bum): ba'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
i162a6('bum): skye mched drug chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin
i162a7('bum): pa la stong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa rdar/ skye mched drug rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang
i162a8('bum): dmyigs la/ stong panyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byeng // denas rab kyi pa ro lang tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yong la bya ba skyed par/ skye mched drug myi dmyigs pa stong
i162b1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byad de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmigs pa snang pa nyid kyang dmyigs 'ang/ snang ba nyid kyis kyang nom sem su khyad do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
i162b2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug dngos po myed pa spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
i162b3('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye mched drug po bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
i162b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba
i162b5('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub
i162b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
i162b7('bum): tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye nang pa nyid dang / ldan pa'i
i162b8('bum): yid la bya bar myed par/ reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
i163a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par reg pa phyi nang steng ba zhes bya ba yid la byed de dmyigs
i163a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi ning stong pa nyid kyang myi dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i re/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
i163a3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed
i163a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi ning pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ljon pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
i163a5('bum): tshul gyi ra thong pa ning kyang daphyogs la stong banyid kyis kyang rlom sems su su byed de/ ngeg sorab kyi ma la du phyinang pa ma spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams pa mkhyen
i163a6('bum): du bya nga / ga pa dam pa stong pas 'i yi da de/ dmyigs gyis na da rgyags larna
i163a7('bum): lasu bya // dge nga khri pa sa na pa gyun gyipa 'bya byu ba sa pa bya
i163b1('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
i163b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par reg pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang
i163b3('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
i163b4('bum): reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'dres pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// 
i163b5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ reg pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
i163b6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thig ma dang bla mi myed pa snang ba nyid kya dmigs so// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom gyis su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rol du byin pal snang / 
i163b7('bum): ngam ltung du zhing dang ldan pa'i mdul du'i byed par/ reg pa ra ba myang du byung zhes bya bar yod pa byed / dgas pa'i dus smras derang bskyed pa na
i163b8('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed // dgos rob kyi pa romang du nang 'ol srung ba kyi/ rnam pa thams cid ma khyen pa'idi dang ldan pa'i ya la byag byeng bar rig pa 'i
i164a1('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
i164a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rig pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang
i164a3('bum): dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su myi byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod po'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad lo khyi nang pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par reg pa rang
i164a4('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
i164a5('bum): tu piphyi nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams ca/ da mkhyenang pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la ba ba med par rig pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi
i164a6('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
i164a7('bum): myong bar/ reg pa dngos po myong ba stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myong ba stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// ngo
i164a8('bum): rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa la spong ba / rnam sa thams cad mo byin pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya rnyeng par/ reg pa ba 'od stong ba zhes bya bar yang la byed do/ dmyigs pa'i rdul gyi
i164b1('bum): ngo bo'ang byung ba nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlos sems su byeng du/ nga shes rab kyi pa yang du phyin pa la spyod ba'ing/ rnam pa thams cadu ma thun pa nyid dang ldar pa yang
i164b2('bum): par reg pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myong ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// 
i164b3('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba no
i164b4('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong po nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed pa'i
i164b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis
i164b6('bum): kyang rlom sems su nabyed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yang
i164b7('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas
i164b8('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa'i
i165a1('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par tsho ba stong pa zhes bya
i165a2('bum): bar yad la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas
i165a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong panyid
i165a4('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba 'dus kyi bas stong pa nyid ces bya ba
i165a5('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thas
i165a6('bum): cad mkhyenang pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par tshor bya stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sa
i165a7('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin lnga la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba mtha' las 'dasas stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed
i165a8('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad khyen
i165b1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed bla stong ba nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
i165b2('bum): byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la byed myed par tshor bya stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
i165b3('bum): tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu myi byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ro long tu phyini pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
i165b4('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa ces bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// 
i165b5('bum): de shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyining bya la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid lnga bya ba myed par/ tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs
i165b6('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
i165b7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom ses
i165b8('bum): su byed // dgos rab kyi bang tu phyir bul spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yi la bya ba skyed par tshor ba myi dbyigs pa spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyi
i166a1('bum): ba'i tshul gyis kyi dmyigs pa na cang rlom sems su byung // da shes ra ba'i lung du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang sbur ba'i
i166a2('bum): yi la bya ba myed par tshor ba mtha'i dngos po myed pa steng ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de// dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myang bu stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byung
i166a3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed paro// tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byud de/ dmyigs pa
i166a4('bum): tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid dang ldan
i166a5('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ tshor ba dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myong ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid
i166a6('bum): kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem/ sa dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
i166a7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myeng par/ sring pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nade stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid gis kyang rlom
i166a8('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad pa khe nad pa nyid dang ldan po'i yid la bya ba myed par sred pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de
i166b1('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
i166b2('bum): ba'i yad la bya ba myed par/ sred pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs lo/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang da rlom sem su byed// de shes
i166b3('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes pa bya bar yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
i166b4('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
i166b5('bum): par/ sred pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i166b6('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang
i166b7('bum): dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi ning ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myengs par sred pa 'dus
i166b8('bum): kyis stong pa 'di zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems su byed // de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin
i167a1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sred pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus pa bas
i167a2('bum): nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sred pa
i167a3('bum): mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stongango pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
i167a4('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sred pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nido zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i
i167a5('bum): tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
i167a6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myodang par/ sred pa der po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlo
i167a7('bum): semasu byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par sred pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed de
i167a8('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
i167b1('bum): phyi dang ldan pa'i ying la bya ba skyed par/ dre ba nyis thams cad steng pa zhes bya bar ying la byed de/ da myigs pa'i tshul sa chos thams cad stong ba nyid kyang rnamyigs la stong ba nyid kyi
i167b2('bum): rlom sems su byed // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la skyed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa rung bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
i167b3('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin da stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i167b4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
i167b5('bum): sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ sred pa dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
i167b6('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myeng pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / 
i167b7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ srang ba ngo bo 'di stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyidri kyis kyang rlom semasu byed de shes rab kyi
i167b8('bum): rjemang du phyin pa lo spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i dang ldan pa'i ying la bya ro mang bar/ srid pa dngos po myeng pa'i ngo ba nyid stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed / dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po
i168a1('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed // rab 'byorarang gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spang
i168a2('bum): nga'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomasas
i168a3('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la byed pa myed par len pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar
i168a4('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
i168a5('bum): ba'i yang la bya ba myed par len pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyi mad kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu
i168a6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par len bla steng pa nyid ces bya bar yid lo byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ 
i168a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba myed par len pa chen po stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yang la
i168a8('bum): phyi/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su bye'o// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ltar bya'i tshu
i168b1('bum): sh+ya ba myed par len pa don ngam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don ngas pa steng pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed ngom de shes rab kyi pha rol
i168b2('bum): phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par len pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyig
i168b3('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par 'dus ma byas stong ba zhes bya bar
i168b4('bum): yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
i168b5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par len pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang
i168b6('bum): rlom sems su byang ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadi dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par len pa thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
i168b7('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
i168b8('bum): ldan pa'i yid la ba ba myed par/ len pa dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu bye // de shes rab
i169a1('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par len pa rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
i169a2('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par len pa chos
i169a3('bum): thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa
i169a4('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis len pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
i169a5('bum): kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed dode/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par len pa mi dmyigs pa
i169a6('bum): stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lo spyod pa'i
i169a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ lon pa dngos pa myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong panyi
i169a8('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed ngo // de she sa rab kyi pha ro lang tu pa ning ba la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par len pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
i169b1('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyi sang gis kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
i169b2('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba myed par len pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid gis kyang rlom sems
i169b3('bum): su byed do// rab 'byord gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par srid pa na
i169b4('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa zhes kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad khyen
i169b5('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba med par/ srid pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed// de shes rab kyi
i169b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa myed par srid pa phyi nang stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyig
i169b7('bum): la/ stong pa nyid gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rgyu/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par srid pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes byab/ 
i169b8('bum): bya bar ying la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
i170a1('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba myed par/ sring ba chen po snang ba zhes bya bar yang la byang / dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid gris kyang rlob
i170a2('bum): sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa med par/ srid pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya ba yid la byed de dmyigs
i170a3('bum): ba'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ljon pa'i yid
i170a4('bum): bya ba myed par/ srang ba 'dus pas stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab tu
i170a5('bum): pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ smad pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus pa
i170a6('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par srang
i170a7('bum): ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byeng // de shes rab kyi pha rol
i170a8('bum): phyin pa la spang pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba myed par srid pa theg ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed
i170b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par srid pa dor ba myed
i170b2('bum): ba stong pa 'in zhes bya bar yidi la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
i170b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ srid pa rang bzhin stong ba zhes bya bar yid la bya ba myed par myigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis
i170b4('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par srid pa ches thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ 
i170b5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid gris kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
i170b6('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed 'am/ srid pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyags pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigos la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems byed de de shes
i170b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba myed par/ srid pa mi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang la byed/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmigs
i170b8('bum): pastong ba nyid kyang dmyigs lo// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srang
i171a1('bum): ba dngos po myed pa steng ba zhes bya bar yang la byed pa/ dmyigs pa'i tshul byas dngos po byang ba snang ba nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlomi/ sems su byed do// do shes
i171a2('bum): kyi pha rolang tu phanang ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par srid pa ngo bo nyid stong / zhes bya bar yid la byed du/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nya
i171a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la sbed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par spang
i171a4('bum): ba dngos po meng ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar ya la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyang rlom sems su byed// rab 'byorarang gzhan
i171a5('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro long tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par skye ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
i171a6('bum): bya bar yang la byed de// dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad khyen
i171a7('bum): ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par skye ba na pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis na phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang ru mo semasu byed// de shes rab kyi
i171a8('bum): tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa 'ams ring mkhyen pa 'di dang ljon pa'i yangs bya ba myeng por/ skye ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byeng de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phyi mang stong pa nyid kyang dmil mam
i171b1('bum): stong panyid gis kyang rlom sems su byed du// de shes rab ming du 'o ba la spyong 'a'ang/ rnam pa 'ams cang mkhyen pa nyidadi dang ldan pa'i yod la bya ba myed pan/ skye ba stong pa nyid steng pa zhes bya bar yong
i171b2('bum): la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyidi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad me khyen
i171b3('bum): ba 'di dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par skye chen po stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid gis kyang rlom sems su byed de der
i171b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba don dam bya stong pa zhes bya bar/ yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dmang
i171b5('bum): ba nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyini pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par skye 'dus byas
i171b6('bum): ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la// stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tham
i171b7('bum): cad mkhyenang pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas steng de nyid kyang da phyogs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
i171b8('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa ra skye ba mtha' las 'das pa steng de ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshe
i172a1('bum): gyis mtha' las 'das pa stang ba nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spong ba'i rta/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i nga
i172a2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par sla ba theg ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa dang za ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyang rlom sems su byed de/ 
i172a3('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba dor ba med pa steng ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba myed pa
i172a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid gis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par skye ba rang zhin
i172a5('bum): sdang ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams
i172a6('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya ba myed par skye ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyang rlom ses su
i172a7('bum): byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyining ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang panyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba rang gi mtshan nyid steng ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa
i172a8('bum): tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa 'di kyang dmigs la/ sgru pa'i dkyis kyang rlom sems su byang // de shes rab kyo pha rolang du phyin pa la spong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panying dang ldan pa
i172b1('bum): yi la bya ba myed par/ skye ba myi dmyigs pa slong bzhes bya ba yang la byed de/ dmags 'amatshul byos myo dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dbyigs pa/ stong panyid kyis kyang rnams sa su byedang / danas
i172b2('bum): ro la tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ skye ba dngos po myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
i172b3('bum): kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed de// de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par skye ba ngo bo nyid stong pa
i172b4('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo 'di stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
i172b5('bum): cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa myed par/ skye ba dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
i172b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rero lang du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
i172b7('bum): yong la bya ba myed par/ rga shi ring stong pa zhes bya bar yid la bya ba byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi ba
i172b8('bum): tu phyir rom spyod pa'i nga/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'ang dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rgang ni phyi stong ba zhes bya ba tsha yang la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
i173a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan ba'i yid la bya ba med par rga 'i phyir tshesteng
i173a2('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa zhes kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad
i173a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rga shi stong ba zhes bya ba/ yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
i173a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyind pa la spyod pa'ing / rnam pa thams cad / mkhyen pa nying dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed pa rgya/ rga shi chen po stong pa'i sa bya bar yid la byed/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis cha
i173a5('bum): po stong ba nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su te/ ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par
i173a6('bum): rga shi don dam pa snang ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyir
i173a7('bum): la spyong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di dang ldan pa'o// yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi 'dus byas stong pa nyid zhes bya bar yang la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid
i173a8('bum): dmigs la spong ba nyid kyis kyang rlob sems du byed/ rje shes 'akra pa yang du phyin pa la stong ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa'i nga rjen pa'i ma la ba'i stong par ma mi 'dus mkhas
i173b1('bum): byas stong pa nyid ces bya bar yang yo byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi nas 'dus ma byas stob pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem su byi ba // de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa
i173b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba'i dadang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// rga shi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhenas bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa snang ba nyid kyang dmyig
i173b3('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rnam sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi/ pha rolang du pi nang pa la spyod pa'i tshe// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rga shi thog ma dang tha ma myeng
i173b4('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
i173b5('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed/ da par rga shi dor ba myed pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor bu myed pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la
i173b6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnyed par rga shi rang du bzhini stong pa zhes bya bar yid
i173b7('bum): byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
i173b8('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
i174a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa' yad la bya ba myed par ma she' ga tha na nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de dag
i174a2('bum): tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la dmyigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyinang pa sa spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams dang mkhyen pa'idra dang ldan pa
i174a3('bum): yid la byed pa med par rga shi myi dmyigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs la rnam pa tha ma stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byeng
i174a4('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rga shi dngos po myed pa snang ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
i174a5('bum): tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi dang ldan pa'i yid
i174a6('bum): la byed pa myed par/ shing bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do// dmyigs pa'i ga tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom semasasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rolang
i174a7('bum): phyin pa la stong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyid dang ldan pa'i yadi la zla ba myong bar/ rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo 'di stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i yang la byeng ngo // dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nga
i174a8('bum): bri snang pa'ing bo 'ang stong pa 'di kyad// dmyigs la/ stong pa 'ad kyis grang rlom pa sasas byed mo// ldan rgya ga' yang byin nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi phyir yang du
i174b1('bum): tu byaring ba la spyod pa / rnam pa mas pa sa khyer ba dang ldan pa la dul du gasrung bar/ smin mabya par gzhug pa rnam 'dum ste/ daphyogs sa sus nam dran pa
i174b2('bum): dmya gas la/ dran pa nye byar gzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byeng// de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyi na pa la spyod pa'i rmi// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen du pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rlon
i174b3('bum): dag par spong ba rnams sgom ste dmyags pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba de dag kyang dmyigs la yang dag par spong ba de dag gis kyang rlom semasu byed// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la stong
i174b4('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ rdzu 'phrulang gi rkang pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi n+durka pa rnams kyang dmyigs la rdzu 'phrulang gi rkang pa de dag
i174b5('bum): gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lnga spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ dbang po rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i
i174b6('bum): tshul gyis dbang po rnams kyang dmyigs la dbang po de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// dri shes rab kyi pha ralang tu phyining pa la stong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
i174b7('bum): byed ce rlobs rnams sdom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis slob sa rnams kyang dmyigs la/ slebs de dag gis kyang rlom ses su byeng ngo // dri shes rab kyi pha'o lang du phyin pa lasnang pa'i ci'i zlum pa
i174b8('bum): ngas khyen pa zhing dang sngar pa'i ming la bye ba snang bar/ byang chub kyi yin las rnams snyam ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag de dag kyang dmyigs lani/ byang chub kyi yanasas dag kyi
i175a1('bum): kyang rlob sems su byed ngo / de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyinang pa la spyad pa'im// rnam pa thams cad mkhan pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba myang bar 'phags pa'i las yan lag bas ba sgrab
i175a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag kyang myags la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag gas kyang rlom sems su bying ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyad pa'i tshe rnam
i175a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag gas kyang dmyigs la 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag
i175a4('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rold tu pa nad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ bsam gtan rnams sgramo te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bas
i175a5('bum): gtan de dag kyang dmigs la/ bsam gtan de dag gisi kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha ra lang tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
i175a6('bum): tshad med pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad myed pa rnams kyang dmyigs la/ tshad med pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed de/ de shes rab kyi pha rolang du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
i175a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la myed par/ gzugs med par snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyags pa'i tshul gyis gzugs myed par snyams par 'jug pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ gzugs
i175a8('bum): me'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byeng ngo // de shes rab kyi pha'i lang tu phyin pa la smod pa'i cha/ rnam pa thams gang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myang por/ rnam par thar ba
i175b1('bum): phyogs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'du ba rnams kyang dum grus la/ rnam par b.rang bang dug tu bye rnams su bya nga/ dgas 'dug pa yang du na snang ban ma rnam mam sa ca
i175b2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ mtha rang gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom ste/ de dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha rang gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang dmyigs la
i175b3('bum): mtha rang gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par rnam
i175b4('bum): bar tha rang ba'i sgo stong ba nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang sman pa myed pa sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par tha rang ba'i sgo stongango pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa med pa de dag gis kyang ngo dmigs la/ 
i175b5('bum): rnam par tha rang ba'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rald tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang
i175b6('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba myed sa par/ mngon par shes pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed de/ de shes
i175b7('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phanid pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par/ ting nge 'dzin rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gis ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang dmyigs
i175b8('bum): la/ ting nge 'dzin dang ngag gis kyang rlom semasu byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'otshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bo myed par gzungs gi sgra rnamos sgom
i176a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs gi sgo de dag gis kyang dmigs la ni gzungaso gi sgo de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha'i lang tu phyind pa la skyed pa'i tshe rnam pa
i176a2('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bye ba myed par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyal de dag kyang dmyigs la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
i176a3('bum): de dag gis kyang rlom sem su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la sbed pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba yid do// mye 'jigs pa rnams sgom ste dmigs pa'i tshul
i176a4('bum): myi 'jigs pa de dag kyang dmyigs la/ mi 'jigs pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
i176a5('bum): par/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig ba de dag kyang ma dmyig/ sa la/ so so yang dag par rig pa de dag gis kyang rlom semasu byed // de she
i176a6('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba myed par snying rje chen po bsgom ste/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po de yang dmigs la/ sa
i176a7('bum): chen po des kyang rlom sems su byed // de shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la stong pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba myed par/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sku
i176a8('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmyigs la / sangs chos kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// 
i176b1('bum): shes rab bram po gsum pa'o// / rab 'byor nga gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro mang tu phyin pa
i176b2('bum): pa la sbrid pa'i tshe/ de ltar thabs myi mkhas pas ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi ning ba bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sdong lta sgeg par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na
i176b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su za nid tsang / shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sdang ba skrag par 'gyur te/ sdig pa'i
i176b4('bum): grogs po'i sug par ltung bar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor nga 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs pa'i ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i176b5('bum): pa la spyod pa mos pa myed par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nang po la smod pa mos pa myed par byed cing / zlog par byed pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha raldang tu phyin pa la spang ba
i176b6('bum): mos po myed cing / zlog par byed pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyinang pa spyod pa mos pa myed par byed cing / zlog par byed pa'o// tshul khrims gi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa myed par byed cing / 
i176b7('bum): zlog par byed pa'o// sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyinid pa la spyod pa mos pa myong bar byed cing zlog par byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma ya ni 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma
i176b8('bum): ma yin gyis/ 'di la bslab pa bya'i ba'i myi cha'o// mdo sde 'di dag ni 'ong bzor byas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan par myi bya'o// gzung bar myi bya'o// bcang bar myi bya'o// klag pa ni myi bya'i kun du
i177a1('bum): par bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la bya'o// 'di dag ni gzhan la stanang par myi bya'o zhes zer te 'di ni/ rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grags par
i177a2('bum): rig par bya'o// rab 'byor nga gzhar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdug pa'i grogs po ni/ 'di ltar bdud sdug to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du byas pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'
i177a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ pha ra lang tu phyi nad pa drug las zlog cing mos pa med par byed de/ ragis gi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya bsam rten
i177a4('bum): gi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'gras kyi pha rold tu phyind pa bsgoms pas khyod ci zhig pa/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa bsgoms pas ci zhig bya/ tshul khris
i177a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyi nid pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zer ba 'ong ngo zhes/ bdud go las myi smra myi sten pa bdud gi nyes pa myi ston
i177a6('bum): ba 'di ni/ rab 'byorang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdud gi grogs par rig par bya'o// rab 'byo rang gzhan yang byachu bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing byang chub
i177a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyind te/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang dbyangs gis bsnyad pa dang / lung du bstan ba dang / tshigs su bcang ba dang ched du brjod pa dang gleng gzhi dang / 'di
i177a8('bum): ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la phab pa bstan pa de dag ston to// 'ge lang ngo // rnam par 'grel to// 
i177b1('bum): gsal bar byed de ston to// lam gi rnam par smin pa 'di lta bu dag myi smra mya ston de pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdud gi la su rig par bya'o/ rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to/ 
i177b2('bum): can sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i drung du phyi nad te/ 'di skad du rigs gi bu khyod ni byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang myed/ khyod ni phya ri myimye ldog pa yang ma yin
i177b3('bum): khyod kyis ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi nus so zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud gi las ngag myi smra myi stenang ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
i177b4('bum): 'o sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang bdud sngagI te can dag sangs rgyas gi cha byad du byas shing byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' tshon po'i drung du phyin te 'di skad du rigs
i177b5('bum): kyi bu myig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo// rna ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong / sna ni bdag gam bdag glosi stong ngo // lce ni bdag ni bdag gis stong ngo // lus ni bdag gam bdag gis snga
i177b6('bum): yid ni bdag gam bdag gis sdong nga'i / gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / sgra ni bdag gamyi bdag gis stong ngo // dri ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ro ni bdag gom bdag gis snying
i177b7('bum): reg ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chos na bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // myig rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna
i177b8('bum): rnam par shes pa bdag gam bdag gas stong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa bdag gam bdag myed par stong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa bdag gam
i178a1('bum): bdag gis snang ngo // myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis steng ngo // rna ba'i dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis steng ngo // sna'i dus de reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis steng
i178a2('bum): lde 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong de/ lus na kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gas stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis
i178a3('bum): tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyu nad kyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lce'i dus te reg pa'i
i178a4('bum): tshon pa ni bdag gam bdag gir steng ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis steng ngo // sa'i khams
i178a5('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chu'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis steng ngo // me'i kham sa ni bdag gam bdag gis steng ngo / rlung gi khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // nam mkha'i khams ni
i178a6('bum): bdag gis stang ngo / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gas steng ngo // ma rig pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'dus byed ni bdag gam pa sag gis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa'i
i178a7('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mying dang gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // skye mched drug ni bdag gam bdag gis steng ngo / reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gas stong ngo / tshor ba ni ba
i178a8('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo // sred pa ni bdag gam bdag gis steng ngo/ len pa ni bdag gom bdag gis spong ngo // srid pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sre ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / 
i178b1('bum): rga shi ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyind pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ni bdag gam bdag gi stong ngo / bzod pa'i pha rol
i178b2('bum): phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha ro lad tu phyi nad pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phani pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / shes rab kyi
i178b3('bum): pha rold tu phyind pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / phyi stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gi
i178b4('bum): stong ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gisi steng ngo / chen po stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa
i178b5('bum): nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis steng ngo // mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni ba theg gam bdag gis stong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma byed pa stong
i178b6('bum): stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gami stong ngo // rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni bdag
i178b7('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gir stong ngo / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam
i178b8('bum): gis stong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis
i179a1('bum): stong ngo / yang dag par spong ba rnams ni bdag gam bya ngag gis stong ngo // rdzu 'phrulang gi rkang pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis steng ngo // dbang po rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong
i179a2('bum): stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang pa ni bdag gam bdag gi steng ngo nge/ 'phags pa'i
i179a3('bum): bden pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stongango / bsam gtan rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshad myed pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnaMs
i179a4('bum): ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mtha rad gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gsi stong ngo // rnam par tha rad po'i
i179a5('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa med pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo de/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzind rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis sdo
i179a6('bum): gzungs gi sgo rnams bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis
i179a7('bum): de ltar bdag dang bdag gis stong ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te'ang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdungad gi las ngag phyi sA myi sten pa
i179a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po'i sdug pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig te can dag sangs rgyas kyi mabyang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
i179b1('bum): dpa' chen po'i drung du phyi nid te/ 'di skad du rigs gi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang myed
i179b2('bum): nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do// de bzhin du shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang 'og dang / steng dag stong ste/ phyogs bcu kun tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
i179b3('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang myed/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang myed nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med zhes zer ba
i179b4('bum): 'di lta bu'i bdud gi las dag myi smra myi stonang pa/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag
i179b5('bum): nyan thos gi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyi nad te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog cing nyan thos dang rang
i179b6('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'debs shing rjes su stonang ba de lta bu'i bdud gi las dag myi sA myi stonang ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par
i179b7('bum): bya'o// rab 'byo rang gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag mkhan po'i dang slob dpon gi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
i179b8('bum): bzlog cang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la sbyor ba dang rdzu 'phrul
i180a1('bum): rkang pa rnams la ster ba dang / dbang po rnams la sbyor ba dang / stobs rnams la sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la skyer gyi dpa 'phags pa'i sa pa yar lag brlang ba la ster ba dang
i180a2('bum): pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / bsam gang na rnams la sbyor ba dang tshad med pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / gzugs myong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sdom pa dang / rnam par tha rang ba rnams la sbyor ba
i180a3('bum): mthar gas gnas pa'o snyems par 'jug pa rnams la ster ba dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa myed pa la ster zhing / rigs gi bu khyod kyis de ltar ches de dag yongs su sgoms pa nyid byas
i180a4('bum): yi sa mngon gsum du gyis shig/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gis ci zhig bya zer ba de lta bu'i bdud gi las ngag myi snga myi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
i180a5('bum): grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byorang gzhan yang bdud sngag to can dag pha dang mra'i cha byang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyi ni de/ 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par
i180a6('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyed la mi zhige ba/ de'i don du ni bskal ba tshad med gangs myed par/ 'khor ba na 'khor zhing rko lag dang 'go bcang ba tshad med pas 'o yengs
i180a7('bum): par 'gyur gyis/ gang la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i bras bu mngon du byar yang ba dang / lan cig phyirari 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bar yod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yeng ba dang / ngag
i180a8('bum): pa'i 'bras bu raM yo pa de dag las brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud gi las ngag mi swa mi sten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs par rig par bya
i180b1('bum): rang 'byor gzhan yang bdung sdug te can dag dbye// slong gi mabyung du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' can pa'i drung du phyin te/ gzugs ky-i ga ces bya bya dmyigs pa rgyas gis ston

i188b3('bum): rnams myi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug sngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang smon pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du ba
i188b4('bum): ba myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sten pa dang / so so yang dmas par rig pa myi rtog ces bya ba dang / sdug sngal ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang zhi zhes bya ba
i188b5('bum): byablo / rnyan ma myed ces bya ba dang sngon pa myed ces bye dang / spri na zhes bya bar daphyogs pa hrul gyis sbyor bu dang / byams pa 'i skye gtses bya ba dang / ga sus thos bya dang / 'ang
i188b6('bum): myed ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang steng zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang mtshan ma myed ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / snying rje chen po
i188b7('bum): byed ga sa byu dang / sa byung po/ sa kyi sa nga nga / zhe ma pa ban nga sa ba sdug
i188b8('bum): tshul gas ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams myi rtog ces bya ba dang / sdug lnga'i zhes bya ba dang / bdag myang ces bya ba dang ni zhes bya ba nga stang zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma myed kyis
i189a1('bum): ces bya ba dang / smon pa myed ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba myed ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stor pa de lta bu'i bdung gi las ngag myi sA myi ldan pa 'di ni bya

i189a4('bum): rab 'byorang gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol dab
i189a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di skad ces bka' stsalang to// rab 'byor nga byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni tshig gi don myed pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyang ma rdzas
i189a6('bum): sems can yang ma skyes pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byorang byang chub la yang zhig gi don med sems can la yid cig go don myed pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa chog gi don med pa'o// rab 'byor nga 'didzi lta
i189a7('bum): dper na/ nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gangan myong ngo // rab 'byor 'di la ste dper na/ rmyi lam la gnas myeng ngo // de bzhin du byang chub sems dpam
i189a8('bum): tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma la gnas myed do// rab 'byor da de ba'i ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gdin myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ smug rgyu la gnas mang
i189b1('bum): rab 'byorod de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi don myed do rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na// chu zla la ginas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor ngade 'di lta ste
i189b2('bum): dper na myig yor la gnas myed do rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byorar 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs rnyan la gnas med do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'

i189b5('bum): tshig gi den myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper nam no rang ba de bzhini nyid la gnas myed do// rab 'byorang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi de no myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ dper na gzhan ma yin par
i189b6('bum): bzhin nyid la gnas myeng ngo // rab 'byorang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myad do/ rab 'byor 'di la sna dper na chos nyid la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gdon
i189b7('bum): myed do/ rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na chos gi dbyings la gnas myed do// rab 'byo rang 'di lta ste dper na// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed pa/ rab 'byor de bzhini du dper na chos sbyor myang
i189b8('bum): pa la gnas myed do/ rab 'byarod de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'o gzugs la gan/ sa myed do/ tshor ba la gnas myed do// 'du shes la gan/ 
i190a1('bum): myad do// 'du byed la gnas myed do// rnam par shes pa la gnas myed de// rab 'byu'ang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ralang tu ring ba la spyang ba

i190b8('bum): sa khyos kyi lu da khyod kyis gan pa dang/ na / sgyu ma'i gyis su rgyag kyim sa 'is ya da pa chos gdon byed/
