i194a4('bum): sems dpa rjen po shes rab gi nga'i lang tu phyind pa la spang pa'i byang chub sems dang tshig ga din byed de/ rab 'byor 'jig sa de yan/ dom na gshegs pa dag bcom pa mdodag par rdzogaso pa'i sangs rgyas gi rig la gde rje
i194a5('bum): do/ de ci'i phyi de gang bye 'i phyi// rang dzi de non drang chubasems da' sems de 'dzin cigs rang kyi mang phyin pa la spo ba byang chub sems papa'i tshig gdon myed do/ nga 'phyob ma pa de ya nga badzin
i194a6('bum): dag la dag par dgos rgyas mchis mi gnas da/ 'i ngos na / rabya 'byor bzhin du ma ma mi ga pa yi
i194b1('bum): nad pan ni gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas gan pa'i rnam pa shes pa la gnas kyang ngo // desa'i phyim na/ rlu ba rnam par shes pa mang pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor pa nan byang chu sems na
i194b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyid pa la spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don mang ngo // rab 'byor 'dil ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcome pa yango dag bur rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi sna'i rna
i194b3('bum): shes pa la gnas myed da de ci phyir zhe na/ sna'i rnam par shes pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhi du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi dor myed
i194b4('bum): de/ rab 'byor 'di la ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gaste rnam par shes pa la gnas myeng ngo // don phyir zhe na/ lce'i rnam mashes pa myong ba'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ba ni
i194b5('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab ga phyi rol tu phyin dpa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'a'i tshig gdon med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom bya yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
i194b6('bum): sangs rgyas gi lus gi rnam par shes pa la gnas myed di de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus gi rnam par shes pa de med phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pal spyod pa'i/ 
i194b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' ngag gdon med do// rab 'byor 'di lta sde dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas gi yid gi rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir nan/ ya gau rna
i194b8('bum): sa du ma sa bya yo tshun lung su tshum chog gang su / gyis ngo kho 'i
i195a1('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gisas ga 'dus te ga pa la gnas su dang/ de khyo na/ TIg go dun rig pa myig spyang pa ni phyid/ rab nga
i195a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro long tu rnyi pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi drin myong ngo // rab 'byor nga 'angs sa par de/ de bzhin kau shogs po dag bcom pa song dag 'a
i195a3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas gi sna'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na sna'i 'dus te reg pa de myeng ba'i phyi ring te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi phar long du phyi pa la
i195a4('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi don myed de/ rab 'byor 'di lta sa dper nang bzhi'i gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi lce'i 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do// ci'i phyir nan// lce 'dus
i195a5('bum): reg pa de myed pa'i phyir te rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la smad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi de na myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper ma
i195a6('bum): de bzhini gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lus gi 'dus de reg pa la gnas myang nga/ 'atso'i phyir nan lus gi 'dus de reg pa de med pa'i phyir de/ rab 'byor nga nga bzhin du byang nub sems pa
i195a7('bum): ga la song du gas ngas gyung nu gsams pa jig ga mya dang / na nga dang / ra na di gshegs pa dgra bcom pas dag yong dag par rigs sa
i195a8('bum): ming ni 'du 'i meg pas gnas myed do/ byor dzin/ mau ge 'dun rig par mang ba'i phyi / rab byed nin du bya thus mas dpa' thams dpa' chen tha shes pakyi pa mang du byed dpa la rung ba na chub sams/ 
i195b1('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don myed de/ rab 'bya rang 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gamyig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen dgi sa cher ba la gnas mya dang / de ci'i phyir zhe na myag
i195b2('bum): gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nang gis tshor ba de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don me ngo / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ 
i195b3('bum): dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi rna ba'i 'dus de reg pa'i tshe nang gis tshorab la gnas myed // de ci'i phyi ri zhe na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgya nang gis tshor bya myong ba'i phyir te/ 
i195b4('bum): rab 'byor dade bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab gi pha rolong tu phyi nad pa la spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi de ro myed de rab 'byar nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhini gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dog par
i195b5('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga sI'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nang gis tshor ba la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zho na/ sA'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gas tshor ba myed pa'i phyir de/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub se sa dpa' sems dpa' chen
i195b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa la spyad pa 'byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ dbezhin ga shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi lus gi 'dus te reg pa'i dri nang gis cho
i195b7('bum): la gnas myeng ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus ga'i dus te reg pa'i ni nang gis tshor ba med par phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha med tu phyin pa la spyong ba'i byang chub sems dpa
i195b8('bum): so byo dzan di na/ de zhi ga shegs pa dgra ma pa 'dudag par so nga rgya mi ni mi ge 'du rnyen pa sbyi dag pa sa myeng / khye nan ming ga dus
i196a1('bum): gis cher ba de myed pa'i phyir da te/ rab 'byorar de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro lad tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na
i196a2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi sa'i khams la gnas myed do// de ci phyi ri zhe na/ sa'i khams de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
i196a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byorard 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga chu'i khams la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu'i
i196a4('bum): khams de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs dgra pa
i196a5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga me'i khams la gnas myed de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ me'i khams de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang
i196a6('bum): chub sems dpa'i tshig gdon myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi rlung gi khams la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rlung gi khams de myed pa'i phyir du/ 
i196a7('bum): ra 'byor de pani du bya chubasams dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pa'i lang tu ning pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gdon med de/ rab 'byor 'dis sung pa da/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pamang dag par
i196a8('bum): sa rgyas gdam ga sa migs med do/ das phyir da/ ma gi spod pa phyi / de du nga chu sams dang ses pa do na mas dkyis mang da la rung ba byeng du pa mad/ 
i196b1('bum): tshig gi don med do/ rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas myed de de ci phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams de myed pa'i phyir te// 
i196b2('bum): rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
i196b3('bum): sangs rgyas gi ma rig pa la gnas myed da de ci'i phyir zhe na ma rig pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// 
i196b4('bum): rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i rgyas gi 'du byed la gnas myed do// de ci phyir zhe na 'du byed de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byorar de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
i196b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med de/ rab 'byorjod 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga rnam par shes pa la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
i196b6('bum): rnam par shes pa de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyining ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
i196b7('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi mying dang gzugs la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mying dang gzugs de med po'i phyir te/ rab 'byorarod de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyir/ 
i196b8('bum): bal spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'barang 'di la sde dpor na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas go skye mched drug la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe ni/ skye mched rje
i197a1('bum): ga co payang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa so rgyas garigs gnas byed de// kyi byi nin rig meng pa phyir te/ rang khyer de ci nga pyong du ba sems pa' sems dpa 'gas gyu yang ba la spyong
i197a2('bum): chu sems dpa tshig gi nam / rab byor 'das sa dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag tsam po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyami ma thong ba lnga gan med de/ de byo 'o// tshor ba de skyed par byer te/ rgyamo
i197a3('bum): dbazhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa lar ci shes rab kyis mang du gyun pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gidon myengad do// rab 'byor 'di lngas dpem nang ba'in gshegs pa dbya bcom pa yong dag pa
i197a4('bum): sangs rgyas ga sang sas/ sa gnas myed do// deci'i phyir 'an sring ba meng pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes ran kyi pa yang du ning pa la spyong

i197a7('bum): gaslongs na myed/ ngos byor nod/ rab khyo ng+ya yi dpa' sems pa na gyi shes ma gyu yang mi sa sung pa phying chu ma ma dang tshig gang nga kya ngas /

i197b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi ning pa lnga spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi rga shi la gnas myeng ngo // 
i197b3('bum): dor phyi ne na rga shing myed pa phyir to/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta snong par na/ 
i197b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi sbyinang ba'i pha rol tu phyining pa la gnas myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ sbyining pa'i pha rolang du phyinang pa myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byorang de bzhin du
i197b5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro la tu ning ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rang 'byor da 'di lta ste dper de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
i197b6('bum): gatshul gyim ga pa romang du phyid pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe ma/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byer de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis rolang tu phyi pas

i197b8('bum): 'i tshom tsu 'i phyi / ram so ni dung chu sams da' mams dpa chen tshogs rang kyi song du ni dpa ma sung pa phying chub sems pa'i tshig sa dan med / ba 'khyo
i198a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas go brtson 'grus gi pha rol tu pa ring ba la gnas med do/ de ci'i phyir na na/ brtson 'grus gi pho rolang tu phyining pa de myed pa'i phyir ta rab
i198a2('bum): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab gi pha ralong tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
i198a3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas gi bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa la de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byord de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
i198a4('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed de rab 'byorard 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
i198a5('bum): bde myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spong ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byord 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang
i198a6('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gso slong ba nyid la gnas myang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ na stong pa nyid de mung ba 'byor ro/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa la spyod pa'i byang chub
i198a7('bum): sems pa sems dpa' chen po 'tshig gdon myed de/ rab 'byor 'dis su dpen/ dban gshegs pa dag btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gaphyi snang bzhing la gnas kyang ngo ba'i phyi ni na/ byamaji ba dong bye
i198a8('bum): 'o te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems da' se mos ring chen tho shes ba kyipa 'o yod tu phyin pa la spang ba'i phying chubasems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'dis sa dpe na / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 'acos pa yang// 
i198b1('bum): bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga byin stong ba nyid la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyinang stong pa nyid de myeng ba'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de banan du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu nad pa la spyod pa rgya
i198b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du pya ni pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi dono myed do// rab 'byor da'ang lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs padagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sngo
i198b3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid stong ba nyid de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ralong tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi don
i198b4('bum): da/ rab 'byor nges so da dang ba ni gshegs bdag ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sos rgyas mnon bye ngo ba ngas gnas kyang / ba phyir nin tshon mam nyid mang 'byo te/ ra stong pa dadu bya
i198b5('bum): mas pa'i sems dpa' chen cha shes rabagapa mang du phyini pa la spyod pa byang chub sems dpa tshig gi myod do// ra khyong de ngag sted pechen/ de bzhin gshegs par ga ma po yang dag par rdzogs pa'is so rgya
i198b6('bum): gdon dam mdzu nyings gnas byed do// ngaba'i phyi nan de na dam bsreng ba nyid myed par byang/ rab 'byor de ban dubya chub sems dpa' sems da' chen thogs kyis dmang du byad pa la spyad ba nu ba sems pa'i
i198b7('bum): nga dbyeng / byang 'ang zhi / bzhi gshegs pa dag sa pa ma dag par rdzogs papa sa rgyas gi dus byas pa ma nangs gnas kyang / de tsor phyir zhen// 'dus kyi ma di su
i198b8('bum): kyi ngo nga di'i ma 'asams pa gas kyil yong phyi pa slong ba mcheg gong mang ngo // rang 'byung ba na song ba / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
i199a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid de myed pa'i phyir de rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
i199a2('bum): phyi nad pa la sbed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhi ni gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas myed do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha' las
i199a3('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid de myang ba'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do/ rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag
i199a4('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi thog ma dang tha ma dang myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thog ma dang ma myeng pa stong pa nyid de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
i199a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rolong tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med de/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi de rab myang ba spong ba nyid la gnas myed de/ de ci
i199a6('bum): phyir zhe na/ dor bamyed pa bstong pa nyid nga mung ba'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gdon med de/ na/ rab 'byur nga 'de
i199a7('bum): bzhin gshegs dag ma sa dag pa rdzogs pa sangs rgyas gang pa ni song 'di gnas byedade/ da'i phyi zhe na/ rang na ma pa ding ma pa gyu / rab 'gyod nga canan du byang chu byamam sa da sems
i199a8('bum): mem pa'o gang kyadang / byar rdzol po meng dadag shegs pa dgral gyi me da rtsig pa sa'i bas rgya ma gnas ma cing gi ma dang ga gnas sung
i199b1('bum): de ci'i sha phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chag gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ 
i199b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas med do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong ba nyid de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor dade bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
i199b3('bum): chen po shes rab gi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi myi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas med do// 
i199b4('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byorod de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spong ba 'byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin
i199b5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
i199b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig ga di no myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi d+hi b+h+r-i nyidi la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na
i199b7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de myed pa'i byor te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab gi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi nga ni myed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po myeng pa'i ngo bo ma
i199b8('bum): spong nying byed pa 'byor te/ rab 'byod da panin tung chub mas pa' sems pa chen po shis rab kyi pha rol du nid pas spyad pa'i phyi nubasoms dag cig gdor byedang / ra 'byu 'dis go nga/ debadon gshegs
i200a1('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi dran pa nye bar zhag pa rnams la gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag de myed pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chan
i200a2('bum): shes rab gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gidon myang ngo do// rab 'byor 'di 'i ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas go yang dag par spong ba bzhi rnams la gnas myong ngo //

i210a1('bum): myang ba la gnas myo dang / ches thams cad stong pa nyid mngon par 'du byad myed pa la gnas myed do// chos thams cad bstong pa nyid 'byung ba myeng pa la gnas myed de// chos thams cad stong pa nyid myi dmyigs tha la
i210a2('bum): gnas myed de/ rab 'byor rang gi mtshan 'di spong ba nyid sku ba myed pa la gnas myed de/ rang gi mtshan nyid spang ba'idi 'gag ba myed pa la gnas myed nga/ rang gi mtshan nyid skang po 'ang kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang rnam par byang
i210a3('bum): myed pa la gnas myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid snang ba nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myeng ba la gnas myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid snang ba nyid 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed de/ 
i210a4('bum): rab 'byor myi dmyig sla b+ha lu gnas myed de/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid 'gag pa myed pa la gnas myed do// myi dmyigs pa stong paganyid kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// myi dmyig ce
i210a5('bum): pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas myed do// myi dmigs pa la stong pa nyid 'byung ba myed pa la gnas med do/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmyigs pa la gnas med de/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa stong pa nyid skye ba med pa la
i210a6('bum): gnas myed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid 'gag pa myed pa la gnas med do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kun nas ni na mongs/ myong ba dang / rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed de/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la
i210a7('bum): garas ma dang / dngas pamyed pa spong ba 'di'abyung bamyeng ba la gnas myo dang / dzas myod ba spong ba zhing mi mags pas gnas mya dang / rab 'byang dang po nyid stong ba'ing skyo bskyed pa la sangs myang nga ma zhing spong ba nying 'gig bskyed pa
i210a8('bum): gnas myi dang / nga bo nyid stong ba nyid kun nas nyan mongs pa myang ba dang rnam par bar bya ba myang pa la gnas myeng ngo // nga bye di snang ba nyid mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa la gnas byed de/ ngabo cang stong ba nyid 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myang / 
i210b1('bum): ngobo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa la gnas myed do// rab 'byor dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid skye ba myed pa lnga gnas myed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'gag 'a myed pa la gnas myed do// dngos pa myed pa ngo bo 'di stong
i210b2('bum): 'di kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// dngos po myang ba'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon la myed bya lu glanas myed de/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'byung ba myong pa la gnas mye dang / dngos po myed pa'i
i210b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de ngan pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'gag pa myed pa la gnas med de/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kun nas
i210b4('bum): nyon mongs pa myed pa dang rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med pa la gnas myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams 'byung ba myed pa la gnas myed do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams myi

i211a1('bum): sa skye ba la gnas med nga/ dbang po rnams 'gag bamyed pa la gnas byed do// dbang po rnams kyin nas nyon mongs pa myed pa dang rnam par byang ba myed pa la gnas ma nga / dbang po rnams mngon par 'du brgya

i214a1('bum): gnas mang ngo // tshe so shi na dzA tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma 'a gnas myed de/ rib 'byorang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa shes rab go par ltang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang tshobs

i214a3('bum): shes pa shenang tu rnam par dag pa la gnas mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// lce'i rnam par shes pa shinang tu rnam par dag lnga la mtshan ma'i gnas mang ngo / lus gi rnam par shes pa shi ning tu rngam par dag pa la gnas myang de/ ying gi rnam

i214b1('bum): mtshan ma'i gnas med do// lce'i'adus te dag pa'i rkye nad gis cher rab shinang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas mye dang / lus ga 'dus du rig pa'i rgyan dgas cher ba shan du du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma gnas myang /

i214b5('bum): ma'i gnas myed do// khyed rnam par shes pa shi nang tu rnam par dag ba la mtshan ma'i gnas mye dade/ myang du gzugs shinang tu rnam par dag pa la gnas myed de/ skye mched drug shin tu rnam par dag pa la gle nas myed / 
i214b6('bum): reg pa sha ning tu rnam par dag pa la gnas myed de/ tshor ba shi nang tu rnam par dag pa lnga gnas mya dang / sred brtser shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma 'i gnas myad de/ lend pa sha nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan mo'i gnas
i214b7('bum): skyed do// sring mi turnam pa deg so can du rdzoganas mye nga/ khyeb shin du mi 'dog pa lag myedade/ ni gnang du rnam par dgapal mtshan mo sanas myang nga / ga 'byu dang bzhin du byang chu
i215a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab ga pha rol tu phyin pa la spang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi don myo nga / danas rab bam grog bcu drug par/ 
i215a2('bum): rab 'byung 'dis sdeng dper na/ sbyin pa'i pha'i mang du phyi nang pa shinang du rnam gyur ras pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myang/ tshul khrims gang mang du phyin pa la shin tu rnam par rgyag pa la mtshan mtsha
i215a3('bum): myad do// bzod pa'i pha ro lang du phyind pa shinang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med de/ brtson 'grus gi pha rol du phyind pa la shin tu rnam par dag pa la mngon ma'i gnas myeng de/ bsam gtanag par mang
i215a4('bum): tu phyind pa sha nang du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// shes rab gi pha re lang tu phyi rang ba shinang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
i215a5('bum): shes rab gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed de/ rab 'bya rod 'di lta ste dper na nang stong pa nyid shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// phyi stong pa nyid shi nang tu rnal
i215a6('bum): dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas mye nga / phyi nang snang ba nyid shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// stong pa nyid stong ba nyid shi nang du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myang nga / chen po stong ba med
i215a7('bum): rnam par dgapa ya ma gnas yod nga/ de da ma padang shing gad du rnam par dag sa mtshan mo'i gnas mngadang / dus byams da gamed du rnam par dag gas mtshan ma mganas mye / du
i215a8('bum): spang ba 'di na la rnam nas mye / mtham 'das mang band shin tu rnam par dag pa sa gnas myed de/ zag sa dang 'i da pal srung ma ma da du rnam par dag pa la mtsham
i215b1('bum): gnas myed do// der ba med pa stong pa nyid shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i ga/ nas myed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid sha nid tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myad de/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid shi nang tu rna/ 
i215b2('bum): bar dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shi ning tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed de/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed de/ dngos
i215b3('bum): bo myed pa stong pa nyid shi nang tu rnam por dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed de/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab gi pa lang tu phyind pa la spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
i215b4('bum): myed de// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// yang dag par spong ba shinang tu rnam der dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do/ rdzu 'phrulang gi rkang pa shi nang tu rnam
i215b5('bum): bar dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do dbang po shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed de/ stobs shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed de/ byang chub gi yan lag shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma 'gan
i215b6('bum): myed do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la gnas myed de/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig na/ 
i215b7('bum): dar myed dorab 'byor 'dis ste dper na 'phags pa'i bden pa shind tu rnam par dgo ba la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// bsam gtan shind tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myong / tshang myong ba shinang du rnam par dag pal
i216a1('bum): pa ga pagan rnam par dgapal la can ma zhin myed // rnam pas smo di mtshan byung bang na da shin rnam par da na
i216a2('bum): pa lan nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed de/ ting nge 'dzin sha ning tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed de/ gzungs gi sgo shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med de/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du bya
i216a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab gi pha long tu phyind pa la spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed de/ rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs shi nang tu rnam par dag pa
i216a4('bum): mtshan ma'i gnas myed do mya 'jigs pa shind tu rnam par dag pa pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa sha nid tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myang ngo do// snying rje chen po shi nad tu rnam par dag par mtshan
i216a5('bum): 'iganas myed do/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shi nang tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
i216a6('bum): sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed de/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sems can med pa'i phyir sems can shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor nga de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshe
i216a7('bum): shes rab gi pha rol du phyin pa la spyang po'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi dan mud do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste par na/ srog med pa'i phyir de shinang tu na mo par dag pa la mtshan pa'i gnas mye / raba'abyerang de bzhin du byang chub
i216b1('bum): myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myad de rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu myeng ba'i phyir te skyes bu shin
i216b2('bum): tu rnam par dag pa'i mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chusems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolal tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gidon byed de/ rab 'byorang 'di sa ste dper na/ gang zhen/ 
i216b3('bum): myed pa'i phyir gang zag shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab
i216b4('bum): 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na shed can myed pa'i phyir shid can shi nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
i216b5('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na shad bdag med pa'i phyir te shed bdag gi sha nad tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byar da de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bshes rab gyi
i216b6('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na shi byed pa po myed pa'i phyir byed po shi nang tung rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myang ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
i216b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ tshor ba po myed pa'i phyir tshor ba po shi nang tu rnam par dag dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed/ 
i216b8('bum): de/ rab 'byor dede bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rang ga par yang du phyind pa la spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi den myed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na shes pa'i myang ba'i phyir shes pa po shin du tu
i217a1('bum): rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor dade bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab gi pha rol tu phyi dad pa la spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig ga don myed de/ rab tu 'byor 'di lta ste dang
i217a2('bum): mthong ba po byed pa'i phyir mthong ba po sha red du rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas myong ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang ba la spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gad
i217a3('bum): myed de/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na 'a ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'chang ba'i tshe mun pa'i gnas myed de/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro long tu phyin pa la spyang pa'i byang chub sa sa/ 
i217a4('bum): dpa'i tshig gi don myed de rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na skal ba'i me 'byar ba'i tshe 'du byed gi rnam par shes pa thams cad gi gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dra ba la skye
i217a5('bum): 'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed de/ rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi tshul khrims la tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor nga de ba me
i217a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed de/ rab 'byor de lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas go
i217a7('bum): 'dzind la 'khrul pa'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha yong tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi ngan myed do// rab 'bya rod 'di lnga ste dper na de bzhin
i217a8('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab la 'tshal ba'i gnas myedang/ rab 'byor 'di lnga ste dper na/ bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs byang chub sem
i217a9('bum): sems dpa can tshags rab gyis yang tu nings la spang bar byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myong de/ rab 'byu dis su dab sa/ bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ga rnam par gyil pa la
i217b1('bum): ma grol ba'i gnas myed de/ rab 'byorang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro lod tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed de/ rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper nang bzhin gshegs pangag
i217b2('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma gzigs pa'i gnas myed do// rab 'byor da de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab gi
i217b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab gi pha rol tu phyin
i217b4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi dono myang do rab 'byord 'di lta ste dper na gza' dang skar ma dang nor bu rin po che dang / glog gi 'odi la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen be shes rab
i217b5('bum): gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi ris gi lha rnams gi 'odi la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po
i217b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams gi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
i217b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ mchi ma'i lha rnams gi 'od la gnas myong nga/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
i217b8('bum): bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skyeng ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi ngan myed de/ rab 'byor 'di laste dper na/ dga' ldan gi lha rnams la gnas myed de/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'adzin pa shes rab gi pha rol tu phyi
i218a1('bum): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste/ dper na 'phrul dga'i lha rnams gi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de 'di zhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ni shes rab kyi pha
i218a2('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi de na myed do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ gzhan ye 'phrul/ dbang byed gi lha rnams gi 'od la gnas myed de/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
i218a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes zab gi pha rol tu phyini pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi de na med do// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste/ dper na tshangs ris gi lha rnams gi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ses
i218a4('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab gi pha rolag tu phyind pa la la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed de/ rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs lnga nye phan gi lha rnams ga 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' seMs
i218a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams gi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de de bzhin byang chub ses dpa' sems
i218a6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na tshangs chen gi lha rnams gi 'od la gnas myed/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems

i218a8('bum): dang nyon ci shes rab kyis yang du phyi dad pa la spyod pa'i bya chub sems dpa'i tshig gi ngan myedang/ rab 'byar 'das ste dper de// chung snang gis rnams gi bde la gnas myong nga/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems pa

i218b6('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byorang 'di lta ste dper na che ba'i lha rnams gi 'od la gnas med de/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
i218b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed de/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chung che'i lnga rnams gi 'ong la gnas myo dang / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sem
i218b8('bum): dpa' chen po shas rab kyi pha ral tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig ga din myed de/ rab 'byor nga 'di lta ste dper na/ tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams gi 'od la gnas myed de/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
i219a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen bro shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams gi 'od la gnas myed
i219a2('bum): do rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi don myed do// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na
i219a3('bum): rnams gi 'di la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
i219a4('bum): padagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gi 'od la gnas myed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshig gi don myed do// rade ci'i phyir zhe na rab 'byor nga 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa
i219a5('bum): dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don myengad de/ gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin mu ldan pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs myed pa ltar snyan tu myad pa thogs pa myed pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed par mtshan ring
i219a6('bum): gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byar nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ga myong ba stong pa nyid la srab par bya'o// chos thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rig par bya'o gsam
i219a7('bum): ma bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang la/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma mchis pa yang dag pa nyid la ji ltar slab par bgyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thos cad
i219a8('bum): par gyi/ bcom ldan 'das gos bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nas thams cad ces bya ba na dbye ba dang mya dge ba dang / lung sa nang pa dang / lung du ma snanang ba dang 'jig ninang ba dang / 'jig rtenang las 'das pa dang zag pa dang bcas pa
i219b1('bum): zag pa myed pa dang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / kha na ma tho ba myang ba dang / thun mong dang thun mang ma yin pa dag pa ste/ rab 'byor da de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/ rabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
i219b2('bum): kyang chos thams cad gi myed pa nyid la slab par bya'o// rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes par bya ba yang chos thams cad pa de dag nyid do/ gsel ba bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i mu dge
i219b3('bum): 'ches gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das gis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rte nad pa'i chos dge zhes bya ba ni/ pade shes pa/ mar shes pa dge steng du shes pa/ bram ze shes pa/ rigs gi nang na shes pa
i219b4('bum): la rim gror byed pa sma nad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams gi las gi dngos pa dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i ba dang / sgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams gya las go dngos po dang nyams su blang ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang / dge ba bcu
i219b5('bum): 'i las gyi lam rnams dang 'jig rtend pa 'du shes rga ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa 'du shes dang / 'bru can gi 'du shes dang / rnam par brnags pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa 'du shA
i219b6('bum): da / rnam par zos pa 'du shes dang rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rte na pa'i bsam gtan gzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa
i219b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di ltarasangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rje su dran pa dang tshul khrims rjes su dran/ 
i219b8('bum): dang / gdong ba su dran pa dang / sachis su dran pa dang / dbugs byin du byu rjes su dran pa dang / lus go rnam parjes su dran pa dang / sgo brjes su dran pa dang / 'tsho'i u can bdag gi/ rangag ni 'jig nad pas chas dug thor/ 
i220a1('bum): gsolang ba bcom ldan 'das 'jig rtenang pa pa'i chos mi dge ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das gis bka' stsal ba/ myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dgas/ 'di ltar rab 'byor nga srag gtsang pa 'jig rten
i220a2('bum): pa'i chos myi dge ba'i/ rab 'byor bam byin par len pa ni 'jig rtenang pa'i chos myi dge ba'o// rab 'byor 'dod pas log par g.yem pa ni 'jig da nang ba'i chos ma dge ba'i/ rab 'byang nga rdzur du smra bar 'jig rten pa'i chos myi dge ba/ 
i220a3('bum): rab 'byorang phra ma ni 'jig rte nang pa'i chos myi dge ba'o// rab 'byor pa zhe gcong pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos myi dge ba'o// rab 'byorang tshig khyalang ba ni 'jig rte nang pa'i chos myi dge ba'o// rab 'byor chags sems ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rgya
i220a4('bum): dge ba'o// rab 'byoraro gnade sems ni 'jig rtenang pa'i chos la myi dge ba'o// rab 'byorarnyed log par lta ba ni 'jig rtend pa'i chos myi dge ba'o rab 'byor nga 'khro ba dang / mdud par 'dzind pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang 'tshe ba dang / 'phra dag
i220a5('bum): dang ser sna dang nga rgyal dang log pa'i nga rgyal ste// rab 'byor de de dag ni 'jig rtend pa'i chos myi dge ba'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das lung du ma stand pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das gyis bka' stsald pa/ lus gi la
i220a6('bum): lung du ma sngand pa'o// ngag gi las ni lung du ma sngand pa'o/ yang gi las na lung du ma stand pa'o// 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung du ste nad pa'o// dbang po lnga ni lung du snganang pa'o// skye mched drug ni lung du ma stanang pa'o// gzugs myed pa
i220a7('bum): bzhi/ skyes pa ni lung du ma stand pa'i/ phung po rnams ni lung du ma sta nad pa'/ khams rnams ni lung du ma stand pa'o// skye mched rnams ni lung du snga nad pa'o/ rnam par sma nang pa thams cad ni lung du ma snganang pa'o// rab 'byor de dag ni lung
i220a8('bum): ma smand pa'o// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das 'jig rtenang ga'i ches gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das gis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga 'jig rje nad pa 'chis zhes bya ba ni lung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khas pan r+yang
i220b1('bum): dge ba bcu'i las gi lam dang / bsam gtan gzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rtend las 'das pa'i chos ma rtogs par de ma yin pa 'jig rtend pa'i chos
i220b2('bum): gang ji snyed yod pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da 'jig rtend las 'das pa'i chos zhes pa da
i220b3('bum): ni dran pa 'a bar gzhag pa bzhi dang yang dag par spang ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrub gi rkang pa bzhi dang dbang ba lnga dang stobs lnga dang byang chub gi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa 'a lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / 
i220b4('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgra smin pa myed pa dang ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang ba dang / yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang ba dang / yongs su shes rtogs pa'i dbang po// rtag pa dang bcas pa spod pa dang / bcas pa'i ji
i220b5('bum): nge 'dzind dang / rtog pa myed pa la spyad pa tsam gyi ring nge 'dzind dang / rtog pa myed cing spyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / ma rig pa dang rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang shes bzhini dang tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang / rnam par tha rang pa brgyad
i220b6('bum): brkyad gang zhen gzugs dang ldan pas gzugs mthong ba 'di mi/ rnam par tho rang ba dang ba'o nang gzugs myed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/ phyi ro lang ga gzugs mthong ba 'di ni/ rnam par tha rang pa gnyis pa'o/ sdug par mos pa 'gyur ba
i220b7('bum): ma da ba gsum pa la/ ma pa thams cad du gzugs she 'du shes la yang dag par 'dos te/ migs pa'i 'dug pa rnams par gyu ma tshogs gdunas me sa kyi byung ngas rnams pa mi 'ams man pan/ 
i220b8('bum): rnamam pa yin mas skye ca sa' bar sbubs gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thard pa ba na'o/ nga rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha'amasa'ams sbyi mched la yang dge par 'das de nam shes mab mas ma/ 'as rnam shes mas sa
i221a1('bum): skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par tha rad ba lnga'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad med pa zhes cung zad myed po'i skye mched la
i221a2('bum): bar skabs te gnas pa 'di ni/ rnam bar tha rad ba drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du/ cung zad myed pa'i skye ba'i mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med myin skye mched la nye bar skabs te gnas pa'i
i221a3('bum): ni rna ma 'ir tha rad pa 'dun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin sku mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gag pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar de brgyad pa'o/ de rnam
i221a4('bum): bar tha rad brgyad pa de dag dang / mtha rang gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de 'dod pas dben sA gi to mya dge ba'i chos gyis dben pa rtog dang bcas pa spang ba dang bcas pa dpon pa las
i221a5('bum): skyes pa'i dag 'a bde can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar skabs de gnas pa'o/ de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par spang ba nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems ga rgyad gcig tu gyu rang bas rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa sngo
i221a6('bum): myang ba'i ting nge 'dzinang las skyes pa'i dga' dang bde ca bsam gdan gnyis pa la nye bar skabs de gnas gangade dga' ba las 'dang chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du bdang snyoms su gnas te/ bang ba lus
i221a7('bum): gyis myang ba rnams gis/ da la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyad pa btang snyoms pa'o// zhes brjong ba ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bas gang na gsum pA la nye bar spabs te/ gnas so// de bde ba yang sangs sug sprul ba yang spangs
i221a8('bum): yod bde ba dang / yid mya bde snga nas kyang nub pas/ bang pab yang myed sdug sngal ba yang yang gtang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dge ba'i bsam gtan gzhil le bar snabs te gnas pas/ de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs go 'dum
i221b1('bum): las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs gi 'du shes myed pas/ nam mkha' yas sa zhes nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched lan bar sbubs de gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad
i221b2('bum): dunam mkha'i mtha' mas skye mched la yang dag par 'das te rnam shis mtha' yas/ zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so/ de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las dag par 'dus te/

i221b5('bum): nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen pa stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'dres pa sa
i221b6('bum): banyid dang / theg ma dang tha ma myed pa steng pa ring dang / dor bamyed pa stong ba nyid dang / rang bzhin stong ba nyid dang / chos thams cang stong ba 'di dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dang dngos po myed ba srung brjo / 
i221b7('bum): dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngas tho myang ba 'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skabs bcud na myi 'jigs pabazhi dngas so yang dag par rig pa pazhing ngo // sangs rgyas gi chos ma 'dres pani brdungs/

i222a6('bum): byas pa ches shes bya ba ni 'dang ba'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs mye ba'i khams dang / gzhan ma yin pa 'dus byas kyi khams su rdzogs pa rnams dang/ dran pa'abar gzhag kha ba'i dang yang dag

i223a2('bum): ni thun meng ma yin pa'i chos shes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dpal spyod pas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa myed pas chags
i223a3('bum): bar myi bya'o// chos thams cad gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gis rdog pa cing rnam par rtog pa myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad khong du chud bar bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te ba

i223b1('bum): can gi phung po nges pa'i phul zhes bya'o// gsol ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems snyed pa lags pacom ldan 'das gis bka' stsal da ba/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sems skyed do//

i224a1('bum): bye ba khrag khrig brgya steng mang por sems can gang yang phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yong su mya ngan las ma zlas kya bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug sngal de dag kyang bdag gis nyams
i224a2('bum): su myong bar bya'o zhes thams cad de lta bu'i sems can thams cad gi don du sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das ma blas gi bar du sems can dmyal ba'i sdug sAl de dag thams cad kyang nyams su myong
i224a3('bum): bar bya'o/ de nas gdod bdag gi don du dag pa'i rtsa ba skyed de/ skal ba bye ba khrag khrig rgyu steng du mar byang chub gi tshogs mang po bsags te bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par tshang rgya bar bya

i224a6('bum): bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems rlabs po che ni sems dang po skad phyi nad chad 'dod chags gi sems myi snyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mya skyed/ gti mug gi sems skyed/ gtsa ba'i sems myi skyed nyan thos

i224b4('bum): tshul gis byed do rab 'byor da gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun de myi 'chad par chos 'dod par bya'o// chos la dga' bar bya'o ches la mos par bya'o// chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor brtson par bya'o/ 
i224b5('bum): de la chos gang zhe na chos thams cad dbyer myed pa ste/ 'di na chos shes bya'o// de la chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ 'di ni chos 'dod pa'o// de la tshas la dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos de la dga' zhing / mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'di
i224b6('bum): ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la mos pa gang zhe na/ chos de la yon tan du lta ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la rnga mos pa'i rnal 'byor da la btson pa gang zhe na/ chos de gnyis la sgom zhing mang
i224b7('bum): du byed pa ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor de la brtsan zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind la spyod pas/ sems can gi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul mye myig
i224b8('bum): pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi steng pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ stong pa
i225a1('bum): nyid la stong pa nyid la gnas/ chen po stong pa nyid la gnas/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la gnas// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la gnas/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ thog tha dad tha ma
i225a2('bum): stong pa nyid la gnas dor ba myed pa stong nyid la gnas/ rang bzhini stong pa nyid la gnas chos thams cad stong pa nyid la gnas/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la gnas/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la gnas/ dang so bo myed pa stong pa nyid la gan

i225a4('bum): phyi nad pa la spyod pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas yang dag par spong ba rnams la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la gnas/ dbang po rnams la gnas snga bos rnaMs la gnas/ byang chub gi yan lag rnams la gnas
i225a5('bum): 'phags pa 'a lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la gnas/ bsam gtan rnams la gnas tshad myed pa rnams la gnas/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par thar pa rjes
i225a6('bum): la gnas/ mtha rang gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smin pa myed pa la gnas/ mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas/ gzungs
i225a7('bum): gyi sgo rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rjes la gnas/ mya 'jirags pa rnams la gnas/ so so la yang dag par rig pa rnams la gnas/ khyams pa chen po le gnas/ snying rje chen po la gnas sangs rgyas gi chos 'dres bco rgyang
i225a8('bum): la gnas te/ sems can gi phung po rnamadzes pa'i phul du ma dmyags pa'i tshul gis 'gyur bar bya ba/ rab 'byor gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rbab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la ga
i225b1('bum): rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ seng ge rnam par brtse ba'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ zla ba bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bzla ba rgyal mtshan dpal gting nge 'dzind la gnas/ chos thas cad las shan tu 'phags pa'i ting
i225b2('bum): 'dzind la gnas/ chos thams cad gi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ chos gi dbyings su nges pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal gi ting nge 'dzin la
i225b3('bum): gnas/ rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ ting nge 'dzind la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas/ pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'ad zer rab tu byed pa 'ating nge 'dzind la gnas/ dpung rnam par
i225b4('bum): bkod pa'i tong nge dzin la gnas/ yang dag par 'bags pa nang du gnas/ nges pa'i tshig la den myi ba bar 'dug pa'i nga 'dzind la gnas/ tshig bla dgas la yang dag par 'jug pa dong nge 'dzin sa gnas phyogs du
i225b5('bum): rnam bdag pa'i ring 'dzin lnga gnas/ rgya ga rgya'i yong su badzin pa zhes bya ba'i dang nga 'dzin la gnas nyam pa myed pa 'di de 'dzin la gnas/ chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya ma tsho'i phyag rgya 'dzing de 'dzin la gnas nam ma kha' rgya sa
i225b6('bum): pa'i dang nge 'dzin la gnas/ ji rjod kyil 'khong giding nge 'dzin pa gnas/ rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dbang po dpal ga dang 'dzinid la gnas/ mi dngul sna ti ni la gnas/ rgyu gan sus
i225b7('bum): ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ sprul bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs pa spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas tshal ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gnas la rten myed pa'i ding nge 'dzin
i225b8('bum): la gnas sems myed pa'i ding nge 'dzin la gnas/ dri ma phyed pa'i ding nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'ad mtha' yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'ang byed pa'i ding nge 'dzin la gnas/ kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dag pa dam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'ad bye
i226a1('bum): myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ dga' ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ glog gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ zad mya shis pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas// 'pham pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ gzi brjid yod pa
i226a2('bum): 'dzind la gnas/ zad pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ myi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ myi 'jig pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ nyi ma'i sgron ma 'i ting nge 'dzin de la gnas/ zla ba dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas shag
i226a3('bum): dpal gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas// rdo rje lta bu 'a tingar 'dzin la DAganas/ sems gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ kun tu snang ba 'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas rab tu gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas rin chen mtha'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 
i226a4('bum): chos dam pa'i ting nge 'dzand la gan sa chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas dga' spong ba'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ chos gyis 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas rno bar mtho ba Shi ting nge 'dzin de la gnas ras bris
i226a5('bum): tsad gi tshig rab tu 'byed pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ yi ge mnyam pa nyid 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ yi dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ dmyigs pa gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'gyur ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ga nas
i226a6('bum): myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ mying nges par 'jug pa'i dang de 'dzind la gnas/ gnas myed par spyod pa'i ting 'dzind la gnas/ rab rib myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / gnas/ spyod pa dang ldan pa'i yid ting nge 'dzinang la gnas/ g.ya
i226a7('bum): mang ba'i ding nge 'dzin la gnas/ g.yul las rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzinid la gnas/ yan ngan thams cad gi tshogs su 'gyur ba'i ding nge 'dzind la gnas/ sems myed par gnas po 'ding nge 'dzin de la gnas dge ba'i me dag rgyas shing
i226a8('bum): be'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ byang chub gi yan lag yod pa'i ding nge 'dzin la gnas/ gangs pa tham yas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la kAnas/ mya ma'am 'a dang / mnyam pa'i ding nge 'dzin la gnas/ ches zas cad la 'da' ba'i ding nge 'dzin laganas
i226b1('bum): gcod pa med pa 'iting nge 'dzind la gnas/ nem nur rnam par selang ba'i ting 'dzin la rnam gnas su bya ba byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gcig tu rnam par bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa'i ting nge 'ja
i226b2('bum): gnas rnam pa gcig tu gyu rad pa 'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnam par 'dor ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi 'thams cad khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas bda' dang sgra la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas
i226b3('bum): dbyangs gi yi ge dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ sgron ma 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mtshan nyid yongs su stong pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ mngon par dmyigs pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ rnaM ba'i mchog thas cad dang ldan pa'i
i226b4('bum): ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ bde ba dang sdug sngal thams cad la mngon par dag pa myed pa la ting nge 'dzind la gnas zad myi shes pa'i za ma tog gi ting nge 'dzind la gnas gzungs gi gros gyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad
i226b5('bum): yang dag par sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ mthun pa 'gal ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ 'od dri ma med pa'i ting nge 'dza ni la gnas/ snying
i226b6('bum): ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ zla ba dri ba myed par rgyas pa'i 'od a gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ gra go gi 'od gi ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ rgyan chen pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ rnam pa thas cad du 'ad byed pa'i ting nge 'dzini la gnas/ ting nge
i226b7('bum): 'janid mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzini la gnas/ rdul myed cing tshul dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thas cad nyon mongs pa myed par yang dag par gzhol
i226b8('bum): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gan suM/ gnas myig su myed pa la brtson pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ lus gi skyonamyed pa yang dag par se lang ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas ngag gi
i227a1('bum): rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' lngar gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar tshogs be mud pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa myed pa'i ti ngange 'dzinang la gnas desas can gyi phung po chen ba nges pa'i bu 'ang rgya
i227a2('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sems can ga phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed pas de'i phyir byang chub
i227a3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// shes rab bam pa bcu bdun pa'o// 
i227a4('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold // bcom ldan 'das don gang gyi srad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang skabs pa skyed pa
i227a5('bum): ldan 'das gyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra pA ti'i bu gang gyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen zhes bgyi ba de la spobs pa skyed cig sha ra dwa ti'i bus she gsolang pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba'i rab tu spang ba'i
i227a6('bum): sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sems can du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sreg tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gas par lta bar sa ba tu spang ba dang / skyes bur lta ba rab tu spang ba dang shed can du lta bar
i227a7('bum): tu spang ba dang / shed bdag lnga pa rab tu spang ba dang byed pa par lnga pa rab tu spang tra dang / byed du 'jug pa par lta ba dung / srang ba por rab tu spang ba dang / yongs su slong ba bar rab tu spang ba dang / tshor ba po ro lnga ba rab tu spang ba dang tshor du 'jug pa por
i227a8('bum): bdu shes pa per rab tu lta ba dang / mthong ba der rab tu lta ba dang chud par lnga ba rab tu spang ba dang / rtag brda lnga pa rab tu spang ba dang / yang bar lnga pa rab tu spang ba dang / myong bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang phung po lnga pa rab du spang ba dang / khas su lnga gang tu
i227b1('bum): lag pa brgyad par lnga pa rab tu spang ba dang 'phags pa'i bden par lte ba rab tu spang ba dang / bsam gtan du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang chang myang bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa lta ba rab tu spang ba dang rno bar thar brgyad dang / 
i227b2('bum): mtha rang gis gnas pa'i skems par 'jug pa rnams lta ba rab tu snang ba dang / rnam par tha rang ba'i sgo spong ba 'dadi dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smanod pa myang ba myu ralta ba rab tu sa ba dang / mngon par shes par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / ting nge 'dzin du

i227b4('bum): rab tu spang ba dang / snying rje chen por lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas gi chos ma 'dres par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par lta ba rab tu spang ba dang byang chub tu
i227b5('bum): lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / sangs rgyas su lA ba rab tu spang ba dang / chos su lta ba rab tu spang ba dang / dge 'dun du lta ba rab tu spang ba dang chos gi khar lo skor bar lta ba rab tu spang ba dang yongasu mya ngan las 'das par lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du sems cad/ 
i227b6('bum): rnams ma chis ston par 'gyid kyang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i sngal du byang chub sems dpa mams dpa' chen po zhes byal rin sa tshe dang ldan pa'i ba 'byor byos me dang ldan pa shar de ba'i bu 'dzi skad ces skyem mo rje/ 
i228a1('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin 'du shes su lta bar 'gyur ba yin 'du byed du lta bar 'gyur
i228a2('bum): yin/ rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ myig du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna bArla lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ snar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lcer lngar 'gyur ba yin/ lus su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin

i228a4('bum): yang yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sA'i rna bar shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lce'i rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin yid gi rno bar shes par
i228a5('bum): lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sna'i 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lha'i 'dus te reg par lnga bar 'gyur ba yani lus gi 'dus de reg
i228a6('bum): thar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba'i yin/ rna ba'i dus te reg pa'i rkyen gos tshor bar 'gyur ba ye ni/ sna'i dus te reg pa'i rkye nang gis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin la 'dus
i228a7('bum): te reg pa'i rkye nang gis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ lus gi 'dus de reg pa'i rkyend gyes tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yid gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nang gis tshor bar byar 'gyur ba yin/ sa'i khas su lta bar ra 'gyur ba yin
i228a8('bum): chu'i khams su lta bar 'gyur ba yin ma'i khas su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rlung gi kham su 'gyur ba yin/ nam mkha'i kha su 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par shes pa'i kham su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ ma rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin 'du byed du
i228b1('bum): rnal par 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ myi dang gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ skye mched drug dulta bar 'gyur ba yin nag par lta bar 'gyur/ bla yin tshong bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin sred par lta bar/ 
i228b2('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ len par lta bar 'gyur ba yin srid par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ skye bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rga shing blta bar 'gyur ba yin// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin la ba 'gyur ba yini tshul khrims kyi ba rolang tu phyin
i228b3('bum): par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind par lta bar 'gyur ba yod/ bsam gtan ga pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i228b4('bum): phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin nang stong pa nyid lta bar 'gyur ba yin phyi stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin phyi nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chen po stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin
i228b5('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'dus ma byas stong ba nyid du 'gyur ba yin/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du 'a
i228b6('bum): par 'gyur ba yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yini rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yini myi dmyigs stong

i229a1('bum): ba yin/ 'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshad myong bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par tha rad par lta ba
i229a2('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ mtharang gis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smand pa myed par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mngon par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin ting nge 'dzin
i229a3('bum): du lta bar 'gyur ba yin gzungs ga sgor lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stob su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ myi 'jigs par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ so so yang dag par rig par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byis pa chen por lta bar 'gyur
i229a4('bum): ba yini/ snying rje chen por lta bar 'gyur ba yani/ sangs rgyas ga chis ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sos can yong su sman par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas gi zhing yong su dag par bya bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ byang chub tu lta bar 'gyur ba yin
i229a5('bum): sangs rgya su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ dge 'dun du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos gi 'khor lo nga bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba yin/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub
i229a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs myi mkhas pas/ gzug su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta bskyed do// tshor bar myigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed nge 'du shesu dbye
i229a7('bum): shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed de/ 'du byed du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gos lnga bskyed do/ rnam par shes par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed de// myig du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lba ba skyeng nganapa
i229a8('bum): dbyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed de/ snor myigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lnga bskyed nga/ lcer dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sna bskyed de/ su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa 'a tshul gis la saskyed da yang du dmyig
i229b1('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// gzugs su myigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lte ba skyed de/ sgrar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gas lta ba skyed do// drir myigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta bskyed de/ ror dmyigs
i229b2('bum): shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// reg du dmyigs shing / dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// cho su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed de/ myig gi rnam par shes par dmyigs shing dmyigs po'i tshul gyis sna
i229b3('bum): skyed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba bskyed do// sna'i rnam par shes par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta bskyed do// lha'i rnam par shes par myigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba smad do// 
i229b4('bum): lus gyi 'arna bar shes par myigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do// yid gi 'dud rnam par shes par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do/ myig gi 'dus te reg par myigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga
i229b5('bum): bskyed do// rna ba 'dus te reg par myigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do// sna 'dus te reg par myigs shing dmyigs pa 'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// lce 'dus te reg par myi dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do lus gi
i229b6('bum): 'dus te reg par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gas lta ba skyed do// yid gi 'dus te reg par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyenang gis/ tshor bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta
i229b7('bum): bal skyed do// rna ba 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshar bar myigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lci ba skyed de/ sna 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gis tshor byar dmyigs shing dmyigs po'i tshul gyis la bskyed do lce 'dus de rig pa'i rkyen gos tshor / 
i229b8('bum): dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gas lta bar skyed do// lus gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gis tshor bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// yang gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gis tshor bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi lta ba skyed sa'i khadu
i230a1('bum): dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba myed do// chu'i khams su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do// me'i khams su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do// rlung gi kham su dmigs shing du
i230a2('bum): pa'i tshul gis lta bskyed do// nam mkha'i khamasu dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed de/ rnam par shes pa'i khams su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do// ma rig par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa
i230a3('bum): tshul gis lta ba skyed do// 'du byed du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rnam par shes par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa 'tshul gis lta bskyed do// mying dang gzugs su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gse ldang/ 
i230a4('bum): skyed do// skye mched drug du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed de/ reg par myigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do// tshor bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do// sred par myigs shing dmyigs
i230a5('bum): po'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// len par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba snyed de/ srid par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba snyed do// skye bar dmyigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do/ rga shir myigs
i230a6('bum): shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed de/ sbyind pa'i pha rol tu phyin par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba snyed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba snyed de/ bzod pa'i
i230a7('bum): pha rold tu phyind par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gas lta ba skyed do/ brtson 'grus gi pha rol tu phyin par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed de/ bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyin par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i
i230a8('bum): tshul gis lta ba snyed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par dmyigs shing du myags pa'i tshul gas lta po stod de/ nang stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gas lta ba snyed de/ phyi nang stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i
i230b1('bum): tshul gyis lnga ba skyed do// phyi nang stong ba nyid du dmyags shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// man po gang mnang du dmyigs shing dmyigs par chu
i230b2('bum): gyis lta ba skyed de/ den dam pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed de/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed de/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs
i230b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed de// dor ba myed pa stong ba nyid
i230b4('bum): du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// rang bzhin mya stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skye ba myed do/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyeng ngo // 
i230b5('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do// myi dmyigs pa bstong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'itshul gyis lta ba skyed do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba sa
i230b6('bum): skyed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed de/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do dran pa nye bar gzhag par myigs dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis
i230b7('bum): bskyed de/ yang dag par spong ba dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sa bskyed de/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed de/ dbang por dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyi la lta ba skyed de/ su / 
i230b8('bum): shing dmyigs pa'i tshul rgyas lA bskye nga/ byang chub kyi yan lag tu dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad par dmyigs shing dmyig pa'i tshul gse lnga bskyed de/ lalags pa'i badzin
i231a1('bum): par dmyigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// bsam gtan du dmyigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// tshad myed par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed de gzugs myed pa
i231a2('bum): bar 'jug par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do// rnam par tha rad par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed de mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gas lta ba
i231a3('bum): bskyed do/ rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa myed par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba snyed do// mngon par shes par dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do// ting nge 'dzin du dmyigs shi
i231a4('bum): dmyigs pa 'tshul gyis lta ba snyed de/ gzungs gi sgor dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed do// de bzhini gshegs po'i stobasu dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba snyed de/ myi 'jigs par dmyigs shi
i231a5('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba spyod de/ so so yang dag par rig par myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lta ba skyed de/ byams pa tshon por dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba skyed do// snying rje chen por dmyigs shing dmigs pa'i
i231a6('bum): tshul gis lta ba skyed do/ sangs rgyas gi chos ma 'dras par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gi lta ba spyad do/ sems can yongs su smin par bya bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis lngab skyed de/ byang chub tu dmyigs
i231a7('bum): shing dmyigs po'i tshul gyis lta ba snyed do// sangs rgya su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba snyed de/ chos su dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba snyed do/ dge 'dun du dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gri
i231a8('bum): lnga bsnyed de// chos 'khar lo skor bar dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis lta bskyed do// ying su mya ngan los 'das par dmyigs shing dmyigs pa'i tshul gis swa bskyed do// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da da ci'i phyir byang chubo seMs dpa' sems
i231b1('bum): sems dpa' chen pos gzugs su lta bar skyed do// cher bar lta ba dang 'du shes su lta ba dang 'du byed du lta ba dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir myug du lta bar 'gyur ba yin rna bar lta bar 'gyur dang sna
i231b2('bum): lnga ba dang lhur lta ba dang lus su ltar ba dang yid du lta ba dang / de'i phyir gzugasu lnga bar 'gyur ba yin slar lta ba dang der lta ba dang ror lta ba dang reg du lta ba dang / chos su lta bar 'gyur ba yin de'i phyir mig gi rnam par shes par
i231b3('bum): lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rnam par shes par lta ba dang sna'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang lce'i rnam par shes par lta ba dang lus gi rnam par shes par lta ba dang / yid gi rnam par shes par 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir myig gi 'dus te
i231b4('bum): reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ rna ba'i dus te reg par lta ba dang lce 'dus te reg par lta ba dang / lus gyi 'dus te reg par lta ba dang yid gi 'dus te reg par lta bar 'gyur ba yin de'i phyir myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gi tshor bar lta bar 'gyur/ 
i231b5('bum): yin/ rna ba 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gis tshor bar lta ba dang / sna 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad gis tshor bar lta ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gis tshor bar lta ba dang / yid gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gis tshor bar lta bar 'gyur ba yin de'i
i231b6('bum): phyi sa'i kham su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chu'i kham su lta ba dang / mye 'khas su lta ba dang / rlung gi khams su lta ba dang / nam mkha'i khams su lwa ba dang rnam par shes pa'i khas su lta bar 'gyur ba yin de'i phyir ma rig pa
i231b7('bum): 'gyur ba yin/ 'du byed du lta ba dang rna bar shes par lta ba dang myang dang gzugasul pa dang skye mched drug du lta ba dang / reg par lta ba dang tshor bar lta ba dang sred par sa pa dang len par lnga ba dang srid bar lta ba dang skye bar lta ba dang ma shir ma
i231b8('bum): 'gyur ba yin de'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha ra lang tu phyin par lta ba dang / bzod pa 'a pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin par lta ba dang bsam gtan gi ba'ilang du phyin pas
i232a1('bum): lta ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rald tu phyin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir nang stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ phyi stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid du lta ba dang stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / chen ba snang po
i232a2('bum): du lta ba dang don dam snang ba nyid du lta ba dang / 'dus pas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid du lta ba dang mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid du lta ba dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / dor ba myang ba stong pa nyi du lta ba dang /
