i232a4('bum): stong pa nyid du lta bar 'gyur ba yin de'i phyir dran pa nye bar gzhag par lta bar 'gyur ba yin yang dag par spong bar lta ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par lta ba dang dbang por lta ba dang stobs su lta ba dang / byang chub gi yan lag du lta ba dang / la du lta bar 'gyur
i232a5('bum): ba yin/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ bsam gtan du lta ba dang / tshad myed par lta ba dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug dar lta ba dang / rnam par tha rad bar lta ba dang / mthar gis gnangs pa'i snyoms par 'jog

i232a7('bum): bar lta ba dang / so so yang dag par rig par lta ba dang / snying rje chen por lta ba dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ de'i phyir sems can yongasu smin par lta bar 'gyur ba yin sangs rgyas gi zhing yong su dag par lta ba dang byang chub tu lta
i232a8('bum): dang sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / tsa su lta ba dang dge 'dun dulta pa dang tshas kyi lakhang lo skor bar lta ba ye sumya dran las 'dang da lta bar 'gyur ba yin pa de la byang nathosas dpa' sems dpa' chen du shes rang kyis bang du phyin pa la spyang pa'i tshe/ khams
i232b1('bum): mkhas pas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis rnga bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gyi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems
i232b2('bum): dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de dag la yang spobs pa skya'o// bcom ldan 'das gyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor da khyod gis/ spobs pa cag/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub gyi sems myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i seMs
i232b3('bum): nyan thos dang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / thun mong ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu la yang chags pa ma mchis/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'i/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gi sems
i232b4('bum): de ni/ zag pa ma mchis shing khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ltar thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mnas shing khams gsum gyi khong su chud pa ma mchis pa'i sems de la 'ong rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid gi slad du
i232b5('bum): chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su 'chi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan sha ra dwa ta'i bus tshe dang ldan pa/ rab 'byorod la 'di skad ces ga smos so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor da byang chub seMs dang
i232b6('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi mnyam dang mnyam pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'u 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po sems dang po
i232b7('bum): skyed phyin chad chos gang yang skye ba yang dag par rje su myi mthong ba dang / 'gog pa dang 'phel ba dang 'grib pa dang 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rje su myi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa'i bu gang la skye ba myed cing
i232b8('bum): 'gag pa myang ba dang / 'phel po myed cing 'grab pa myed pa dang / 'ong ba myed cing 'gro ba myang ba dang kun nas nyon mongs pa myed cing rnam par byang ba myed pa de la nyan thos gi sem/ sa myed do// rang sangs rgyas gi sems myed do// byang chub sems dpa'i ses myed ji yang dag
i233a1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gi sems myed do// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang sangs rgyas thams cad dang zhur ma
i233a2('bum): yin pa'i sems smras pa tshe dang ldan 'a bya / rab 'byor de gang khyod gis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyend pa nyid gi sems zag pa myed pa khongs su chud pa myed pa de lta bu'i sems de la chags pa myed do// zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te tshe dang
i233a3('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor de bas na gzugs kyang chags pa myed do// tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// 'du shes kyang chags pa myed do// 'du byed kyang chags pa myed do// rnam par shes pa yang chags pa myed do// myig kyang chags ba myed de sna yang chags pa
i233a4('bum): myed de/ lce yang chags pa myed do// lus kyang chags pa myed do// yid kyang chags pa myed do// gzugs kyang chagaso ba myed do// sgra yang chags pa myed de/ dri yang chags bamyed/ ro yang chags pa myed do// reg kyang chags pa myed do// chos kyang mags

i233b5('bum): ba myed de/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang chags pa myed de/ theb

i234b1('bum): ba yang chags pa myed do// sna 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed de lce'i'adus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do// lus gi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myed do yid gi 'dus te reg pa yang chags pa myang ngo // myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen na
i234b2('bum): tshor ba yang chags pa myed de/ rna ba 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend gas tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// sna 'dus te re te reg pa'i rkye nad gis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do// lce 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad gis tshor ba yang chags pa myed do lus gi 'dus
i234b3('bum): de reg pa'i rkyen gis tshor ba yang chags pa myed de/ yid gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gis tshor ba yang chags pa myad do// sa'i khams kyang chags pa myed do chu'i khams kyang chags pa myed do// me'i khams kyang chags pa myad do// rlung gi khes kyang mas

i244b2('bum): chags pa myed do// mngon par shes pa myed pa yang mngon par shes pa rnams la chags kha myed do// ting nge 'dzinid myed pa yang ting nge 'dzind rnams la chags pa myed do// gzungs gi sgo myed pa yang gzung
i244b3('bum): gi sgo rnams la chags pa myed do// so de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs myed pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la chags pa myed do// so so yang dag par rig pa myed pa yang so so yang dag par
i244b4('bum): rig pa rnams myed pa la chags pa myed do// byams pa chen po myed pa yang byams pa chen po la chags pa myed do// snying rje chen po myed pa yang snying rje chen po la chags khri myed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
i244b5('bum): ba myed pa yang sangs rgyas kyi chos mi 'dres pa rnams la chags pa myed do// thams cad shes pa nyid myed pa yang thams cad shes pa nyid la chags pa myed// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid myeng ba yang lam gyi
i244b6('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid la chags pa myed// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myed pa yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa myedado// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
i244b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi sems myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang rung sangs rgyas thams cadadang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des
i244b8('bum): kyang / chos thams cad la dmyigs pa myed pa'i tshul gis rlos sems su 'gyur ba myed// mngon par chags par 'gyur ba myed pas/ de'i phyir la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya
i245a1('bum): de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol ngo to// / bcom ldan 'das don gang gi srang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la
i245a2('bum): bdag kyang spobs pa ste'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis spobs pa snyed cig/ gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can
i245a3('bum): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can la/ de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags pas/ de'i srad du bang chub ses
i245a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dI ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams gang gi bu la 'di skad ces slaso// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam \u0f7fgyis na byang chun pa sems dpa'
i245a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha chen po bges pa zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan po sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can nyung zad nyi ci zhig gi don du/ sbyin
i245a6('bum): pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // sems can
i245a7('bum): nyung zad nyi tse'i don du tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims srung la yin gi sems can thams cad gi don du tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims
i245a8('bum): srung ngo // sems can nyung zad gi nyi tse'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin gi/ sems can thams cad gi don du bzod pa'i pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod
i245b1('bum): cing bzod pa bsgom mo/ sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la grinas shing brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gi sems can thams cad gi don du brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin
i245b2('bum): pa la sbed cing brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyi ri bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas shing bsam gtan skyed pa ma yin gi/ sems can thams cad gi don du bsgom
i245b3('bum): gtan gi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan skyed do// sems can nyung zad nyi tse'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing shes rab bsgom pa ma yin gi/ sems can thams cad gi
i245b4('bum): don du/ shes rab kyi pha ralang tu phyi ni ba la spyod cang shes rab bsgom mo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings yos
i245b5('bum): mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar myi bya'o zhes sam/ sems can 'di snyed cag ni byang chub tu bgod par bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu
i245b6('bum): dgod par bya'o sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha myi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad gi don du go cha chen po gyon te/ de 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis
i245b7('bum): kyang sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
i245b8('bum): rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyi nid pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thos
i246a1('bum): cad kyang bzang pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rtson grus / pha rol tu phyind pa yong su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
i246a2('bum): phyi nang pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ 
i246a3('bum): bdag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang nang stong pa nyid yongasu
i246a4('bum): rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang nang stong pa nyid la sbar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ sems can thams cad kyang phyi stong pa nyid yongasu
i246a5('bum): rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid pa la sbar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang ste
i246a6('bum): stong pa nyid la sbar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang chen po stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang don dam pa stong pa
i246a7('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang don dpa pa stong ba nyid la sbar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad
i246a8('bum): kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la sbar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang 'dus pas sdang ba 'di yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thoms cid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nying la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis
i246b1('bum): kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid
i246b2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang glog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can
i246b3('bum): thams cad kyang dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rang bzhini stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sbar bar bya'o bdag
i246b4('bum): gyis kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su
i246b5('bum): rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bya'o// bdag gis kyang myi dmyags pa stong po nyid yong su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mi dmyigs
i246b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang
i246b7('bum): rdo ba zhi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyidi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya
i246b8('bum): sems ca ni thams cad kyang dngangos pa phyed pa'i ba za' nga stong bzhid lta sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dran pa'o sa
i247a1('bum): bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gos kyang yang dag par sheng sa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems ma thams cad kyang yang dag par spong ba bzhi la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rdul
i247a2('bum): gi rkang pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rdzu 'phrulang gi rkang pa bzhi la sbyor bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang nga bang po lnga la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang dab po po'i
i247a3('bum): sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang stobs lnga la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang stobs lnga la sbyar bar bya'i bdag gis kyang byang chub kyi yan lag la gnas par bya'o// sems can tham
i247a4('bum): thams cad kyang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas par sbyor bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i lam
i247a5('bum): yan lag brgad pa la spar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang 'phags pa'i nga bden pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbar bar bya'o// bdag
i247a6('bum): kyang bsam gtan rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan rnams la sbyor bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang tshad myed pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thos
i247a7('bum): cad kyang chang med pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// bdag kyang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas par myi bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa'i sems
i247a8('bum): jug pa ma gams par bya/ bya mi ma pa 'i spangs ma thams cad kyi rnam pa ya brgyang
i247b1('bum): mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dgu la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mtharang gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang rnam par / ra
i247b2('bum): sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang rnam par tha rnyed pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan mi myed pa dang smon pa myed pa la sbar bar bya'o// 
i247b3('bum): bdag kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems
i247b4('bum): thams cad kyang ting nge 'dzi nid rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang gzungs gi sgo rnams la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzungs go sgro la sbyar bar bya'o bdag gis kyang
i247b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas pa'i bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag gis kyang myi 'jigs pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o/ 
i247b6('bum): sems can thams cad kyang myi 'jigs pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sbyar bar
i247b7('bum): bar bya'o// bdag kyang snying rje chen po la gnas par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang snying rje chen po la gasbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par bya'o/ 
i247b8('bum): sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'ongs pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed por bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems ngopa
i248a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
i248a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i gang yongs su gcod pa de dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas me yin gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
i248a3('bum): la bya bas yongs su gting ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can thams cad dang thun med du byas shi / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
i248a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha re lad tu phyind pa la spyod cang / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha ri lad tu phyi nid pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shi ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpra'
i248a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad la khyen pa 'di dang ldan pa'i bya ba yid la bya bas/ sbyar pa'i phra rol yongasu gtong zhing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi la'am du yong su mya sngo ba 'di ri byang
i248a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i ge cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i gzhan yang byang chub
i248a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po he/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas smin pa yongs su gtong zhing chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems
i248a8('bum): dpa' sems lngapa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro la ti ni ba la spyod cang / smin pa yeng su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sas
i248b1('bum): dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus nyams par myi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab tu
i248b2('bum): pa ri lang du phyind pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa
i248b3('bum): yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / de la dmyigs pa gcig tu bya ba'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
i248b4('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams gi go myi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam gtan gi pha rol
i248b5('bum): tu phyind pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen be shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi ning po la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i yongs su gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
i248b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye ba gnas te/ des sbyin pa yang myi dmyigs/ gtong ba yang myi dmyigs len pa yang myi dmyigs pa 'di ni/ 
i248b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyini pa la spyod cing / sbran pa yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pa ro long tu phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub
i248b8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen panyi dang ldan pa'i yang la bya bas/ pha rolang tu phyin pa de dag mtshan mar myi byed pa/ myi dmyigs pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sos
i249a1('bum): pha rolang du phyinang pa la spyang cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa zhidang ldan pa'i yang la bya bas/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba dmams can thams cad dang zhu mong du byas shing blar skad
i249a2('bum): rag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su sngo pa 'ad ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen no// nus khrims kyi pa 'i lang du phyin pa la stong po'i byin po'i' pha yang rje phyin pa ma
i249a3('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gnan yong byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa 'i yang la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha ro mang du phyin pa la smong pa'i 'am thos pa 'a
i249a4('bum): rgyas kyi sa la mos pa myi skyed na/ mi ma'i skye bo'os lta smos kyang ci dgas pa'idi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po tshul khrims kyo pha rol du phyin pa la spyong ba'i du'i khri mams kyi phar
i249a5('bum): tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byas pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha ro lang tu phyin
i249a6('bum): pa la spyod cing / de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la stong pa'i bzod pa'i pha rold du phani pa'o// tsho dang
i249a7('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che ni// bo rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cang brtson grus
i249b1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa myi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
i249b2('bum): chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la spyod cang gnas pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas gi semasu go mya 'byed cang dge ba'i
i249b3('bum): rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi
i249b4('bum): rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gi pha rolong tu phyi ning pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes
i249b5('bum): shes nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrims des kyang rlom sems su myi byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid gi phyir tshul khrims de yang myi dmyigs shing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad
i249b6('bum): dang thun mong du bas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes/ 
i249b7('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyi nang pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha ro lang tu phyin pa drug po
i249b8('bum): thams cad yongs su 'dzind te/ de'i phyiri go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spong
i250a1('bum): cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byas pas sbyin pa yongs su gdong ste dge ba'i rtsa ba
i250a2('bum): de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod
i250a3('bum): pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyinang pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rolong tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
i250a4('bum): pa'i yang la bya bas ma yin gi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi yongasu srung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te
i250a5('bum): bla na med pa ying dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha ro lang du phyin pa
i250a6('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyi nad pa la spod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag la bzod
i250a7('bum): pa dang mos pa dang rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rolang du phyin pa la spang ba'i bzang po'i pha rolang tu phyirang pa'i// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
i250a8('bum): sems dpa' sem sa pa chod pa nyad thos dang na rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mo yin ge/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen po'ong dang ldan pa'i yid 'bye bas bzod pa'i po ramang du phyin pas
i250b1('bum): cing / brdzun 'grus nyams par myi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpral semus dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i tshe dang ldan pa
i250b2('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / radu sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa'i
i250b3('bum): pha rolang tu phyin pa la skyed cing sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong ba'i bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa
i250b4('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyon thos dang / sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas zong
i250b5('bum): po'i pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rlom sems su myi byed cing myi dmyigs pa'i 'di ni/ bzod pa'i nga rolang tu phyin pa la
i250b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rolang tu phyin pa drug po
i250b7('bum): thams cad yongs su 'dzi nid te/ de'i phyir ge cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
i250b8('bum): cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba ma yin pa/ rnam pa thams cad mikhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mang la bA m+b+ha pas sbyin par yongs su gdong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba la
i251a1('bum): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa
i251a2('bum): la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phan pa pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha ro lang du phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs
i251a3('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims srang zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ 
i251a4('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyinid pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan
i251a5('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus
i251a6('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod cing / chos de dag de ltar bzod pa dang mos pa dang rten pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pa ralang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i
i251a7('bum): pha rol du phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan po'i yid la bya ba sro ma yin gyi rnam pa thams
i251a8('bum): cad mkhye nang pa 'di ngang ldan pa'i yang la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha lang du phyin pa la spyod da'i/ sems can thams cad gi don du brtson 'grus nyams par myi byid cing ba du myongs pa 'dzin tshu
i251b1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
i251b2('bum): phyinang ba la spyod da cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni brtson grub
i251b3('bum): 'grus kyi pha ralod tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phya ning ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang
i251b4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma ya ni gi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ brtson 'grus rtsom pa des rlom sems
i251b5('bum): myi byed do// brtson 'grus de yang myi dmyigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba 'di ni brtson
i251b6('bum): 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la de ltar spyod
i251b7('bum): pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzind te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtar gi
i251b8('bum): pha rol tu phyinang pa la stod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su ga 'i
i252a1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
i252a2('bum): gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan po sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gi pha rol du tu phyinang pa la spyod ca
i252a3('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims srung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad da
i252a4('bum): thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chubasam gtan gi pha rolong tu phyi ning ba la spyang pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang
i252a5('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi ning ba la spyod cang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gi rnam pa tha
i252a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya bas bzod pa yongs su bsgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
i252a7('bum): yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu bya gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
i252a8('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya bas/ bsam gtan gi pha rolang tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rtson 'grus
i252b1('bum): nyam par myi byed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni bsam gtan gi pha rol
i252b2('bum): tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// tshe dang ldan bai sha ru dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod cing
i252b3('bum): de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmyigs pa'i tshul gcig pa'i phyir nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byi ba rnaMs
i252b4('bum): rnams gi go myi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gi pha rol
i252b5('bum): tu phyind pa la spyong po'i bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos
i252b6('bum): thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gtan des kyang rlom sems su myi byed cing bsam gtan yang myi dmyigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mo
i252b7('bum): du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shi rje
i252b8('bum): ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pobasam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha
i253a1('bum): chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs
i253a2('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'khor gsum yong su dag pa'i sbyin pa'i yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can
i253a3('bum): thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod cing
i253a4('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims yongasu srung zhing / dga' ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams
i253a5('bum): cad dang thun mong du bas shing / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa'o// tshe dang lda
i253a6('bum): ba sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gi/ rnam pa thathos
i253a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya bas chos de smag la de ltar bzod pa la mos shing rten te// dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs
i253a8('bum): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i bzad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
i253b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la skyed cing / nyan thos dang cang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yu ni gi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
i253b2('bum): nyam par myi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
i253b3('bum): phyin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shrIs rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cang / nyan thos dang rang sangs
i253b4('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yin pas sems rtse gcig du byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad da
i253b5('bum): thun med du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'i la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gi pha ra long tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan
i253b6('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad sgyu mor byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ nyan thos dang
i253b7('bum): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma yin gi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la rlom sems su byed/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de
i253b8('bum): yang sems can thams cad dang thun mang du byas shing / bla na myed pa yang dgas par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo ba 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
i254a1('bum): tu phyinang pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba'i sems gis pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
i254a2('bum): ngag dpa/ sems can dang byang chub la mtshan mar myi byed myi dmyigs pa 'dri ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha lang tu phyin pa drug gi ge cha chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu
i254a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas shing / pha rol tu phyi ning ba drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed ba/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
i254a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pa re bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang gzugs stong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang mnyam par 'jog ste/ bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang
i254a5('bum): gzugs myed san par 'jug pa rnams gi ro yang meng par myi byed/ bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang myi 'phrogs te/ bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa
i254a6('bum): gzugs myed par 'jug pa'i dbang gyis kyang myi skye'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang 'gegs pa'o// 
i254a7('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gton dang tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la dben pa mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang
i254a8('bum): mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa mthong bas mnyam par 'jog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang myi'i skye/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du yang myi bying ngo // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
i254b1('bum): zilang kyis gnon to// tshe drang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i gi cha chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa
i254b2('bum): ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// / shes ra
i254b3('bum): bam po bcu dgu pa'o// / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgo cha chen po bgos pa la shar byon
i254b4('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing / myong yongs sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gi khams chogs
i254b5('bum): che ge mo zhag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ge cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu'i zhag sems can yongs su sman par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gi
i254b6('bum): rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjed pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ lho phyogs gri 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyong tshong du
i254b7('bum): ba mdzad ring dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// 'jig rtenang gi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig
i254b8('bum): sems can yongs su smin par byed / sangs rgyas kyi 'ang yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gi rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod cing dbyangs rjesu sgrog go/ nub phyogs gi 'jig rten po khams ga
i255a1('bum): ga'i glang gri bye ma snyed dag nA/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams gang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing ming yongasu stug pa mdzad nge 'jig rten gi khams che ge mo zhig
i255a2('bum): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig/ sems can yongs su smin par byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gis rnam par
i255a3('bum): rtse'o zhesgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go/ byang phyogs gi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du rjod pa/ 
i255a4('bum): ched du brjed cing mying yongs su skrag gi/ 'jig rten gi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta zhig sems can yongasu smin par byed do// 
i255a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phralang gis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod cing dbyangs rje su sgrog go/ byang shar gi phyogs mtshams gi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye la
i255a6('bum): snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing myang yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dpa' sems
i255a7('bum): dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhag/ sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phralang gis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod par mdzad cing
i255a8('bum): dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams gi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjed cing / 
i255b1('bum): brjod cing mying yongs su sgrog pa mdzad de/ 'jig rte nang gi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig/ sems can yongs su smin par byed do// 
i255b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrulang gis rnam par rtse'o ces sgra brjed par mdzad cang dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye
i255b3('bum): ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing mying yongs su sgrog par mdzad de/ 'jig rten gi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa'
i255b4('bum): sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhag/ sems can yongs su smin par byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrulang gis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad
i255b5('bum): cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// nub byang gyi phyogs mtshams gi 'jig rten gi khams bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing mying yongs su// 
i255b6('bum): sgrog po mdzad de/ 'jig rten gi khams che gau zhag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig/ sems can yongasu snyan par byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu
i255b7('bum): dag par byed do/ rdzu 'phrulang gis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgro brjod pa mdzad cing mying yongs su sgrogaca / 'og gi phyogs gi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye me snyeng dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
i255b8('bum): 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyang cheng du brjod pa ched du brjod cing myang yongs su sdig pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten go khams me ge mo 'gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po go mchen po 'di lngan
i256a1('bum): zhig/ sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrulang gis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgeg go steng gi phyogs
i256a2('bum): kyi 'jig rte nang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing mying yongs su sgrog par mdzad de 'jig rten gi khas
i256a3('bum): che ge mo zhag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhag/ sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed ngo // rdzu 'phrul gis rnga
i256a4('bum): par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod ba mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go// sbas pa tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la yang dag par zhugs shes bya/ byang chub sems
i256a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po 'di gang yin/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod de/ de smin pa'i pha
i256a6('bum): rolang tu phyi ning ba la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben sngag to myi dge ba'i chos gis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la
i256a7('bum): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyu gcig tu gyu rung bas/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa/ rnam par spyod pa myed pa'i dang
i256a8('bum): nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba'i can/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bur bslabs pa gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral nas/ dran pa dang ldan 'ang shes bzhin du bdang
i256b1('bum): su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong ba 'phags pa rnams gyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar
i256b2('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs sdug sngal ba yang spangs shing / yang bde ba dang yad myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pos/ bde ba yang myed sdug sngal ba myed pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas
i256b3('bum): bsgom gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shi nang tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa/ gcugs myed pa gnod pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa
i256b4('bum): shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten ches gi dbyings kyis kris pa nam mkha'i mthas gdugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang te mos par byas shing rnam par spyod ngo // de snying rje dang ldan pa'i seMs
i256b5('bum): rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa/ tshad myed pa gcugs myed pa gnod pa myed pa ldod pa myed pa yongasu rdzogs pa shin tu yongs pas 'jig rtend chos gi dbyings gyis klas pa nam ka
i256b6('bum): mthas gdugs pa phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang te mos par byas shing rnam par spyod/ de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shi nang tu bsgoms pa myi gnyis pa tshod myed pa gcugs myed pa/ 
i256b7('bum): gnod pa myed pa ldong ba myed yongs su rdzogs shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos gi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gdugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas
i256b8('bum): shing rnam par spyod do// de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya tshon po shin tu yangs pa myi dmyigs pa tshad myed pa gcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa ldong ba myed pa
i257a1('bum): yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings gis glas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gdugs pa phyogs bcu rgyas bur bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam
i257a2('bum): sto / de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs gi 'du shes las yang dag par 'ang song thegs pa'i 'dugs rnams rung par gyu ra rnye / sgo tshogs go 'du shes yid kyi byung bas rnam pa n+d+ha
i257a3('bum): yis so zhes te nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du mtha' yas skye mched las yang dgra par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas zhes rnam
i257a4('bum): shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgribs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang dag par 'dras te cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye
i257a5('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bslab

i257a7('bum): pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha' la rnam pa dang / tshul dang mtshan mas rnam par mnyam par 'jog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub

i257b3('bum): chags dang bral bas ngan bzha shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba luso kyis mong ba 'phags pa rnams kyis de la ngan pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba li rnam par spang ba btang snyomase ba'o zhes brjod pa / 
i257b4('bum): dge' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba ya/ nga spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde bla snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed sdug sngal ba yang myed

i258a6('bum): shes mtha' ya so zhes ke ba rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubased gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'dres te cung zad ma yod
i258a7('bum): ngo zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la

i261a1('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dag pa las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du
i261a2('bum): btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong ba 'phags pa rnams gis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba rnam par spyod pa btang snyems pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bde ba bsam gtan
i261a3('bum): gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ de bde ba yang spangs sdug sngal ba yang spangs shing / yid dadre ba dang yad myi badre ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed sdug bsngal bya yang myed pa btang

i261a5('bum): yongs su rdzogs shing shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyi kris pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gdugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spong ngo / de snying rje dang
i261a6('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shi nang tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad med pa/ gcugs myed pa/ gnod pa myed pa ldong pa myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis
i261a7('bum): klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gdugs pa'i phyogs bcu'i rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa/ 
i261a8('bum): gcugs med pa gnod pa med pa ldang ba myed pa/ yongasu rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gdugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos
i261b1('bum): par byas shing rnam par spyod de/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad med pa gcugs myad pa gnod pa myed pa ldang ba myed pa yong su rdzogs
i261b2('bum): ba shin du tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos gi dbyings gis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gdug smra ba'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang te/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzug
i261b3('bum): gi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing // sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas/ nam mkha'i mtha' yas so zhes te nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
i261b4('bum): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso/ de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha'i mtha' yas skye mched la sa yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' skye mched la nye bar
i261b5('bum): bsgrubs te/ gnas so// de rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad me yod do zhes cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gan so// de rnam
i261b6('bum): ba thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed phyir skye mched la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgribs te gnaso// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sas
i261b7('bum): dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / tshad myed pa 'di dag dang gzugs myed pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul pa
i261b8('bum): mtshan mas mnyam par 'jog cing rnam par ldang ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de shes
i262a1('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben sdig to myi dge ba'i chos gis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa spyod pa dang bcas dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam
i262a2('bum): gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas/ de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spong pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems gi rgyud gcig tu gyu rang bas rnam por rtog pa myed pa rnam par spong ba myed pa'i
i262a3('bum): ting nge 'dzind de las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dag las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyom su gnas te/ 
i262a4('bum): bde ba lus kyis myong ba 'phags pa rnams gis de la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bskabs de gas
i262a5('bum): de bde ba yang spangs sdug sngal yang spangs shing yang bde ba dang yang myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed sdug sngal yang myed btang snyoms dang ldan pas bsam rten bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrub
i262a6('bum): te gnas so// de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shi nang tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad med pa/ gcugs myed pa gnod pa myed pa lhong pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas
i262a7('bum): 'jig rten ches gi dbyings gis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gdugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkam ste/ maso par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu
i262a8('bum): yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa/ gcugs myed pa gnod pa myed pa ldong ba myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa shi nang tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos gi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gdug
i262b1('bum): ba'i phyogs bcu'i rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shi nad tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa gcugs myed pa gnod ba myed pa ldod pa myed pa
i262b2('bum): yongs su rdzogs pa shi nad tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gdugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par dpyod do// de myi dmyig
i262b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yongs te myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa gcugs myed pa ldong ba myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos gi dbyings kyis
i262b4('bum): klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gdugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ myos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs gi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i
i262b5('bum): 'du shes rnams nub par gyurd cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes las yad la myi byed pas/ nam mkha'i mtha' yas so zhes nam mkha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso// de rnam pa thams cad du ni
i262b6('bum): mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bor bsgrubs te gnas/ de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha'
i262b7('bum): yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnas cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las yang dag par
i262b8('bum): 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed mi ni skye mched la myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan te nam byang chub
i263a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang tshad myed pa 'di dag dang / gzugs myed pa na yod pa 'di dag la nam mkha'i rnam pa dang tshul dang mtshan mas mnyam par 'jug
i263a2('bum): cang rnam par ldang ba'i tshe yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub semanas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa ste tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar
i263a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa shes bya'o// tshe/ dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dngal
i263a4('bum): pa'i sems rgya chen po shi nang tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa chang myed pa/ gzugs med pa gnod pa med pa ldong pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha'i
i263a5('bum): mthas gdugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spong ngo // de snying dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shi nang tu yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad myed pa gcugs myed pa gnod pa med pa lnga
i263a6('bum): ba myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa shi nang tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rte nang chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gdugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste mos par byas shing rnam par spyong ngo / 
i263a7('bum): de dga' ba dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin du yangs pa myi gnyis pa tshad mang pa/ gzugs myed pa gnod pa myed pa ldong ba myed pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa shin du bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyi
i263a8('bum): klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gdu rdzogs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par myong ngo // ngab dang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen tha shi n+dan du yangs pa skye gnyis pa mam
i263b1('bum): pa/ gcugs myed pa gnod pa byed pa/ ldong pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs pa sha na du bskams pas/ 'jig rtend chos kyi dbyings gis klas pa nam mkha'i mthas gdugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bka
i263b2('bum): ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de 'dod pas dben pa sdig to myi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa spyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang badre ba can bsam rten dang po
i263b3('bum): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas/ de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems gi rgyud gcig tu gyurd pas/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa'i rnam par spong ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las
i263b4('bum): skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gi nyes pa nye bar bslabs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du bdang snyom su gnas te bde ba lus kyis myong
i263b5('bum): 'phags pa rnams gis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba myed pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas/ de bde ba yang spangs
i263b6('bum): sdug sngal ba yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid myi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba yang myed sdug glal ba yang myed btang snyoms dang dran pas yongasasu dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar sgrub sred
i263b7('bum): gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs gi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nus par gyur cing / sna tshogs gi 'du shes yid la myi byed pas nam mkha' mtha'
i263b8('bum): yas sgo zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du// na nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha'
i264a1('bum): mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bskabs te gnas// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te cung zad ma yang do zhes cung za
i264a2('bum): myed pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas/ de rnam pa thams cad mdu cung zad myod pa'i skye mched la yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas// 'di na byang
i264a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzind te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i' chen po'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas nyon mongs pa ra
i264a4('bum): spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la brjod cing 'chad pa dang / ston cing 'gelang ba rnam par 'byed de gsal bar byed do/ de dag gi ro dang de dag gi
i264a5('bum): skon dang 'byung ba yang tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rold du phyind pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
i264a6('bum): ston pa'i yod la bya ba de dag gis bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par 'jog cing rnam par ldang yang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang
i264a7('bum): sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go myi 'byeng ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa ma nyams pa'o// de ltar byang chub sems da pa'i sems dpa' chen po rnam pa bas
i264a8('bum): cang mkhyen pa 'ding nga ldan pa'i yang la bya bas bsam gtan dang tshong myengad pa dang / gzugs byed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spong ba'i cha/ 'od snyam ste sems can thams cad gi zhom mangs pa yang
i264b1('bum): ba'i phyir chos stonang to// snyam du sems shing yid la bya ba de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang rten pa dang sems shing zheng du chung par byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ba
i264b2('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyenang pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya bas bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyin pa dang tshad myed pa dang gzugs myed
i264b3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad gi don dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyin pa nyid glo phyir brtson 'grus nyams par myi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' seMs
i264b4('bum): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang tshang ming rje pa dang rnam pa
i264b5('bum): tha rang ba dang ting nge 'dzinang dang / snyoms por 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par 'jog cing rnam par ldang ba yang nyan thos gi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yang myi ltung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
i264b6('bum): bo'i bsam gtan gi pha rolang tu phyinang pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang po'i yon lag dang bsam gtan nyis pa
i264b7('bum): yan lag dang / bsam gtan gsum pa'i yan log dang bsam gdan bzhi pa'i yang lag dang / byams bded snang rje dang dga' ba dang btung snyoms dang / nam mkha' yas skye mched/ dang rnam shes mthan ma
i264b8('bum): themached dang / cung zad med pa'i rnamachi nga ma/ 'dushes myed 'du shes byed min skye mched de dag blo drag pa'i rnam pa dang / sngag sbal ba'i rnam par bdag sbeng pa'i rna ba dngan pa'i rno pa dang steng bzhin sangs
i265a1('bum): ma myed pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i rnam pa rab tu rtogs kyang bsam gtan dang tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag myi dmyigs pa de dag gis rlom semangs myed pa 'ang ni
i265a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha ro lang du phyin pa la spong ba'i theg pa chen po la
i265a3('bum): dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi skem pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par spang ba bzhi sgom pa dang rnam pa thams ca
i265a4('bum): du rdzu 'phralang gi rkang pa bzhi sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du dbang po lnga bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs lnga sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom pa dang rna ba thas nyaM cang du 'phag
i265a5('bum): pa'i lamo yan lag brgyad pa sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam smo pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du bsam gtan rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thas cad du tshad myed pa rnaMs sgom pa da/ rnam pa
i265a6('bum): thams cad du gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par tha rad pa rjes sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mtha rang gis gnas pa'i snyems par 'jug pa ni sa
i265a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad du rnam par tha rang pa'i sgo stong ba 'di dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du mngon par shes pa rnams sbom pa dang rnam pa thams cad du ting nge 'dzin rnams snyam pa
i265a8('bum): mas cad du gzung po po rna rnams skam pa dang / rnam pa thams cang du da ba 'dag shen sa pa'i thobs rnams sgom pa dang / rnam thathams cad du myi 'jigs pa rnam snyam pa dang rnam pa thams cad du ma sa yang dag pa
i265b1('bum): rig pa rnams bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du byams pa chen po sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du snying rje chen po sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom pa dang rnam pa
i265b2('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang
i265b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing bdag gis sems
i265b4('bum): thams cad yongs su skyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed do// snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jig cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang snying rtse ba'i nyam su byed/ dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la ma nyam pa
i265b5('bum): 'jog cing bdag gis dgol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la semaso// btang snyoms gi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cang sems can rnams gi zag pa bzod par bya ba la rab tu gzhol ba rA dwe to// 'di ni
i265b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyining pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan dang tshang myed pa dang rname 'a drang tshul/ 
i265b7('bum): dring mtshan ma la mnyam par 'jog pa'i rnam par ldong ba'i mi/ rnam pa thams cid mkhyer ba nyid du bsnga gang gtogs par nyan thos gis drang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sas smra pa'i sem
i265b8('bum): de bang me pa rnamasas du ma pa yang tsu pa sa masus ya gyi chu mam dpa rnams dpa na pa rnam ga she ra sa sa rgya sa
i266a1('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa gnyis pa nyan thos gi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas ser 'dod pa myi skyed gi rnam pa thams cad khyen pa nyid du mas
i266a2('bum): shing dga' ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di dang ldan pa'i
i266a3('bum): sems bskyed pas myi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spangs pa dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du brtson 'grus myi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dala' sems dpa' chen na
i266a4('bum): tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam rten dang / tshad myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyems par 'jug pa 'di dag la
i266a5('bum): mnyam par 'jog la/ bsam gtan dang tshad mying pa dang / gzugs myed pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gyis kyang myi skye zhing / de dag gi ri myi te/ myong bar byed pa yang myed la de dag gas 'phrigs pa
i266a6('bum): yang myi 'gyur ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshad myed pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gi pa'i lang tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams pa thams cad
i266a7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par 'jog cing / rnam par ldang ba de dag la myi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang sdug sngal
i266a8('bum): ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag myong ba'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i rnam pa dang / rab tu rtogs kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ma
i266b1('bum): par yang myi byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin phyi nang
i266b2('bum): stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin chen po stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin don dam pa stong pa nyid shes
i266b3('bum): kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yini 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid shes kyi
i266b4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul ma yin/ myi dmyigs pa'i stong pa nyid she
i266b5('bum): kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid shes kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gos kyang dmyigs da pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid shes
i266b6('bum): kyang dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
i266b7('bum): 'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par myi 'khrug cang mnyam par gzhag par shes kha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenan po'i theg pa chen po'o// 
i266b8('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rtag ces bya bar shes par mi 'jug pa dang / mi rtag ces bya bar shes par myi 'jug pa dang / bdi zhes par
i267a1('bum): bya bar shes par myi 'jug pa dang / sdug sngal zhes bya bar shes pa myi 'jug pa dang / bdag ces bya bar shes pa myi 'jug pa dang/ bdag myad ces bya bar shes pa myi 'jug pa dang sdug ces bya
i267a2('bum): par shes pa myi 'jug pa dang / myi sdug ces bya bar shes pa myi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha rA dwa ti'i bu 'di ni mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ 
i267a3('bum): ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'das pa'i dus su shes pa myi 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus su shes ba myi 'jug pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dus su shes pa 'jug pa myed de dus
i267a4('bum): gsum du shes pa 'jug pa med pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
i267a5('bum): chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par myi byed/ gzugs dang gzugs myed pa'i khas su shes pa 'jug par myi byed pa/ 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs myed pa'i khams
i267a6('bum): su shes pa 'jug pa myed sde/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri dwa ti'i bu 'di yang myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa' de sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan ya
i267a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rta theg pa chen po ni/ 'jig rje nang pa'i rnams la 'du shes pa 'jug par myi byed/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas bcu ga
i267a8('bum): tho byung ba dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas ga chos rnams la shes la 'jug kyang 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten lami 'das pa myo shes pa yang byed/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pamying po
i267b1('bum): 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas gtses rnams kyang myi shes pa myed paste/ dngadu ldan pa shwa ra dz+nyA hrIs 'di ya mags pa tshum gyis zung chun seMs mas pa rlo ba jug pa
i267b2('bum): smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa'i tshe// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyining pa la yang dag par gnas pa des sbyin pa yang myi
i267b3('bum): dmyigs sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa yang myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang myi dmyigs/ len pa yid myi dmyigs/ yod la bya ba de dag kyang myi dmyigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sos
i267b4('bum): dpa' chen po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyinang pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
i267b5('bum): tu phyi nad pa la spong pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol ta phyi nad pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des kyang tshul khrims kyang mi dmigs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa yang myi dmyigs byang chub seMs
i267b6('bum): dpa' yang myi dmyigs/ yang la bya ba de dag kyang myi dmyigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la yang dag/ 
i267b7('bum): par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag
i267b8('bum): par gnas kyang / des bzang ba yang myi dmyigs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang myi dmyigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang myi dmyigs
i268a1('bum): de ltar na byang chuchub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rolang tu phyind pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
i268a2('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyinang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tA pha ning pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des brtson 'grus myi dmyigs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
i268a3('bum): pa yang myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang myi dmyigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang myi dmyigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rtson
i268a4('bum): 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nang pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam
i268a5('bum): gtan gi pha rol tu phyin da pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des bsam gtan yang myi dmyigs/ bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyin pa yang myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang myi
i268a6('bum): dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmyigs te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bo myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa la yang dag par
i268a7('bum): gnas pa shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gan
i268a8('bum): kyang / des dge ba'i chos kyang myi dmyigs/ myi dge ba dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus mabyas dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa
i268b1('bum): dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa'i chos kyang myi dmyigs shing / shes rab kyang myi dmyigs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa yang myi dmyigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang myi dmyigs
i268b2('bum): yid la bya ba de dag kyang myi dmyigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' la sems dpa' chen po myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par gnas shes
i268b3('bum): bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du
i268b4('bum): de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pa bsgom pas rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs
i268b5('bum): ba'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres paso// bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ dri myi dmyigs pa'i
i268b6('bum): tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
i268b7('bum): gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mi 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i rkyen po stong pa
i268b8('bum): nyid skam mo// rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ dbyi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam po stong ba nyid sgom mo/ rnam pa
i269a1('bum): thams ca mams dang ldan pa 'du rgya jug pa sa na sa / spyi myigs pa'i tshu gyis 'das rgyas pa pa nyid patham so// ma tha thams da pa mad ba
i269a2('bum): ldan pa'i yod la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de pya dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas med pa nyid bangs so// nam garnams cad ma byen pa nyid nga na pa yod pa smra bya sa pa
i269a3('bum): ba rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam ste thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya tha ma 'dres pas bskam pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ dem+ba
i269a4('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis thob ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa mkhyend pa lhod dang lda na ba'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dor/ 
i269a5('bum): ba myed pa stong pa nyid bsgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams
i269a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i non du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
i269a7('bum): ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa
i269a8('bum): don du/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis myi dmyigs pa'i stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mtshand pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa stong
i269b1('bum): pra nyid bsgom po// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa' yad la bya ga mi 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par tha/ snyam pa'i don du/ de mya dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid sdang pa 'ad bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mabyand pa
i269b2('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sos
i269b3('bum): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam par thams cad mkhyend pa
i269b4('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don tu/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis yang de dag par spong ba bzhi bsgomo// rnam par thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bas
