i269b5('bum): rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul
i269b6('bum): gyis dbang po lnga bsgom mo/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du// de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad
i269b7('bum): mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag bdun bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya gas 'dres pas
i269b8('bum): bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan brgyad pa bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du
i270a1('bum): de myi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshul gyis yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi
i270a2('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad myed pa bzhi
i270a3('bum): bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa
i270a4('bum): thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par tha rad pa brgyad bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
i270a5('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
i270a6('bum): la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan
i270a7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom/ 
i270a8('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam rna bar bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi
i270b1('bum): dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis/ 
i270b2('bum): myi 'jigs pa bzhi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi bsgom/ 
i270b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam bar bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rjes chen po bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid dang
i270b4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de myi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad bsgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems
i270b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir
i270b6('bum): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'di ni mying ma du zad do zhes bya bar shes so// gzugs dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// nor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir tshor ba zhes bya ba
i270b7('bum): 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// 'du shes dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir 'du shes zhes bya bu 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// 'du byed dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i
i270b8('bum): phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// myig dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir myig ces bya ba 'di ni mying nam du zad do// rna ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rna ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// sna dmyigs
i271a1('bum): su myed pa'i phyir sna zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad de// lce dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir lce zhes bya ba 'di ni myang tsam du zad do// lus dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir lus zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// yod dmigs
i271a2('bum): su myed pa'i phyir yid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// gzugs dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir gzugs zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// sgra dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir sla zhes bya ba 'di ni ma tsam du zad do// dri dmigs su
i271a3('bum): myed pa'i phyir dri zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// ro dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// reg dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir reg ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// chos dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir chos zhes
i271a4('bum): bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// myig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs su myed pa'i phyir myig gi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di
i271a5('bum): ni mying tsam du zad do// sna'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir sna'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// lce'i rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir lce'i rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di na myong
i271a6('bum): tsam du zad do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su med pa'i phyir lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying ma du zad// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'don myong
i271a7('bum): tsam du zad do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir myig gi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su med pa'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad/ 
i271a8('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di na mying tsam zad do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
i271b1('bum): dmyigs su myong pa'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa las
i271b2('bum): byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
i271b3('bum): tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni myong tsam du zad do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba
i271b4('bum): tshor ba dmigs su myed pa'i phyir lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
i271b5('bum): tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// sa'i khams dmyigs su
i271b6('bum): myed pa'i phyir sa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// chu'i khams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir chu'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// mye'i khams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir mye'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam
i271b7('bum): du zad do// rlung gi khams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rlung gi khams zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// nam mkha'i khams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni myi tsam du zad do// rnam par shes
i271b8('bum): ba'i khams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// ma rig pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// 'du byed dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir
i272a1('bum): 'du byed ces bya ba 'di ni myang tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'ang na myang tsam du zad do// mying dang gzugs dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir myang dang gzugs
i272a2('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// skye mched drug dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir skye mched drug ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// reg pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir reg pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// tshor ba
i272a3('bum): dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir tshor ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// sred pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir sred pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// le nad pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir lend pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad/ 
i272a4('bum): srid pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir srid pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do/ skye ba dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir skye ba zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// rga shi dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rga shi zhe sas bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad// 
i272a5('bum): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nid pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa
i272a6('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol das tu phyind pa dmyigs su myed pa'i
i272a7('bum): phyir brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyi nad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// shes rab
i272a8('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa dmyig su myed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad de// nang stong pa nyid dmyig su myed pa'i phyir nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba zhes 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// phyi steng pa
i272b1('bum): nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// phyi nang stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyi
i272b2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// chen po stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir chen po stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// don dam pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir de na dam pa stong pa'i
i272b3('bum): ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying du tsam du zad do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba
i272b4('bum): 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid dmigs su myed pa'i phyir thog ma
i272b5('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi ces bya ba 'di ni 'di mying tsam du zad do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir dor ba myed stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dmigs su myed pa'i phyir rang
i272b6('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir
i272b7('bum): rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir myi dmyigs pa sang pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su myed/ 
i272b8('bum): pa'i phyir dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su myed pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmyings/ 
i273a1('bum): su myed pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams pa dmyigs su med pa'i phyir dran pa lta bar gzhag pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni ming
i273a2('bum): tsam du zad do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
i273a3('bum): zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// dbang po rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir dbang po lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// stobs rnams dmyigs su med pa'i phyir stobs lA zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad/ 
i273a4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// lam dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam
i273a5('bum): du zad do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// bsam gtan rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi zhes bya ba 'di
i273a6('bum): ni mying tsam du zad do// tshad myed pa rnams dmyigs su med pa'i phyir tshad myed pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i
i273a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// rnam par tha rad pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rnam par tha rad pa brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// mtha rad kyis gnas pa'i smos
i273a8('bum): dang 'jug pa rnams dmyigs su med pa byor mamad kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'drem pa dang zhes bya ba 'dzin kyang tsam du zad do// rnam par thad pa sgo snying pa nyid dang mtsham mthong pa dang su da bzod
i273b1('bum): pa'i dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smond pa myed pa zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// mngon par shes pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir mngon par
i273b2('bum): shes pa lnga zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// ting nge 'dzind rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzind rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir
i273b3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// myi 'jigs
i273b4('bum): pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir myi 'jigs pa brazhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad
i273b5('bum): snying rje chen po dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rje chen po zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni
i273b6('bum): mying tsam du zad do// de bzhin nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// ma no rad pa de bzhin nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir ma no rid pa de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad/ 
i273b7('bum): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// chos nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir chos nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// 
i273b8('bum): chos kyi dbyings dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad de/ chos kyi gnas nyid dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir chos kyi gnas nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// chos spyod med/ 
i274a1('bum): pa nyid dmyigs su med pa'i phyir che la skyond myed pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// yang dag pa'i mtha' dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya nga 'di ni mying tsam du zad de
i274a2('bum): byang chub dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di ni mying tsam du zad de// zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te
i274a3('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// / bam po nyi shu pa'o// / 
i274a4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas snying po byang chub la 'dug gyi bar du mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su
i274a5('bum): rdzogs par byas shing sems can yongs su smind par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / rim 'gro bye ba'i tshul dang gang la 'os pa de dag gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rim gro
i274a6('bum): ba dang / bkur sting bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang 'di lta ste byang chub sems
i274a7('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyand to// de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la gnas te sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ sems
i274a8('bum): can rnams yongs su smind par byed kyang / de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gyi 'du shes kyang myi 'byung // sems can gyi 'du shes kyang myi 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang myi 'byung ngo // de gnyis su/ 
i274b1('bum): myed pa'i sa la gnas shing lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched/ bsams shing yongs su 'dzind to// de rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes blang bar me gyu ra kyi
i274b2('bum): bar du// theg pa de dang nam du yang myi 'bral te/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi ye shes thob/ nas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sprin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
i274b3('bum): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang / myi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rtend kyis bskor bar myi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// de bla na myed pa yang dag par
i274b4('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sha rang phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing
i274b5('bum): 'jig rtend gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa te/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ste/ rnam
i274b6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dngabyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang krung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs
i274b7('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing // 'jig rtend gi khams che ge mo zhig du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mcho ga la gnas
i274b8('bum): pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig
i275a1('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung bya bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rtend gyi khams che ge mo zhig du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
i275a2('bum): chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags
i275a3('bum): bsgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rtend gyi khas
i275a4('bum): che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i275a5('bum): pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas
i275a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas
i275a7('bum): pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad de// shar
i275a8('bum): lnga'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi byed ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rtend kyi khams che ge mo zhig du byang chub
i275b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas
i275b2('bum): kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
i275b3('bum): bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rtend gyi khams che ge mo zhig du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di
i275b4('bum): zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// nub pa
i275b5('bum): gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gong ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rte nang gi khams che ge mo zhig du byang
i275b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob
i275b7('bum): nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// 'og gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs
i275b8('bum): pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gi khamam che ge mo zhig du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa/ theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di sa bya ba zhig
i276a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa skrag cing dbyangs su brjed pa mdzad do// steng gi
i276a2('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rtend gyi khams che ge mo zhig na byang chub sems dang
i276a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na myed pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkha nad pa nyid theb nas kyang ches
i276a4('bum): kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do// zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjed pa mdzad do// de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pade chen po la yang dag par
i276a5('bum): gnas zhes bya'o// de nas che dang pa rab 'byo rad kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos so go cha chen po bgos so zhes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das ji
i276a6('bum): tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos so zhes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de la 'di ces
i276a7('bum): bka' rtsa lad to// rab 'byor da 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po byon cing / de sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa'i go cha bgos/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go chung
i276a8('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa'i go cha bkos// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i nyo cha bkos/ bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa'i go cha bgos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa'i go cha bas/ 
i276b1('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi cha bgos/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ don dam pa stong pa nyid
i276b2('bum): kyi go cha bgos/ 'dus byas stong pa nyidatsakyi go cha bgos/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyi
i276b3('bum): go cha bgos/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ myi
i276b4('bum): dmyigs pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos// dran pa nyo bar
i276b5('bum): gzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag par spong ba'i go cha bgos/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i go cha bgos/ dbang po'i go cha bgos/ stobs kyi go cha bgos/ byang chub nyid kyi go cha bgos/ lam gyi
i276b6('bum): go cha bgos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i go cha bgos/ bsam gtan gi go cha bgos/ chad myed pa'i go cha bgos/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thard pa'i go cha
i276b7('bum): bgos/ mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smond pa myed pa'i go ma bgos/ mngon par shes pa'i go cha bsro// 
i276b8('bum): ting nge 'dzind gyi go cha bgos/ gzungs kyi sgo'i go cha bgos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi go cha bgos/ myi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i go cha bags/ snying rje chen
i277a1('bum): po 'ag ma dang / sangs rgyas ca su da pa spyod ku gas/ rnam pa thams pad mad du pacad kyi gas sangs rgyas can man ma grags na/ gang gsum rgyan pa
i277a2('bum): 'jig rte nad kyi khams 'di snang bas rgyas par bkang ste// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gyengs so// lce phyogs kyi 'jig rte nang gi khams gapa ga'i
i277a3('bum): gang krung gyi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'byings so// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye mo snyed snang bas rgyas par 'byangs so// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams kyi gang ga'i klung gi
i277a4('bum): bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gyengs so// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye mi snyed snang bas rgyas par 'byings so// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rte rang gi
i277a5('bum): khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gyings sa/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gyengs so// nub byang gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
i277a6('bum): rtend gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'byings so/ 'og kyi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bya ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'byings so// steng gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rte nang gi 'dzag
i277a7('bum): gyi khams gang na'i rlung gi khyim snyed sna ngas rgyas par 'byings so// stong gsum gyi myong chen par 'jog rtenang gyi 'ams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do// nub phyogs kyi mig na gi khams gang gi thung rtsi byem rnye
i277a8('bum): rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rte nang gi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bsgreng
i277b1('bum): byang shar phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi byed ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod/ 
i277b2('bum): lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ nub byang gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyed do// 
i277b3('bum): 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug du rab tu bskyod do// des stong gsum gyi stong
i277b4('bum): chen po'i 'jig rtend gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yeng ba 'de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// 
i277b5('bum): zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang / bde ba thob ste de dag dga' ba dang / bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // 
i277b6('bum): de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag du skye'o// des stong gsum gyi stong che
i277b7('bum): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems can rnams kyi byol song gyi skye gnas kyi sdug bsdang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
i277b8('bum): dag par rdzonam pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'chal 'o zhes bya ba'i sla brjod do dbyangs sgeg go// de'i mo byi'i mong gyi skye gnas kyi sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyal gyi smad bres nas dga' ba dang 'de ba zab ste/ de da
i278a1('bum): dga' ba dang bde ba des po la song gyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang po// de dag byol song gyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'ad
i278a2('bum): rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong pa de dag de dag tu skye'o// des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di ni/ gshin rje'i 'jig rte nad kyi sems can rnams kyi 'gashen rje'i 'jig rtend gyi sdug
i278a3('bum): bsngal ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjed de dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe gshen rje'i
i278a4('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des/ gshen rje'i 'jig rtend gyi khams de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag gshon
i278a5('bum): rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten
i278a6('bum): gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la
i278a7('bum): phyag 'tshal lo// zhes sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal
i278a8('bum): ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho snang ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// 
i278b1('bum): des lho phyogs kyi 'jig rtend kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
i278b2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas kyang / dga' ba dang bde ba thom
i278b3('bum): ste dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
i278b4('bum): rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag du skye'o/ des nub phyogs kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed
i278b5('bum): par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs
i278b6('bum): rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
i278b7('bum): gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skyo'o// des byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i mi'i lung
i278b8('bum): po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad byed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems
i279a1('bum): khan dmyal ba'i sems cand dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sde thos nas dga' ba dang bde pa thob ste/ de dag dga' ba deng bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag
i279a2('bum): nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des byang / phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rte nang gi khams gang ga'i klung
i279a3('bum): bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya
i279a4('bum): ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgeg go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste de dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang
i279a5('bum): ngo// de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho slong ba de dang de dag tu skong ngo // des shar lho'i phyogs mtshams
i279a6('bum): kyi 'jig rte nang gi khams gang ga'i klud kyi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji skad cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa/ 
i279a7('bum): rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang de ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can
i279a8('bum): dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo / de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag
i279b1('bum): de dag tu skye'o// des lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung ga bye ma snyed dag ni/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
i279b2('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs klog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ na
i279b3('bum): ngag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
i279b4('bum): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des nub byang gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad
i279b5('bum): myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sku brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs
i279b6('bum): rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gangan// 
i279b7('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag du skye'o// des 'og gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rte nad gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag bros/ 
i279b8('bum): cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang / 
i280a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sku de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi
i280a2('bum): zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skyo'o// des snying gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rtend ging ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed cig yeng
i280a3('bum): pa de dag thams cad myed par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas
i280a4('bum): kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ 
i280a5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des shar po chags kyi 'jig rte nad gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rte nang du sbas
i280a6('bum): pA'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhing bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de
i280a7('bum): phag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod de dbyangs dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rte nang du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba
i280a8('bum): thob ste/ de dag dga' ba bde ba des/ byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par ldang / de dag byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dge nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs
i280b1('bum): chos kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des lho phyogs kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol sol gyi skye gnas dang gshin
i280b2('bum): rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi/ byol song gyi ske gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend bye sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa yang dag par
i280b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sku brjod de dbyangs sgrog pa/ de'i tshe byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can de drag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas kyang dga' ba
i280b4('bum): dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des bye la song gyi sku gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gi sgo gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas
i280b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skyes so// des nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i lung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol sang gi sa
i280b6('bum): gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rte nang gi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod te pa de dag thams cad zhi bar bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
i280b7('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi
i280b8('bum): sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song kyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol seng gi sgra gnas dang gshin rje'i mjig rten
i281a1('bum): dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tshe snang ba de dag tu skye'o// des byang phyogs kyi 'jig rtanang gi khams gang ga'i nyung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol sa
i281a2('bum): gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byel song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed pa cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
i281a3('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byo la seng gi sku gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi
i281a4('bum): sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas
i281a5('bum): rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag tu skye'o// des byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtenang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
i281a6('bum): snyed dag na/ byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi bye la song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtenang gi sdug bsngal ji snyen cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de
i281a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtenang du skyes pa'i sems can de dag
i281a8('bum): kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bdag des byol seng gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rjel
i281b1('bum): 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// des shar lnga'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
i281b2('bum): khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol sod kyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can rnams byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag
i281b3('bum): thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig
i281b4('bum): rten du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sla de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag byol song
i281b5('bum): gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho bskyong ba de dag tu skye'o// des lho nub kyi
i281b6('bum): phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend gyi sdug
i281b7('bum): bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshalo zhes bya ba'i sku brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byal song gyi
i281b8('bum): gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag
i282a1('bum): byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag tu skye'o// des nub dang
i282a2('bum): kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtend gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ byel song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can rnams byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend kyi sdug bsnga
i282a3('bum): ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgeg go// de'i tshe byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin
i282a4('bum): rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // 
i282a5('bum): de dag byol seng gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag tu skye'o// des 'og
i282a6('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rtenod gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend gyi sdug bsngal ji snyed
i282a7('bum): cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje
i282a8('bum): 'jig rte nad du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyis sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rte nad de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // 
i282b1('bum): de dag byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bco ma ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang dag tu skye'o// des steng
i282b2('bum): gyi phyogs kyi 'jog rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byolang song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rte nad kyi sdug
i282b3('bum): bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad zhi bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do dbyangs sgrog go// de'i tshe byal seng gyi skyegs
i282b4('bum): dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend du skyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des byol sol gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam
i282b5('bum): par ldang ngo // de dag byol sol gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de
i282b6('bum): dag tu skye'o// rab 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ skye ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gyis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye'o mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du sems can dmyal ba dang / 
i282b7('bum): byol song gyi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag cig mngon par sprulo la/ de ltar mngon par sprul nas ngan song gyi sems can de dag la sangs rgyas kyi sgra sgrog go// chos kyi sgra sgrog/ dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrog par
i282b8('bum): 'gyur la/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang chos kyi sgra dang dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rtend de dag nas rnam par smad pa yod dam/ gsol da pa/ 
i283a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor du de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtend gyi khams tshad myed grangs med
i283a2('bum): pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su bkrol yang / sems can gang yang yongs su bkrol ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'bu rang gzhan yang sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid
i283a3('bum): kyang de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni sbyin
i283a4('bum): pa'i pha ro lad tu phyind pa la gnas shing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rte nang gi khams bye dUr+ya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul pa byed do// de ltar bye du ru'i rgyu las mngon par sA lad nas/ 'khor los sbyar
i283a5('bum): ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul pa byed do// de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas smin pa byed do// skom 'dod pa rnams la sbyin gyi sbyin pa byed de/ bzhin pa 'dod pa
i283a6('bum): rnams la bzhin pa'i sbyin pa byed do/ gos 'dod pa rnams la gos kyi spri nad pa byed de/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la me teg gyi smin pa byed do/ 'phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba'i sbyin po byed do// spos 'dod pa rnams la spos
i283a7('bum): kyi sbyin pa byed do// byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa'i sbran pa byed do// mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ma la cha'i smin pa byed do// khyim pa 'dod pa rnams la khyim gyi sbyin pa byed do// 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba'i sbyin pa byed
i283a8('bum): yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad kyi smin pa byed do/ nad kyi rkyend rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la nad kyi rkye nad rtsi dang yo byad kyi smin pa byed do// nor bu dang mu tig dang / byed du r+ya dang / dung dang man shes dang
i283b1('bum): thA ru dang gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la nor bu dang / mu tig dang byed du r+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang byi ru dang / gser dang dngul gyi sbyin pa byed pa nas mye'i yo byad gang ce yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin pa byed de/ 
i283b2('bum): des de ltar zas 'dod pa la zas byin/ skom 'dod pa rnams la skom byin/ bzhin pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod depa rnams la gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog byin/ phreng po 'dod pa rnams
i283b3('bum): la phreng ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams la spos byin/ byug pa 'dod rnams la byug pa byin pa/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim byin/ 'tshe ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba byin/ yo
i283b4('bum): 'dod pa rnams la yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkye nad rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa nad kyi rkye nad rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang mu tig dang / bye ru r+ya dang / dung dang ma na shel dang / byi ru dang gser dang / dngul 'dod pa la ni ner bu dang / 
i283b5('bum): mu tig dang / bye dur+ya dang / dngul dang / man shel dang byi ru dang / gser dang dngul byin pa nas myi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/ sems can de deg la 'di lta ste pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i
i283b6('bum): chos bstand pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// sems can de dag gyis kyang // chos bstand pa de thos nas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang nam yang bral bar
i283b7('bum): mya 'gyur ro// rab 'byorard 'di ltar ste dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gyis lam po'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'itshigs
i283b8('bum): shig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos byin/ me tog 'dod pa
i284a1('bum): rnams la nI me tig byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phreng ba byon/ spos 'dod pa rnams la spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa byin/ lamal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha byin/ khyim 'dodapa
i284a2('bum): rnams la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/ yod byad 'dod pa rnams la ni yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkyend rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni nad kyi rkye nang rtse dang ye byad byin/ nor bu dang / mu tig
i284a3('bum): dang / bye du r+ya dang / dung dang man shel dang / bya ru dang / gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni nor dang / mu tig dang bye ra rgya dang / dang dang man shel dang / gser dang dngul byin pa nas myi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung
i284a4('bum): ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor da de ji snyam du sems sgyu ma'i mkhan po ma'i smra tsa ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des sems can gang la yang byin pa yod dam/ gseld pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso// 
i284a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas byin/ skom 'dod
i284a6('bum): rnams la ni skom byin/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhen pa byin/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni ges byin/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog byin/ phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la ni phyed ba byin/ spos 'dod pa rnams
i284a7('bum): la ni spos byin/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la ni byug pa byin/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha byin/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la ni khyim byin/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la ni 'tsho ba byin/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni
i284a8('bum): yo byad byin/ nad kyi rkye na rtsi dang yo byad 'dod pa rnams la ni nad kyi rkye nad rtsi dang yo byad byin/ nor bu dang mu tig dang / bye du rgya dang / dung dang man shel dang / byi ru dang gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni nor bu
i284b1('bum): dang mu tig dang / bye dur+ya dang dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang dngus byin pa nas mya'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin na yang / sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa myed do// de ci'i phyir de/ 
i284b2('bum): rab 'byor da de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// 
i284b3('bum): rab 'byord gan dz+nyA na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / ched du bsams te/ skye ba yongs su bzung bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su sre
i284b4('bum): shicing / de 'khor las sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god do// bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par
i284b5('bum): 'jug pa bzhi pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan
i284b6('bum): lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa myed pa dang / rnam par thard pa brgyad dang / mtha rad kyis gnas
i284b7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'a nad thams cad dang // gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 
i284b8('bum): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu 'god do/ sems can de dag kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
i285a1('bum): byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du chos bstan pa de dang nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am snga ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa shig/ 
i285a2('bum): gyis la maM po che'i bzhi mder 'dug ste/ skye ba mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang pho'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi
i285a3('bum): gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang // yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi
i285a4('bum): yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thard pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smond pa myed pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'ja
i285a5('bum): pa dag dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams can dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
i285a6('bum): rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des/ sems can gang yang dge
i285a7('bum): 'i las kyi lam la bkod pa yod dam/ bsam gtan pa bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag
i285a8('bum): par spang ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan las bdun dang / 'phags pa'i la ma yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan pa
i285b1('bum): myed pa dang smond pa myed pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i par bden pa bzhi drang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad
i285b2('bum): dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang drag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la bkod pa
i285b3('bum): yod dam/ gsol pa bcom 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dra pa/ rab 'byorang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can chad myed grangs myed pa dge ba bcu
i285b4('bum): las kyi lam la rab tu bkod de/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba
i285b5('bum): bzhi dang / rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdu dz+wa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed
i285b6('bum): pa dang / smon de myed pa dang / rnam par tha rad pa brgyad dang / mthard kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams
i285b7('bum): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres po brgyad la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang de dag
i285b8('bum): la bkod pa myed do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnamasakyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor du de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
i286a1('bum): dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha ro lad tu
i286a2('bum): phyind pa la sbyor zhing rab tu bkod pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ rgyal sems can thams cad bdag la rdo ba dang dbyug pas rdeg
i286a3('bum): cing / mtshon gyis 'di sa kyang de la bdag gyis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par myi bya'o// zhes go bar byed cing / sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra la rab tu 'god par byed// rab 'byor de 'di lta ste dper
i286a4('bum): na sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ snga ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gyis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul de nas bzodapa'i pha rol tu phyi nad pa
i286a5('bum): la rab tu s+pha rad ba dang rab tu bkod pa byas na/ rab 'byor da de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol de tu phyind pa la gzhog pa yod dam/ 
i286a6('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa
i286a7('bum): bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor
i286a8('bum): de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen pa bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing sems cad thams
i286b1('bum): cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skal ba dang gzhag cing 'god do// rab 'byor da ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzed brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / 
i286b2('bum): sems cad thams cad brtsoni 'grus kyi pha re lad tu phyinod pa la yang dag par skal ba dang gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
i286b3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems skyed pas/ sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par skul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byord 'di lta ste sla ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan
i286b4('bum): bu mkhas pa zhig gyis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug skye/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul da te/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod na/ rab 'byorarang de la ji sA
i286b5('bum): du semasasgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol da pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyi
i286b6('bum): bka' stsalo pa/ rab 'byo'ang de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad myed grangs med pa lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus
i286b7('bum): la bkod pa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos pa
i286b8('bum): zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul zhing gco/ 
i287a1('bum): cing 'ged pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor de 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches thams cad kyi ches nyid la gnas shing / chos gang yang 'khrug pa 'am 'khrug pa myed par yang dag par rjes su
i287a2('bum): myi mthong na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyind pa la yang dag par skal zhing gzhag pa dang 'god par byed do// de ltar
i287a3('bum): yang dag par skul ba rnams kyang nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogasangs rgyas par ma gyur kyi bar du/ nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha re lid tu phyind pa dang bral ba myi 'gyur ro// rab
i287a4('bum): 'byor da 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gyis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug te/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul da te/ bsam
i287a5('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bkod na/ rab 'byo rod de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ snga ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa des sems can gang yang bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa la bkod

i287a7('bum): gi pha rol tu phyind pa la bkod kyang sems can gang yang bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis

i293a1('bum): 'jig rte nang gi khams de dag na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la yang dag par skul zhing gzhag pa 'gang ngo // ji ltar bdag bzang

i298a8('bum): rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo // myig myig gis stong ngo / rna ba rna bas stong ngo // sna snas stong nga lnga skyes snong ngo // lus lus kyis stong ngo // yid yid kyis stong ngo // gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo // sgra smras
i298b1('bum): byings steng ngo / ro ros stong ngo // reg pa rag gis stong ngo // chos ches kyis stong ngo // myig gi rnam par shes ma myig gi rnam par shes pas stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo / sna'i rnam par
i298b2('bum): ba sna'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo // lho'i rnam par shes pa lce'i rnam par shes pas stong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa lus kyi rnam par shes pas rkang ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo // rmog // 
i298b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa myig gi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rna ba'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa ste'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa lce'i 'dus te reg pas stong ngo / lus kyi 'dus
i298b4('bum): te reg pa lus kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nid kyis tshor ba myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor bas stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
i298b5('bum): kyis tshor ba rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor bas stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen pa kyis tshor ba sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor bas stong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
i298b6('bum): kyis tshor bas stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshor ba lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis tshom pas stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend pa'i kyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkye nad kyis tshor bas sto'o// 
i298b7('bum): sa'i khams sa'i khams kyis stong ngo // chu'i khams chu'i khams kyis stong ngo // mye'i khams mye'i khams kyis stong ngo // rlung gi khams rlung gi khams kyis stong ngo // nam mkha'i khams nam mkha'i khams kyis stong ngo // rnam
i298b8('bum): par shes pa'i khams rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ngo // ma rig pa ma rig pas stong ngo // 'du byeda'i'adu byed kyis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pas stong ngo // mying dang gzugs mying dang gzugs kyis
i299a1('bum): skong ngo // skyemached drug skye mched drug gyis song ngo // reg pa reg pas stong ngo // tshor 'tsher bas sno // srid pa sred pas stong ngo // le nad pa le nad pas stong ngo // srod pa srid pas snang ngo // skye ba skye bas stong ngo // skye bskye
i299a2('bum): bas stong ngo / na shomr-i shis snying ngo / sbyin po'i pha ro lang tu phyind pa sbyin pa'i pha rol su byin pas stong du/ tshul khrims kyi sa ro ldang tu ning pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu nad pas stong ngo / bzong pa'i pha rol tu byi na pa
i299a3('bum): bzod pa'i pha rol du phyind pas stong ngo // brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du tu phyind pas snying ngo // bras su gtan gyi pha rol tu phyind pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyinang pas spong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rolang
i299a4('bum): tu byi nad pa shes rab kyi pha rol du phyind pas spong ngo // rlung stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid phyi nang song ba/ stong pa nyid snying po nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis stong
i299a5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid chen po stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid 'dus byas/ stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyis
i299a6('bum): stong ngo // mtha' las 'das pa spyod pa nyid mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyis song ngo // thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid theg ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid dor ba stong pa nyid kyis stong / 
i299a7('bum): bzhin stong po nyid rang bzhin spang pa nyid kyis stong ngo // ches thams cad stong pa nyid ces thams cad mang ba nyid kyis snang ngo // rang gyi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rung gyi mngon nyidi stong pa nyid kyis dong / mye dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ming dgas
i299a8('bum): bsong pa nyid kyis nang nga/ dngas paskyed pa rung banyid dngos po byed pa stong pa nyid kyis song ngo // nga za nyid stong po dring pa nyid stong pa nyid kyis sang / dngos po myed pa pa nyid mang po nyid dngas brtsod pa'i bab 'di spongs kyi
i299b1('bum): rgyas stong ngo // dran panye bar gzhag pa rnams dran panye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis song ngo // yang dag spong pa rnams yang dag par lung pa rnams kyis spyong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyis stong gong nga
i299b2('bum): po rnams dbang po rnams kyis stong ngo // stobs rnams stobs rnams kyis skyong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams byung chub kyi yan lag rnams kyis song / 'phags pa'i las yan+d+ra lag brgyad pa 'phags pa'i lam yan lag bad+hAn
i299b3('bum): pas slong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyis song po/ bsam gtan rnams pas mo garten rnams kyis snying / tshad myed pa rnams chad myed pa rnams kyis song ngo / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms pa
i299b4('bum): pa rnams gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo // rnam par tha rad pa rnams rnam par thar da pa rnams kyis stong ngo // mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mthar da kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
i299b5('bum): 'jug pa rnams kyis stong ngo // rnam par tha rad pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smind pa myed pa/ rnam par pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pas stong ngo // mngon par shes pa rnams mngon par shes
i299b6('bum): pa rnams kyis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzizhid rnams ting nge 'dzizhin rnams kyis stong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis stong // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangos rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i spongs rnams kyis
i299b7('bum): myi 'jigs pa rnams myi 'jigs pa rnams kyis stong ngo // sras yang dag par rig pa rnams mo ma yang dag par rig pa rnams kyis stong // snying rje chen po snyid rje chen pos song ngo / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sa mi
i299b8('bum): rgyas kyi ngas ma 'dres rnams kyis so / bcom ldan 'dazhes byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpa'as song nga/ gam me na po yang gi mchen pos stong po/ bcom ldan 'das rnam gangs desan/ byang dub sems
i300a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha mchis pa'i go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ rab 'byor de ji skad du smras pa de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// de de bzhin to// de
i300a2('bum): 'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyang ma byas rnam par ma byas mngon par ma byas so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du gro cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag
i300a3('bum): kyang ma byas rnam par ma byas mngon par ma gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa nyid ma bgyis mngon par ma bgyis pa lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha
i300a4('bum): chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ci'i slad du ma bgyis rnam par ma bgyis mngon par ma bgyis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ rab 'byor de byed pa po dmyigs su myed pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad
i300a5('bum): mkhyed pa nyid ma byas rnam par ma byas mngon par ma byas so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go chache chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang la byas rnam par byas mngon par ma byas so// de ci'i phyir
i300a6('bum): zhe na/ rab 'byor da de ltar na gzugs myi byed rnam par myi byed mngon par myi byed do// tshor ba myi byed rnam par myi byed mngon par myi byed do// 'du shes myi byed rnam par myi byed mngon par myi byed do// 'du byed myi byed rnam par

i300b6('bum): smyig gi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bamyi byed rlom par myi byed mngon par myi byed do/ rno ba'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba byed rnam par myi byed mngon par myi byed do/ sna'i 'dus te dgu pa'i rgyad kyis khyo

i301a1('bum): rab 'byor de sems can ni mi byed rnam par myi byed rnam por mngon par myi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shi nang tu myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor du srog ni myi byed rnam par byed mngon par myi byed do// de
i301a2('bum): 'i phyir zhe na/ de shi nad tu myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de 'gro ba ni myi byed rnam par myi byed mngon par myi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shi nad tu myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de gso' ba ni myi byed rnam par myi

i301a6('bum): dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nga tshor ba po myi byed rnam par myi byed mngon par byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shi nad tu myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de shes pa po ni myi byed rnam par myi byed mngon par myi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/

i301a8('bum): 'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu myi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de sgyu ma ni byed rnam par myi byed mngon par myi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de sgra rnyan ni myi byed rnam par ma byed mngon par myi byed/

i302a1('bum): lte ba ni mi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shi nang tu myi dmimyigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor da rga shi ni myi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin du myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ror ba 'byor sa
i302a2('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni myi byed rnam par myi byed mngon par myi byed de de ci'i phyir zhe na de shin tu myi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor na tshul khris gapa rol tu sbyin pa ni myi byed rnam par mi byed mngon par myi byed de/ de ci'i bar zhe na de shin tu myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor bzod/

i302a5('bum): myi byed rnam par myi byed mngon par mi byed de/ de ni phyir zhe na/ de shi nang du myi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rang 'byorar phyi stong pa nyid ni mi byed mngon par myi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na de shi nang tu myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro// rab byor phyi nang steng ni myi byed rnam par myi byed ma
i302a6('bum): bar myi byed de de ci 'byor na ni rab 'byor snang ba 'ang spong ba nyi ni su byed rnam par myi byed mang na bar myi byed de/ de ci'i byor 'a na/ rab 'byorang chen po snang ba 'idin myo bsna rnam par myi byed mngon par mying nga ni 'phyo bo na nang shin du myong bgi sa
i302a7('bum): ra 'byor ngan pan ba spang ban mi kyang rnam par ni byeng ngang bar myi byang / ci'i phyir zhe naning shinang du myo rtsigs pa'i phyir ra/ rab 'byorang 'dus byas spang byi ningan bri byang rje bar myi byeng meng na par myobyang de ma na mde dunas
i302a8('bum): nga phyir / ya 'byung lus ma tham daci pa ni na kyi bying rnab ma byang mang car myi byung / ma ldan shing du myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ nga 'byor ma thagalas 'das pa snang ba nyid na myi byed rnam par myi byed mang nabar myi byed da ci
i302b1('bum): khyod di/ ma ma dang/ song ga kyi pa smra ma / ngonas sa
i302b2('bum): cad snang banyid ni myi byed rnam par byed mngon par mi byed de/ ci 'phyir zhen du shin tu myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ra/ rab byu rang rang gi mtshan ning sang thon ngo myi byed rnam par myi byed mngon par myi byed da de ci'i phyir na na nga shin du phyi tshugs
i302b3('bum): phyir ro// rab 'bya nga myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid ni mi byed rnam par mi byed de// daci'i phyir zha na de shin du myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor da dngos pamyong ba stong ba nyid na myi byang rdzi bar myi byed mngon par mya byed deng ci 'phyir ni ni shin tu tu
i302b4('bum): pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dang po nyid snang bzhi mya byang rnam par myi byed mngon par myi byed de daci'i phyi zhin zhon tu myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ro/ rab 'byor ngan bzhi bar gzhag pa rnams na myamyong rdzob myi mngon par gyi myed kyi'i phyi ma
